Zelda threaded carefully through the halls meeting and greeting with any servants on duty, her vastness taking up a good portion of the hallways, until she finally made it downstairs to the entrance of the dinning room.

The two guards by the doorway parted aside and allowed the heavy-set princess entrance, which required the pair of doors being opened to full capacity, and announced her arrival.

The chef, a surprisingly thin and lanky-looking fellow, made his way out of the kitchen almost instantly. His white hat almost falling off the tip of his head because of such sudden movement, in any case the man welcomed the princess as he sat up the six or so sturdy-made chairs needed to house Zelda's bulk.

"The usual course for lunch, my lady or would you prefer something else?" he asked.

"What do you have in mind?" she asked catching on to his vocal tone.

"Well it seems early today we got in a batch of rather unique fish from Lake Hylia. Apparently they are high in taste but high in blubber if you catch my drift."

"So they taste good, real good, but are rather fattening." stated Zelda bluntly but with a tint of humor in her voice.

"Yes, exactly."

Zelda thought over her options, eventually coming to a decision.

"Uh-huh" was all Malon could mutter in between her chews she wasn't sure what she was eating anymore her weight clearly starting to shift upward as her arms felt thicker, her thighs felt a lot closer then before,her butt and belly much larger causing her dress to stretch and lift as her weight continued to increase.

She was no where near Zelda's weight but Malon was sure she must have put on a good twenty-five pounds or so and it appeared to the enlarging farm girl that dinner was far from done.

A part of her wanted to inform Zelda that she had reached her limit yet another did not want to insult the royal woman who had invited her personality to take part in a private dinner.

111211111212222.content:
Meanwhile just as Impa had said over at Death Mountain Link was busy giving chase to a suspicious-looking man. Apparently he was the same thief Impa was looking for. Of course Link had no knowledge of this but found it odd that the moment the man spotted Impa roaming around (although the sliver-haired woman did not see him) he fled Kakariko Village like a bat out of hell!

Giving chase Link had just about caught up to him. Being a thief the man didn't carry much on him as far as weaponry went outside of a couple of knives, all of which Link dodges expertly as they were toss at him.

The thief's breathing was starting to become heavier and it was clear at this point he was close to running (literally) on fumes.

"Stop, now!" ordered Link but his command would fall on deaf ears as the man continued to run up the mountain.

Finally after what seem like miles the man stopped, which surprised Link somewhat that is until he spotted the thief pull out a Bombchu from of all places underneath his hat!

The man said nothing before winding up the toy-looking bomb and sent it sailing on the ground toward Link.

Link gasped for a moment before he reached for his bow and arrows. He had to take down that thing before it reached him and blew him clear off the mountain.

Backing off a bit Link shot a single arrow precisely at the bomb's core. The mousy bomb then went off with a bang but lucky for Link he was far enough away so the blast did nothing but toss dirt and gravel all around him. He felt dirty but at least that was better then the feeling of getting blasted to hell and back.

Shocked the thief picked up his stolen valuables and made a run for it...but he ultimately wouldn't get far as his face collated with a rock-hard fist.

Now caught up with the man Link was surprised to see Darunia, the Gordon leader, standing proudly over the fallen thief. With a smile Link thanked "his brother" (as Darunia had put it in the past) for the assistance.

With the thief now floored Link went through the things the man had stolen from others. To his surprise it was a small shipment of fish and several empty bottles. Curious he put the twin sacks down and went over to the thief.

"Hey, get up."

Link then pulled the man up to his feet and grabbed hold of his collar so he wouldn't make a break for it.

"Why did you steal the fish and those potions from good honest people?"

"Why should I tell you? HUH?" the thief argued back.

With a grin Link motioned over to Darunia. The gordon leader smiled as he popped the knuckles in his powerful fists.

"Ah...okay okay. I was just trying to score a quick drink with the potions and well grab a bite to eat with the fish."

"Is that all?"

"Yeah...well no..." confessed the thief.

"There's more?" asked Link with a curious expression.

"Yeah. See I thought those potions would be good for stamina, injuries, and what not but turns out they just make you fat! To a guy like me that's like poison so I decided to dump them. Lucky for me a caravan from Lake Hylia was passing by so I quietly dumped the entire contents of the four bottles into one shipment of the fish they were carrying. After that I took a couple of fish for myself...

Unfortunately the Zora guards saw me as I fled with the fish but had no idea what I did with the potions."

The man laughed for a moment before he was decked by Link's right fist.

"You idiot. Do you even realize you've just contaminated that batch of fish. People may very well get ill from what you just did."

At this point Darunia decided he had heard enough and took a step forward.

"Brother, I say you let me handle with turning over this man to the proper authorities while you make haste and find where that tainted fish was headed."

"I...I think it was going to the Castle Town..." mumbled the thief before Darunia threw him over his shoulder.

"The Castle...alright. Thanks Darunia I'll see ya later." As he said his goodbye Link pulled out his ocarina and in a flash teleported toward the temple of time.

Of course during all of this Link had no idea if the fish were even still in town or perhaps they had been sent toward the castle. If it was the latter Zelda surely had eaten them all by now! It appeared that once again he was in a race against time.
111211111212222.title: Link beats Impa to the thief

1112111112122221.content:
Castle Town had perhaps 140,000 people living in it. Link wasn't exactly sure of the population, but he did know that there were shady characters that operated in the town. First, there was Sofasa the Gerudo. After the defeat of Ganondorf, the Gerudo had moved into other parts of Hyrule and started to do trade. Since the whole population of the Gerudo were now female, men were attracted to the curvy Gerudo females. Nabooru had become Queen of the Gerudo, since she was in second-in-command while Ganondorf was in charge. Sofasa had moved to Castle Town shortly after Ganondorf's defeat, and dealt with the thieves that lived in Castle Town. Sofasa ran a bar that was a front for a den of thieves. Sofasa wouldn't probably know about the shipment of fish, but it was worth checking out.
Sofasa's Bar was in one of the many back alleys of Castle Town; the kind of place where you wouldn't wander around at night. When Link entered the bar, he saw nobody in it. He did, however hear a hushed voice in the back go "Shhhhh!"
"Hello?" asked Link loudly.
A hushed voice rasped from the back: "An'otak finas!"
The language was unfamiliar to Link; although, he had a vague idea that he had heard it somewhere before. Before he could react, four persons came into the bar area from the back door. One of them was a female Gerudo; not Sofasa and it wasn't Nabooru. It was an unusually tall female--around seven feet tall--and she was fat; she must've weighed a good 400 pounds! The other three people with her were human thieves that Link knew by sight, but not by name.
"The famous Link" said the fat Gerudo female. "the one who killed Ganondorf. Are you the reason why I only got half the shipment today?"
'Half?' asked Link.
"One half of the shipment went to the castle" said the Gerudo female. "the other half of the shipment went to me"
"You're telling him too much!" snapped one of the thieves with her.
"He isn't going to ruin my plans" said the Gerudo. "calm yourself, Janon"
"And what's your plan?" asked Link.
"Oh dear" said the Gerudo. "he likes to hear my plans. Too bad, I ain't telling you"
"What's your name, then?" asked Link.
"I?" asked the Gerudo. "I am called Souaraborf, the daughter of Ganondorf himself"

The elder male obviously couldn't even bring himself to finish a complete sentence at this point.

"Fat? Perhaps, I believe I may have gained a bit of weight over the time you were gone, Father." Zelda explains, a gentle tone of voice ringing in her words.

The King was at a lost for words, here before his grace sat his daughter except now there was more of her much more then he ever dreamed of.

For the life of him he simply could not come up with any sound logic as to why Zelda would do this to her previous dainty form why make herself almost as big as an entire room.

"Zelda what pray tell is wrong with you my child? Look at yourself look at what you've become. Do you realize how the people of the land will look at you, how disgusted your image must be to them, and just how are you going to find a suitor to rule by your side looking as you do now?!" The King spat out with a cruel venom-like tone.

"...Father I have to have it on good authority that the citizens don't mind me looking as I do. In fact I don't think this has anything to do with them so much as it has to do with you."

"Zelda you are my daughter I only want your happiness..." "Then let me be. I'm happy being big being larger then life." the Princess explained.

"No...it...it isn't proper for someone to be so grand. Zelda I forbid you to continue this eating disorder of yours. You are to go to your room, young lady, and stay there until you get this craziness out of your head. Do I make myself clear."

With a look of frustration and sadness Zelda nodded, as best she could considering her extra chins...

A short time later Zelda found herself in her newly expanded room.

'Father you can't do this to me. I'm sorry but I'm not going to give up on this fattening dream of mine."

11121111222111112112.content:
In an alternate universe, a pizza delivery boy stops his car in front of his next customer's house. He gets out his vehicle, walks up to the door, and knocks. The customer answers.
"Well, it's about time." said the burly customer.
"Sorry I'm late." said the delivery boy. "They're building a second roundabout down by the mall. Ca you believe that? Anyway, here's your pizzas sir. The total comes to $34.99." the delivery boy hands the customer the stack of boxes, and the customer gives him the money. The delivery boy turns around and walks away, but before he could make it to his car...
"Is this some kind of joke?!" the delivery boy turns around again to see what the problem is. The customer shows him one of the empty boxes, then tosses it on the ground. The customer furiously stomps towards the delivery boy and grabs him by his shirt collar. "Where are my pizzas?! Answer me, or I'll..."

Meanwhile, in another universe...
"Come with me and you'll be in a world of pure imagination..." Willy Wonka opens the vault door for his tourists...only for it to be empty.
"Um..." Wonka scratches his head with his candy cane in confusion...only to realize his cane also disappeared. "Excuse me for one second." embarrassed, he runs out the door as fast as he could.

It wasn't just those two dimensions, either. All the food on every planet in every universe vanished. Aliens lost all of their bizarre alien food, entire planes of reality where everything was made of food also disappeared. All of this is happening because Zelda cast a spell to teleport all the food in every existence to her and Link's personal realm. Because there's an infinite number of universes, This means there's a literal endless supply of food, all for Zelda to enjoy, even the bizarre alien food that they've never seen before.
On top of the mountain of creamy blubber that is Zelda, Link can see nothing but food for miles every which way. Cake mountains off in the distance, and planets of food high up in the sky. They were at the center of it all.
"There's so much." said Link, mind boggled. He affectionately rubs one of Zelda's puffy cheeks. "What do you want to taste first?"
"Everything." Zelda said. She cast a spell that made all the food in the immediate vicinity spiral down into her mouth like a massive whirlpool. Zelda's fat exploded outwards in every direction. More and more fat folds and rolls formed as she continued to fatten. Link found himself sinking deeper into her flesh as she got bigger and softer. He couldn't control himself anymore. He ripped off his clothes like a wild animal and smothered his face in Zelda's blubber while stroking his "master sword".
Zelda was now so fat that she could easily crush her own kingdom under her girth if she were in her own universe, and from the looks of it, it's not going to stop there.

An hour later Link awoke to quite a startling headache, somehow he had been knocked out a short time after Zelda began to feast.

As soon as his head finished spinning, Link suddenly remembered about Zelda! What if it was some evil force that had gotten to him and with Zelda the way she was she'd be defenseless...

Yet once more Link was startled for he was within a very cozy and very soft spot. Crawling his way out Link noticed there was nothing but softness around him, suddenly he felt his foot get stuck in his previous location.

"Link? Link where are you?!" yelled out the familiar voice of Zelda, eventually reaching Link's ears. As the youth pulled himself out he noticed the sort of "roll" his foot was caught on.

A mixture of horror and surprise crossed his mind as he realized that roll was property of Zelda! Looking around Link realized where exactly he was, on the right side of Zelda's now Castle-sized belly, to add even more amazement he was previously stuck in one of her fat rolls.

Pulling his head as far back as he could Link could see nothing but Zelda's vastness which had replaced where the Castle once stood.

Her amazing belly having taken up the entire location of the castle, rounding in at around 40 ft wide and deep with so many rolls and curves that Link lost count of them all.

Her butt cheeks had also taken quite a shot, each one nearly the size of the Temple of Time packed with a vast amount of softness. Her feet no longer visible having been swallowed by her massively fat legs, her arms as well growing to a similar size of her legs making them more than useless if she even tried to move them.

Zelda's once chubby face was now large and thick with her new fat, making her cheeks even more spherical, her chin count jumped to at the very least ten, and her neck was completely submerged in the lake of fat that was the rest of her form.

Finally her previous huge breasts took quite a hit and now were more near the area of "massive" if not already pass that, Link swore that each one was the size of a small home. What little of her dress was left didn't seem to do much to cover these new "homes" causing a large amount of cleavage to be broadcast out for the entire world to see.

All in all Zelda was quite a site to see, becoming a literal caste of fat, Link was sure everyone in town could now easily see their princess in all her massive glory.

Link assumed that Zelda's expanding girth must have knocked him out but with said realization the young hero wondered what had happen to the others living/working in the castle? Had Zelda's flab squashed them all flatter than pancakes?

He had to find out...

"and my name is Chiaz" said a 15-year old.

"We were cooking more food for Zelda when she outgrew the castle" said Dihim. "it was pure luck that we ended up in here. I don't know if there's any more survivors, though. We didn't see what happened to the main chef"
"Well, I'm going to look for more survivors" said Link.

"She's planninng to get as big as she can get" said Link. "who knows, she may cover the world at the end of the day" With that, Link climbed out of the belly button to look for more survivors.

Zelda stomped and wobbled into the market, drooling at the delicious sight before her. "Well, time for a feast!" She said, grabbing a cart full of fruit and swallowing it whole! She ripped the roof off the Happy Mask shop, ate it, and then began to eat everything inside. Once that was done, she ate the building itself.

"Mmm, delicious." Zelda said. She then began to grab other building and eat them too. During all of this everyone was evacuating the buildings, wanting to get away from the giant gluttonous princess. They made it just past the drawbridge when Zelda finished eating the shooting gallery.

Zelda looked over at the people running away from the castle. "Well, I'm glad I didn't eat them..." she said.

'Why? What are they but more food for your beautiful body?' said a voice in Zelda's head.

"Huh? Who is that?" Zelda said.

'Does it matter?' the voice said. 'You know you want to eat, so why should you care if its living or not?'

"I'm not listening, I'm not listening..." Zelda said.

'Give in Zelda. Give in and eat them all.' the voice said. 'Eat them all, eat them all, eat them all...'

Zelda tried her hardest to shut out the mysterious voice, but the voice kept on encouraging her, and her belly kept on rumbling. She felt her willpower slowly disappearing, until...

"Okay, whoever you are, I will." Zelda said, finally giving in. Hunger was one of the only things she could concentrate on right now. (Aside from growing even bigger.)

'Whatever you see, you shall devour.' the voice said.

"Whatever I see, I shall devour." Zelda said, stomping out of Hyrule Castle town. She smashed the drawbridge with one step, and continued on looking for more food...

"Link, how are we gonna get out of here?" Malon said, getting to the point.

choices: Malon outgrows the entire ranch
Link and Zelda are caught in Malon's flab
111211112221211111212.content:
Smiling, Malon looks down at the cooler with all the fattening milk in it. If she could manage to drink all of the milk in the cooler, Malon would be bigger than Zelda was now and Fairy Boy would love her instead of Zelda. As Zelda was looking for Malon, the young red-head opened up the cooler and started to chug down all the milk that was in the cooler. As she did so, Malon's belly got bigger and bigger. Malon smiled.
'Watch out, Zelda' thought Malon. 'you might get crushed by my flab if you're not careful'


Link was petting the cow that he had just handed a bag of oats to when he heard a surprised yelp from Zelda. Link rushed outside and gasped at what he saw. Malon was taking up half the ranch with her girth! Malon had at least 10 chins, and was working on the 11th. Malon was also the size of a barn and was getting even bigger. Zelda was running, trying to avoid getting crushed in Malon's flab.
111211112221211111212.title: Malon gets massive

choices: Malon ends up covering Hyrule field
Malon covers all of Hyrule!
1112111122212111112121.content:
Malon smiled as she felt the milk continue to fill her up with more and more weight. That and of course the fact that Zelda was fleeing away from her scared from the surge of flab threatening to come over her, as well Link.

For a moment Malon hoped Link would be alright well he was resourceful so chances were high that her fairy boy would live through her wave of fat. Blubber that was quickly replacing the rest of her home with more of herself!

Desperate to get out in time Link followed Zelda toward the ranch entrance unfortunately the princess' weight slowed her movement down to a terrible pace that all she could do was yell out as Malon's soft creamy fat overtook her. Link being the hero he was wanted to save the blonde royal but first he had to get to safety Zelda was a sage after all so she'd most likely be safe for the time being although she must feel completely humiliated right now.

Just as it appeared he'd make to exit the young hero realized he underestimated the speed on which Malon was growing!

He too yelled out after being swallowed by Malon's incredible girth.

The redhead was completely unaware of having buried her fairy boy instead she stiffed a giggle after having felt her body replace the entire ranch complex belonging to her family Malon was the ranch now!

Then something happened...even after her home had been demolished by her multiple tons of fat her growth was going!

She was getting bigger fatter and Malon was coming to love every second of it. Spreading out in every single direction she smiled and hummed her favorite tune enjoying the feeling of her blubber growing and covering anything and everything around her.
1112111122212111112121.title: Malon outgrows the entire ranch

choices: Link picks a direction and starts to walk
Zelda made it out with her Sage powers
11121111222121111121211.content:
Malon kept right on growing, covering more and more of the huge Hyrule Field with her girth. Zelda and Link were buried so deep in her flab that she couldn't even feel them move around. As she grew and grew, Malon grew more happier. Her huge girth now covered a third of the field, but she didn't stop growing. Malon's flab was creeping towardsw Hyrule Castle and the town surrounding it, but the flab never reached the castle....it ended up covering part of the city. Once her flab had reached the end of the field she finally stopped growing. Malon looked down at herself and her seemingly endless amount of flab.
"Beat that, princess" said Malon aloud, her voice booming across Hyrule.


Link was swimming in fat and he had no idea in which direction he was going. It was a long couple of minutes when finally Link emerged from the flab of Malon.

"Geez....." said Link, looking at the new landscape that was before him. "I sure hope Zelda made it out of there"
11121111222121111121211.title: Malon Field

choices: In the forest Saria investigates the blob of flab that sneaked in from the field
Ruto asks her guards to check on what all the commotion was about
111211112221211111212111.content:
Nothing but soft fat was all the blonde hero could see as he scanned the horizon what was once green was now cream. The young man wasn't really sure what he should do first as numerous thoughts ran through his head.

Where was Zelda, was she okay? Where was he currently? Just how far had Malon grown and was she done?

Speaking of the perky redhead Link ultimately figured he should first go speak with Malon, of course that meant he had to find her head in this landscape of fat!

Rubbing the back of his head he wondered where exactly that could be? However he seemingly got a break when after a second look he spotted a new pair "mountains" that were never there before...

*Cough*

He cleared his throat for a second mentally cursing himself for any thoughts that could bring on a potential nosebleed. Another slight cough escaped his lips before he gathered his composure. At least now he knew in what direction to go.

If only he had Epona though as it was this was going to take a while. He took a quick few steps froward however he realized he was almost calve deep in farm-girl fat!

"Yikes! Better get moving then."

As he began Link wondered how others in Hyrule were taking this new development...
111211112221211111212111.title: Not exactly a compass but it'll do

choices: From her castle, Zelda sees the mysterious blob that now covers  Hyrule Field
Ruto investigates the blob of flab that's in her domain
1112111122212111112121111.content:
The blob of creamy flesh had poked into Kokiri Forest, completely covering the small rope bridge that led into Hyrule proper and was just poking slightly into the village that Link was raised in long ago. None of the Kokiri--save for Saria--had ever ventured beyond the forest. This is due because any Kokiri that leaves the forest will die--not instantly, it might take a few days or even a week depending on how healthy said Kokiri is. Saria was a special case because she's one of the seven sages of Hyrule. Few Kokiri know Saria is a sage.
Saria was exploring the seemingly endless Lost Woods, hoping to find a way beyond the maze-like woods. Because there was something beyond the Lost Woods to be sure....maybe even another country. But Saria had no luck whatsoever in finding a way past the Lost Woods that didn't lead back to the village or the Forest Temple. Since the defeat of Ganondorf, Saria grew bored and explored the Lost Woods, discovering two new locations; A grand fountain that looked ancient enough to be as old as Hyrule itself. The fountain had long ago dried up and was covered in vines and moss. The other location that Saria had discovered seem to be an incredibly old looking temple to the three goddesses of Hyrule. It was slightly smaller than the Forest Temple, and looked to be far more older.
Now, Saria was standing in front of the bit of flesh that had crept its way into Kokiri Village. The blob was flesh-colored and was very yielding--another Kokiri had almost sunk right into the blob until Saria had saved him--it turned out to be Mido of all people.
"What's that thing?" asked Mido.
"I don't know...." said Saria. "but I'm going to find out"
1112111122212111112121111.title: Saria and the Blob

choices: Book in hand Zelda must travel to the dried up fountain Saria found
Taking the book with her Zelda must head to the old temple Saria discovered
11121111222121111121211111.content:
A frustrated sigh escaped the plump lips of Zelda as she paced, as well as she could given her size, around a room with a clear view of the outside world. In the distance was the creamy fleshy blob that had overtaken Hyrule field.

Obviously it had taken the blonde royal no more then a second to realize what or rather who that was. Malon the perky and clever farmgirl had somehow grown from pleasantly hourglass to gigantically enormous!

Surprisingly Zelda wasn't angry with the far stretching redhead, okay so she was royally ticked off that Malon had gone and made a field of fat out of herself and no doubt the destruction her growth had caused and yes she had been impulsive and selfish but somehow Zelda couldn't completely fault Malon for her recent actions.

The plump princess didn't need sage powers to know of the farm girl's crush on Link or that if she were in Malon's place she would have done the same...perhaps even more given her magical abilities They were still young and easily emotional after all.

In any case Zelda instead thought over what had lead her to this moment in time. She recalled how she had escaped her flab-made prison thanking the goddess for her skill of instant teleportion unfortunately she had lost complete contact with Link although assure herself that he was clever and expertly skilled enough to keep himself safe.

Her people had panic when the surge of fat had effortlessly demolished a part of castle town so the princess ordered for all citizens to be housed in the castle for the time being after noting that Malon's growth had come to a close. Afterwards Impa left to check up on her home of Kakariko while Zelda left a few of the guards to watch over things downstairs as she pondered away at how to fix all of this.

As things were currently Malon had mercifully stopped growing but Zelda was uncertain if the redhead would possibly expand further at a later moment. She couldn't risk that so making her way over to a nearby bookshelf she began to scan over the titles one by one.

The books were old containing writings that were either long forgotten or deemed worthless by current methods. Zelda was sure however that current arts weren't going to be of use instead an answer had to be in here somewhere.

Little did the princess know that her found answer would connect back to the locations discovered by another...
11121111222121111121211111.title: Zelda returns to deal with a field sized problem

choices: Check up on Link
Stay with Nabooru and the newly fat guard
111211112221211111212111112.content:
Carefully reading several of the old books, Zelda learned of what was called The Forgotten Temple located deep in the Kokiri Forest. The Forgotten Temple was too the three goddesses that created Hyrule...in fact, according to one of the old books the Forgotten Temple was said to be in the oldest place in all of Hyrule. The way to the Forgotten Temple has been lost for countless years, but it was rumored that the Kokiri children knew where it was. Zelda had read that deep in that forgotten temple was a magical artifact--the books didn't say just what it was--that could grant one person the power of a goddess...or to become one. The books weren't that clear on what the magical artifact did. If Zelda could find that artifact, she could reverse Malon to her original size. Zelda doubted that her magic could do anything against someone as large as Malon...the magic would probably just bounce off of her. She could go get Link to get the mysterious item, but that would be like looking for a needle in a haystack the size of Hyrule Field and Zelda wanted to end this as quickly as possible. So, Zelda had no choice but to go by herself to the Forgotten Temple.



Nabooru was also investigating the strange blob of flab that had invaded Gerudo Valley. The flab didn't extend to the hideout, thank goodness. Since the defeat of the King of Evil, Nabooru had one hell of a job to convince the other inhabitants of Hyrule to trade with the Gerudo people. Also, without evil in the world to fight off, Nabooru had plumped out slightly....nowhere near the weight of a certain farmgirl to be sure, but enough to tell that she had gained some weight.
"Where did this.....thing came from?" asked a female guard, reaching out to touch the wall of flab.
"I don't know" said Nabooru. "but..."
When the female guard had touched the wall of flab, the guard nearly doubled in weight! The guard was skinny as a rail, but when she touched the mysterious wall of flab, she had doubled her weight.
"What the...?!" asked the guard, pulling her hand away.
111211112221211111212111112.title: Forgotten Temple

choices: Link contacts Saria, how are things in the forest?
Check up with Malon, what could the field sized farm girl be thinking of?
1112111122212111112121111121.content:
Link exhaled as he paused for a moment. Sure he had a destination but that didn't mean it was an easy road. At least he wasn't sinking into the ground anymore.

He had tied his boots tied together and flung them over his shoulder when he realized that Malon's field of fat was safe enough to walk on barefooted, well in socks anyway, however walking as he was reminded him just how vast the field was and in turn how vast Malon had become! Distance didn't seem to be a problem when he had Epona with him...unfortunately his trusty stead was tied back to the post back home in Kokiri Village.

Link groaned as he decided against slapping himself for his accursed mistake after all how was he to know that something like this was going to occur? A powerful evil threatening Hyrule sure but his redheaded friend burying a portion of his home land beneath her stunning girth, no absolutely not!

Frustrated but not defeated Link continued on his way. He'd make it to speak with Malon even if it'd be the end of him...the young hero was hoping that it wouldn't come to that though.

In any case the recent thoughts of his faithful horse reminded him however that he could easily contact Saria and ask how she and the rest of the Kokiri are dealing with Malon's big change. At the very least it gave him something to do while he continued on his path.
1112111122212111112121111121.title: The long blubbery road

choices: Saria's bloating up after having accidentally touched Malon's flab!
Zelda's arrived and she wants to see what the princess wants...
11121111222121111121211111211.content:
Link took but a moment to play the familiar favorite tune of his childhood best friend and not a minute later did he hear the sound of her voice resounding in his mind.

"Been a while, huh." he mentioned after she had called out to him she agreed and the two of them shared a short laugh afterwards. Link smiled happy to have the mood and his journey a bit more pleasant.

Afterwards Saria mentioned that something strange had happened a short time after he had left his home. He asked her what had occurred and she explained that some sort of "blob" had nearly oozed it's way into the village, the girl seemed thankful that it had come up short however.

She then asked if he knew anything about it? Link paused for a second wondering how he was going to explain the incident to Saria...

"So Malon, the farm girl, is that enormous?!"

She could hardly believe it she knew of Malon after Link had introduced the two of them to one another but her mind was just blown at the fact that she had gone from curvy to field-worthy!

"And you're heading over to talk to her?" Saria asked still trying to wrap her head around everything.

"Yup after that I hope there's a way to reverse all this."

She agreed figuring that if anyone could find a way to change the redhead back to her original weight it would be Hyrule's hero and her best friend.

Suddenly something occurred to her as she called out to Link.

"Saria? What's wrong, what's going on over there?"
11121111222121111121211111211.title: Always time for a chat between friends

choices: Check up on Nabooru or Zelda
Check up with Ruto
11121111222121111121211111212.content:
Amid the vast expanse that was Malon, her head was just visible because of her red hair. She had at least three dozen chins and both of her cheeks were thick with fat. Malon was happy with the results, even though she could no longer move due to her massive weight. She didn't feel Link walking across her body because she was simply too big to feel anything. Malon rubbed her belly as best as she could.

"Imagine me, a simple farmgirl covering all of Hyrule" said Malon, and chuckled. Of course, she only covered Hyrule Field but it was impossible to tell just how much she covered Hyrule from her point of view. She could feel very slight movements under her, but she paid them no mind. Malon smiled to herself as she tried to shift around her weight, but it was useless. She didn't have any musclepower to support her own weight. Being this big and fat was a blessing and a curse. She could never move again, but that's a price Malon was willing to take.
11121111222121111121211111212.title: Malon's Thoughts

choices: Her sage powers actually make things worse fattening her up a good deal!
Her powers protect her and instead the weight gain is pass to the guards
111211112221211111212111112121.content:
One, two, three, no now four of her guards had seemingly plumped out the moment each one had laid a hand on the vast soft expense that had intruded into their land and the desert rose if you will wasn't too pleased with the stunning fattening.

Standing a good deal away from the soft blob Nabooru tapped away at the side of her chin curious what exactly that "thing" was and how exactly was it causing her girls to blow up in weight?

Was it magical? No even with her abilities as a sage this strange blob didn't seem to give off any sense of magic. Then again what if the magic itself was hidden deep within it? Possible but first she made sure to call off any ongoing investigations as it was she had lost four guards to it's power why risk anymore that is unless some more have already been altered.

If they were she'd find out soon enough. In any case despite her better judgment Nabooru figured that if she was going to get a better understanding on what this blob was she'd have to lay a hand on it herself. If it did have magic imbedded within her sage powers would no doubt alert her to it and how knows maybe they'd even protect her from the fattening aftereffect?
111211112221211111212111112121.title: Back at the desert

choices: While investigating a few guards accidentally sank into the fleshy intruder!
Direct physcial contact has caused the lady guards to suddenly bloat up!
11121111222121111121211112.content:
Elsewhere in Hyrule within the halls of the domain belonging to the Zoras it's current ruler, along with being the Sage of Water, found herself in deep conversation with two members of her guard as the trio made their way toward the nearest exit.

Shortly after Ganondorf's reign of terror had been brought to a close Princess Ruto had taken over the throne after she had advised her father to deeply consider retirement. The former "King of Evil" had nearly taken the elder fish's life had it not been for Sheik's timely intervention, incidentally the fish girl was never told her father's (and her own much later) savior was actually Zelda in deep disguise.

With peace restored Ruto had stressed that she never wanted again wanted her dear old dad to be in such risk. A few days she was made ruler, for now keeping the princess title however, her father retiring to...wherever it was that Zora rulers retired to. Ruto wasn't too sure where that was, maybe one day far into the future she'd find out...

In any case after having calm the growing worry of her fellow Zora the princess was determined to find out just what in the goddesses' names had occurred in the outside world.

"We already have a few of the guards looking into things, my lady."

"Anything we know?" Ruto asked glancing over at her guardsman.

"Nothing new to report only that whatever it is originated from outside our land."

"Fantastic" the princess muttered with heavy sarcasm...

Later outside Ruto paused for a moment.

"So it's out toward the entrance of the domain?"

"Yes my lady." explained the guardswoman by her side.

"Strange how after the surges from earlier whatever foulness it is has remained relatively quiet..."

"Do you think it's possibly of peaceful nature then?" the lady fish asked her male co-worker.

"For the moment it doesn't matter what it was that was making such a commotion. Instead let's press forward and meet up with recon group."

Ruto stated interrupting the conversation between the two of them clearly wishing to put this sudden occurrence behind her.

"Yes, my lady!" announced the guards in unison...

Around the halfway mark however the fish trio came across a member of the guard that obviously had been sent out earlier.

"Guardsman are you alright? Can you report in?" asked the princess worried for the fish man's safety.

"Yes my lady..." he paused to take in a breath, "we have a dire situation on our hands however."
11121111222121111121211112.title: No one ever said ruling would be easy

choices: Check in on Link, wherever he might be...
Check up on one of the Sages...
11121111222121111121212.content:
The way she had burst out of her home literally and figuratively brought the ranch girl much amusement. The fact that she knew she was far from done only severed to further her amusement. Her creamy doughy and rapidly increasing bulk spreading outward with each passing second countless tons piling upon anything and everything that had the misfortune of being the way of her tremendous blubber.

Minutes later sill she continued to grow in size even after her supreme-sized form had reached the point where every inch of the equally vast field in the middle of Hyrule had been buried beneath her now mountainous self. She chuckled as she felt a portion of her belly begin to flood over the castle town soon enough even the castle itself would bend to her bulk. Same for Death Mountain now that Kakariko had been dealt with. She cooed at the cooling sensation of overtaking the Zora's domain followed by a brief fit of laughter as the forest-life of the lost woods had somehow tickled her swelling form. Moments later a strange mixture of cool and heat ran through her gigantic bulk as her monstrous butt engulfed the fishing lake and desert area belonging Gerudo...

Soon enough her outlandish growth began to come to come to a close. At firs disappointed that such a marvelous event was ending only to cheer up as she came to realize how far she had gone in weight, this morning she was just an average curvy young woman now thanks to some fantastic milk she was a mountain of woman...no even better she was her own freaking country!

Nothing was bigger or better then her! She had to be the biggest thing in Hyrule hell she was Hyrule now that thought alone made her beam with pride. She almost wished she could bring her tremendous fat-filled arms together so she could clap her hands but obviously that was out of the question so she'd have to settle on sitting back her face submerging slightly in their flab as she admired her grand size.

"Your little girl's all grown up, Daddy!" she stated in utter amusement a playful grin on her lips.
11121111222121111121212.title: Malon covers all of Hyrule!

choices: Nabooru decides what to do next
Check up on Link and Zelda
111211112221211111212122.content:
The last thing that Nabooru, one of the seven Sages of Hyrule, remembered was that a huge something was coming directly at her and her people. The last thing that she saw was a gigantic flesh-colored wall with a crack in it. She tried to run away from whatever it was but she had been engulfed along with several other females. Now the Sage of Spirit was in complete darkness. She was totally surrounded by the flesh that had covered her and no doubt covered the entire desert, if not all of Hyrule.
Nabooru was--more or less--the leader of the Gerudo since Ganondorf was defeated. There would be no male Gerudo for at least a century. Ever since the defeat of Ganondorf, the Sage of Spirit had been bored out of her mind. There was no evil left in Hyrule which was a very good thing indeed but it made life boring. Nabooru had no real reason to defend the Spirit Temple since nobody would dare attack the temple now. So the Sage of Spirit got lazy and gained much weight.
Nabooru shook her head to clear it. Now was not the time to be nostalgic. With her Sage powers, Nabooru was able to teleport herself from under the flesh wall and into an area of the desert she hadn't been to before. In fact the area might not even be in Hyrule anymore. She knew the desert went beyond Hyrule but she never ventured out of Hyrule before but surely there must be other countries out there besides Hyrule.
Nabooru turned back to look at the gigantic fleshy wall that had engulfed her. The flesh-wall towered over her by a couple of thousand feet or so it seemed to her. What in the goddess's name happened?! What was this wall that had covered all of the desert. It was flesh, no doubt about it, as Nabooru felt the wall before her. Was this a person? Nabooru couldn't see how that was even possible but stranger things had happened.
111211112221211111212122.title: Sage of Spirit

choices: Zelda's worried about the citizens of Hyrule she must speak with the sages!
Zelda's envious of Malon she must find a source of fattening...
1112111122212111112121222.content:
Somewhere in the country of farmgirl flab Link emerged gasping for any sort of fresh air after having been buried alive by a tsunami of seemingly endless blubber! As he pulled himself out further the young hero wasn't exactly sure where he was his mind still hazy from the entire ordeal...the last thing he remembered Malon growing so ridiculously fat and how he and Zelda attempted to get away from...

Oh Goddesses Zelda! She must still be pinned down somewhere in this nation of blubber! He had to find her but everywhere he looked he simply saw more of the same creamy milky flesh extending outward as far as his eyes could see to make matters worse he wasn't even sure where he was? Was he still where Lon Lon Ranch used to stand or had the rush of flab pushed him further away as if he were caught in a river current? He had no real answer all he could do was pick a direction and hope for the best.

Elsewhere and unaware to Link Zelda too had resurfaced from her fatty prison slightly exhausted from having to pull herself out by force not to mention use her magical abilities to keep from drowning in flab so it was understandable why she currently wasn't in the best of moods. She thought back to what had occurred and was sure Link was alright he was a resourceful hero after all eventually they'll find each other again so right now she only had one thing in mind.
1112111122212111112121222.title: Meanwhile with the hero and princess

choices: Zelda is able to contact the other Sages
Check up on a Sage
11121111222121111121212221.content:
Zelda was seething. How dare this little farm girl, this little nothing, cover Hyrule! Zelda was the princess of Hyrule! She was the one who should cover all of Hyrule in her blubber! Everybody should....

Zelda shook her head to clear it. Where had those dark thoughts come from? Zelda's thoughts drifted to the citizens of Hyrule. By the goddesses, the citizens! The citizens were probably all drowning in the nation of flab. With her magical powers, Zelda could save people that was trapped under the tons of blubber. However she couldn't possibly save all of them at once. She needed help from the other Sages.

This is Zelda called Zelda through her mind to any Sage that could hear her. All of the Sages could talk telepathically to each other. Can anybody hear me?

Who has dared covered my domain with blubber?! came the voice of Ruto, the Sage of Water.

Zelda, what has happened? asked Saria.

I need you all to help save people from under Malon said Zelda.

....Isn't Malon that farm girl? asked Ruto. how did she get to be so big?!

I'll explain later said Zelda. Why didn't the other Sages start talking? Could they've been knocked out by the rush of blubber? right now, save all who you can
11121111222121111121212221.title: Calling Help

choices: Meanwhile with Link...
Elsewhere Ruto is not pleased with the invading flab!
111211112221211111212122211.content:
After speaking with Saria and Ruto Zelda attempted again to reach her fellow sages after some time and difficulty the princess was at last able to contact Rauru and Darunia, the former doing what he could to keep the temple of time as a safe zone for those he had saved from Malon's countless tons while the Goron leader led the charge to keep the farm girl flab from pouring far into Death Mountain.

Afterwards she got word to her ever faithful protector Impa who was rather busy leading those she had saved toward Death Mountain where the Gorons could look after them. She was thankful the fat hadn't crush the life out of anyone but those that remained were still drowning in flab so there was little time to chat.

Last was Nabooru the desert woman was surprised to hear that her assumption from earlier was indeed true this monstrous blob before her was an actual person, and it was the redhead farm girl of all people!

"How did that happen?"

"Long story short, some very special milk." Zelda explained well aware of how odd it all sounded.

"Okay...so what exactly are we going to do about it?"

Zelda stated that at the moment it was best for the sages to use their powers and abilities to save all that they could after that they could form a plan of greatly reducing Malon's weight.

"Sounds good I'll see how many of my girls I can save." Nabooru stated, the gerudo woman wanted her fellow ladies safe and wanted the desert free from all the farm girl fat.
111211112221211111212122211.title: Zelda is able to contact the other Sages

choices: Ruto decides to look for a Zora item that may be useful
Ruto will fight flab with flab! Let the unexpected feast begin!
1112111122212111112121222112.content:
Elsewhere the Zora guards to their princess watched as Ruto spaced back and forth in a chamber deep in her domain, the inner most having been spared from the tremendous amount of fat that came surging through without warning.

"To have our domain be insulted like this, I will not stand for it!"

The Zoras could survive even while submerged in such flab so Ruto was less concerned with saving her people and more focused on her anger at the invading fat. She wanted it gone and she wanted to give Malon a piece of her mind for daring to do such a thing to begin with.

"Lady Ruto what are your orders?" one of the lady guards asked.

"I want our home to be rid of this blasted blubber!"

"My lady how will we go about doing such a thing?" another guard question.

Ruto thought over possible options for a moment before deciding upon...
1112111122212111112121222112.title: Ruto wants some fat free water, now!

choices: Check up on Link
Continue with Ruto's Feast
11121111222121111121212221122.content:
Ruto stood and thought for a minute before coming to a solution.

"If this farmgirl wants a fight, we'll give her a fight" said Ruto. "I'll fight blubber with blubber! I'll match that farmgirl in weight and push all of her blubber from my domain. PREPARE THE BIGGEST FEAST YOU CAN!"

"Err...your Majesty" said the female guard. "I'm not sure if we have enough food for you to reach such an incredible size! Anyway, Do you really think that will solve the problem?"

Ruto glared at the guard. "I didn't ask for your opinion! Tell the cooks I want a feast the likes of which will go down in legend!"

"At once!" said the guard.

Soon all of the cooks in Zora's Domain started to cook the great feast. Ruto waited impatiently while her feast was being prepared. Even though it was a good plan, Ruto feared that the guard might have had a point; there may not be enough food to reach Malon's massive size. Unless...unless one of her Sage powers could help somehow...or an item could be found that could bulk up Ruto....but she knew of no such item that could do that.

Wait.

Didn't Zelda say that all of this madness started with special milk from Lon Lon Ranch?

"Do we have any milk from Lon Lon Ranch?" asked Ruto to one guard.

"Err....I'm not sure" said the guard.

"Well...find out!" snapped Ruto.

In time the feast was prepared. The cooks did an excellent job by filling five long tables with all kinds of food. Ruto licks her lips and started to eat.
11121111222121111121212221122.title: The Feast begins

choices: Ruto could be a problem best to go with the Zoras right away
Speak to Malon first. It's not like Ruto will catch up anytime soon, right?
111211112221211111212122211221.content:

And it's not as if her legs were tiny either...Malon had imagined her legs being far too small to support her new massive weight but that didn't appear to be the case.
Once standing, Malon decided to take a single step. After all she would have to learn to walk with her country-sized weight. She took a step towards the Gerudo Valley. Her weight shifted, threatening to topple her over but she regained her balance. She did it! She took a single step. What now?

Hearing the "naying" of the horses in the coral, Malon turns to spot Zelda enjoying a peaceful moment with the group of animals. It seems for the moment that either Zelda is too far away or too wrapped up in her blissful mindset to even spot Malon despite how much the ranch girl now weighs.

A slightly devious smiles makes it way to the redhead's face, 'That means that Link must be alone somewhere.' she thought to herself, soon enough she comes to hear the soft sound of an ocarina. Turning the corner the enlarged ranch girl spots Link sitting, of all places, on the rooftop of her family's house cleaning and softly blowing into (to release any dust within) his ocarina.

Positioning herself closely under Link's location Malon calls out to the young blonde hero, wondering how he will take in her new fat form.
1112111122212111122212.title: Link's alone

choices: Link and Malon get a little more intimate
Zelda arrives to find the two of them embracing.
11121111222121111222122.content:
Link looked up from his Ocarina at the more than plus sized farmgirl just below him and he went into a mixture of shock and amazement.

He tumbled off the rooftop and landed in a crumpled heap on the ground. Luckily he was mostly unhurt, but the now worried Malon thudded over to him and hauled him off the ground with surprising ease, giving him a huge, all-enveloping hug, which planted Link's face conveniently into her very ample bosom. (Which thanks to Malon's head start, put Zelda's current pair to shame.)

Link was in pure bliss, he sighed in delight as he slowly sank into Malon's embrace and for a while, all thought's of Zelda left his head with Malon the sole center of attention in his mind.

Malon was in a similarly blissful state of mind, "I've done it, Link's my fairy boy now, tough luck, Zelda!" she thought, as she continued to hug the spellbound Link tighter into her flab.
11121111222121111222122.title: Best hug ever.

choices: Link agrees with Malon
Uh Oh! Zelda spotted the two kissing!
111211112221211112221221.content:
Link was never one to wonder if Heaven existed or was just a mere fable, but if anyone were to ask the young hero at this moment in time he would gladly state that he had found it.

The blonde male sighed contently as he felt Malon pull him deeper into her massiveness.

"Seems you like the position you're currently in, Fairy Boy." teased the redhead, a slight blush appearing on her puffy cheeks.

Tearing himself away from her grand chest, though a part of him complained for doing so, Link stares lazily into Malon's ocean blue eyes.

"I think I would be lying to you...and myself if I said no." Turning away for a moment the young man feels a small blush coming on.

"Well I'm glad you like the new me." "Sure do, but how did you gain so much so quickly?" he asked kindly.

"Sorry Fairy Boy but that's my secret..." "Was it by magic or something?" he interrupts her.

"No way, I don't know any magic, I just found a way to get really fat really fast, that's all." she confesses.

"But why?" "Do you have to ask Fairy Boy? Link...I did this for you. Because it makes us both happy." a happy smile spreading across Malon's cherry red lips.

"For me? Heh...you didn't have to Malon." "Oh yes I did...because I love you." Bringing her lips onto Link's Malon proceeds to kiss the young hero.

For a moment Link is in completely shock before giving into the sweetness of the redhead's kiss...

Seconds feel like eternity before the two break apart. Link staring deeply into Malon's eyes and vice versa.

"Wow you're a heck of a kisser, Malon." "Same to you, Link. Now why don't we head off somewhere...together." The redhead's blush reappears as she awaits Link's response.
111211112221211112221221.title: Malon's confession

choices: Don't worry about it, Malon's here and waiting!
Link's recalls what's nagging him- Zelda!
1112111122212111122212211.content:
The events following were somewhat hazy to Link in his euphoric haze, all he could cocnetrate on was the bountiful, redheaded beauty in front of him- with her ample curves and beautiful smile.

He faintly remebered the two of them heading hand-in-hand into the shade of a small barn full of haystacks and they started kissing just as passionately as they had before, then when he regained some semblance of self-consciousness he found himself with his upper tunic and hat lying on the floor nearby and the shreds of Malon's dress lying in a heap just next to them.

He focused back on the beauty before him, who was now clad in her ridiculously stretched undergarments which left so very little to the imagination in their current state.

Link grew worried- had they? Ah no, not yet, he was still partially clothed.

A faint nagging worry began to manifest in the corner of Link's mind, it sort of looked like Malon did right now but with lustrous blond hair, Link couldn't quite make the vision solid, it was almost like he was forgetting something, or someone.
1112111122212111122212211.title: Forgetting someone?

choices: The pair wonder off and Malon gives Link her decision
Zelda is waiting right outside the door!
11121111222121111222122111.content:
Yawning quietly, Link pulls himself upward into a sitting position (with Malon still lying beside him).

The vision once again came to his mind, shaking his head slightly Link peers upward at a tiny crack above the entrance way to the barn they were currently inside of.

"Oh I get it now, it wasn't a "vision". It was just the sunlight reflecting off Malon's hair giving her red locks a slightly orange/golden hue."

Yes the young hero while dashing and daring could be slightly dense when he had to be, and this was one of those times.

Shifting ever so slightly, Malon spots the now fully awake Link, "What's up, Fairy Boy, you ready for another kissing round?" she asks sweetly.

"Heh, thanks but I think I'll pass for the moment..." taking said moment Link proceeds to put his upper tonic and hat back on.

"And I still mean what I said earlier, you're one heck of a kisser, Malon." the statement bringing a blush to the redhead's plumped cheeks.

Before she can respond, Malon feels her stomach grumble, and because of the quiet atmosphere of the barn Link takes note of it as well.

Gasping slightly, Malon turns her field of vision away from the young hero, her cheeks clearly red in embarrassment. Suddenly she hears a slight chuckle, turning her attention back to Link she spots his extend hand, her clothes held within.

"Go ahead and put them on, then we can go get you something to eat...come to think of it I'll get a bite as well, since I haven't eaten anything all morning either."

Malon nods quietly as she puts on her dress (or what remains of it anyway) struggling slightly Malon giggles to herself.

"Looks like I'm going to need new attire...I doubt Daddy's going to let me run around in this anymore."

Together the young pair share a laugh. Afterwards Link extends his hand once more, "So what would milady Malon want to do first, get a change of clothes or grab a bite to eat?"

Malon can't help but laugh at Link's "properness" before hooking her rather thick arm around the one belonging to her "fairy boy".

"I don't know kind sir, I believe I'll decide upon exiting this barnyard." states Malon trying her best to copy Link's speech pattern from earlier, once again the two of them share a laugh as they exit into the outside world.
11121111222121111222122111.title: There's no vision it's just Malon

choices: Zelda reaches the milk first and drinks all of it
Malon reaches the milk first
1112111122212111122212212.content:
Before Link can answer, he spots Zelda over Malon's massive shoulder. Zelda had spotted the two kissing! With a yelp, Link pulls away from Malon when Zelda waddled her way over to the two. Zelda pulled Malon off of Link, and looked at the fattened farmgirl. The two girls glared at each other.

"Hey, what do you think you're doing?!" asked Malon. "me and Link were having a kiss"
"So I noticed" said Zelda. "and I also noticed that you have put on some weight. How did you do it?"

"Like I would tell you" said Malon.

Link was slowly backing away from the two plump girls in his life. Malon was slightly bigger than Zelda was.

"You better tell me because I'm your princess" growled Zelda.

"What? Are you jealous of me being bigger than you?" asked Malon in mock surprise.

"Of course I am" said Zelda. "I'm the princess of Hyrule...meaning, I HAVE to be the biggest woman in the land"

"A land of lard" said Malon. "hmmm....you gave me an execellent idea, Your Majesty! When I'm done, I'll be so fat that you'll look like a twig compared to me!"

"AHA!" yelled Zelda. "so...you got so fat from drinking some special milk you have at your ranch...give the milk to me...as the rightful ruler of Hyrule, I must cover it with my girth!"

"Let's see who gets to the milk first" said Malon, running for the remaining bottles of milk with Zelda right behind her.
1112111122212111122212212.title: Special Milk

choices: Link and Malon escape safely
Link and Malon are swallowed by Zelda's fat
11121111222121111222122121.content:
As her hefty self continued to run back to the barn, Malon was confident that her endurance and stamina would hold out for a much longer period than Zelda's, despite the fact that the redhead was slightly heavier than the princess.

But Fate has a funny way of sticking it to you at just the "right" moments as Malon heard Zelda giggle happily. Curious she turned her head as best she could to spot that the princess was no longer behind her. For a moment she was confused about the whole thing then it hit her like a Goron slamming straight into an opponent.

"She teleported!" yelled out a quite wide-eyed Malon, the truth was in the air as faint traces of Zelda's spell still lingered about.

"This...is bad! Very bad!"

Suddenly the ground began to shake tremendously, the center of the quake apparently coming from within the barnyard. It didn't take long for Malon to make a hasty retreat back in the direction to where Link was. She knew damn well what was coming in the next few moments and was not looking forward to it at all.

"Fairy Boy! Link! Let's get out of here Now!" she yelled at the top of her lungs as she desperately tried to reach the blonde hero.

"Malon what's wrong? Where's Zelda? Why is the ground shaking?" "There's no time Link we have to leave now or else!" she screamed as she got closer to him.

Link realized something terrible was on it's way when the ground shook even worse then before, noticing the worry on Malon's chubby face, and the fact that she had addressed him by his actual name and not the personal nickname she had bestowed upon him.

"Link let's go!" Malon took a hold of his thinner but more muscular arm, the poor girl was almost at her physical limit when she heard it. The sound she dreaded, the sound of the barn being crushed to pieces.

Raising like dough upward and outward was Princess Zelda, her attire struggled to clothe her as best it could as more and more blubber exited her already beyond bloated form.

Like the waves of an unstoppable flood her flab continued to expand covering all in it's path, her butt growing to cover everything behind her and her titanic belly overtaking everything and anything before her.

From her vantage point Zelda could barely make out the fleeing forms of Link and Malon, though her swelling breasts were starting to make that a bit of a hassle.

Zelda laughed proudly causing large waves to surge through her still expanding form. Having already covered the entire ranch area with her girth she snickered as her belly began to tear down what remained of Malon's home. Very soon she would outgrow the entire ranch complex.
11121111222121111222122121.title: To the victor go the spoils

choices: Link and Malon decide to have a talk with Zelda
Zelda's not done growing, Run!
111211112221211112221221211.content:
As Link and Malon continued to run as best they could, not wanting Zelda's flab to be the end of the two of them, Link turned his attention quickly toward Malon.

"You want to tell me why exactly is going on here? How is Zelda getting so...fat?!" he asked of her.

"Long story Fairy Boy and I think right now she would worry more about the present then the past."

The pair continued to the hear the distinctive sound of Malon's home being crushed to pieces by the princess' increasing amount of blubber. Not to the mention the sound of Zelda's laugher, apparently she was enjoying her handy work.

Knowing they had little time left before Zelda's girth would swallow them whole Link quickly pulled out his Longshot, grabbed a hold of Malon (told her to hang on), aimed for a tree just outside of the Ranch's entrance doors, and fired.

The weapon's chain went sailing through the air until it expertly hit it's mark. Without a second thought Link reeled himself and Malon away from harm's way.

After their narrow escape Link and Malon took a moment to catch their breaths. Malon was about to give her thanks when spotted Zelda continue to rise higher and higher into the sky as her bulk finally reduced the ranch to nothingness. The Princess was now the size of the barn and then some.

Malon would have a great amount of tears if she wasn't so exhausted. Link being the friend that he was gave her a bit of a quick hug before he began to think of what his next move should be.
111211112221211112221221211.title: Link and Malon escape safely

choices: Zelda continues to grow!
Zelda invites Link to give her a belly rub
1112111122212111122212212112.content:
As Link and Malon looked at the barn-sized Zelda, the two of them gasped. Zelda clearly wasn't done growing yet! With nothing more to do, Malon and Link rushed off to avoid being buried in Zelda's ever-growing gut. The two made it out of the Lon Lon Ranch complex just in time. Zelda took up the entire ranch complex, reducing everything under her into rubble. Zelda continued to laugh, slapping her own blubbery fat, sending great ripples all over like waves on the ocean. Zelda's belly clearly was the biggest part of her now, but her thighs and butt had gained height as well. Her legs were thicker than the barn she had just crushed. She had at least 30 chins and had to weigh over 500,000 pounds!

"Uhh....Malon" said Link. "how did Zelda got that fat?"

"Milk" said Malon. "a special batch of milk that was extra-fattening"

"I'd say super extra-fattening" said Link. Both Link and Malon were in Zelda's big shadow!

"Look how small you two are!" said Zelda, spotting Link and Malon. "you two look like little dumplings!"

"Uhh...don't call us that" said Malon.

"I thought the milk would make me fatter than this.." said Zelda, more to herself than to Link and Zelda.
1112111122212111122212212112.title: Ranch-sized

choices: Zelda's magic gives her mobility and she plans to squash Malon!
Before Zelda can do a thing she feels her body begin to grow again
11121111222121111222122121122.content:
While Zelda was obviously rather disappointed at her gaining stopping at only the size of the ranch she decided now would be as best as a time to flex her new weight around, so to speak...

"Link my dear hero." Zelda started off slowly a bit surprised with the huskier tone of her voice all thanks to her large number of chins.

"Would you do me a kindness and rub my vast royal belly?" Zelda asked with a smile almost hidden away by her puffy cheeks and sea of chins.

Malon would have fainted from the ridiculous request put forth by the multi-ton blonde if it weren't for the fact that she desire to strangle the immense princess that had just destroyed her home and place of business!

Hoping he'd do the right thing Malon slowly looked over at Link who was in a stun-induced silence. After a minute of possibly thinking things over Link finally spoke up.

"What? Uh...no, I um don't think so Zelda. Sorry but how can you ask me for a favor when you just destroyed Malon's home?"

Zelda was a tad bit taken back at Link's response. How could he side with the farm girl when he was her hero, he always did as she said and never questioned her (well okay maybe a few here and there but eventually came around) but now...

It was that farmgirl, Malon! Zelda figured it had to be her behind Link's sudden turn of loyalty not realizing that her demand was rather outrageous after what she had done, in her mind something had to be done about Malon before she lost Link forever.
11121111222121111222122121122.title: Zelda invites Link to give her a belly rub

choices: Zelda meets someone as big as her
What happens to Link and Malon?
111211112221211112221221212.content:
Zelda just kept on getting bigger and fatter and covering everything in her fat. Link and Malon were on the very outskirts of the complex of the ranch, where both were caught up and swallowed by Zelda's ever-expanding girth. Link still had the Zora tunic on, so he could breathe within Zelda's fat...but Malon wasn't so lucky. Link held on to Malon as hard as he could and asked Malon how did Zelda become so fat so quickly.
"We have a batch of extra-fattening milk" said Malon. "Zelda drank all of the milk....or so I guess"
Outside, Zelda was bigger than the entire Lon Lon Ranch complex and showed no signs of stopping! Zelda just smiled as her flab covered everything and everyone in its path. Zelda's belly was pointed right at the castle and the Market, and her butt was making its way towards Lake Hylia. In less than 10 minutes, every inch of Hyrule was covered by a giganticly fat Zelda. Even Death Mountain was covered by her flab! The entrie Castle Town ended up in her deep belly button, as well as the castle itself!
"I rule Hyrule and now I cover Hyrule!" said Zelda, who had at least 300 chins!
111211112221211112221221212.title: The Country of Zelda

choices: Zelda finds a way to steal the Fairy's power
The fairy catches on to Zelda's plan
1112111122212111122212212121.content:
"Well well aren't we something special." a voice giggled above the Hyrule-sized Zelda as a figure materialized into her view.

Zelda was suddenly taken a bit back by the sight of this gigantic fairy who had appeared many feet above her was the same country-spanning size as the princess.

"W...who are you?" Zelda muttered out, a look of a astonishment still on her face.

"Me? I'm the one and only Great Fairy of Fat. Like you, Zelda, I became obsess with growing ever larger so much so I had to be sealed away into a limitless dimension. Obviously I, as well as the other fairies, couldn't have me replace Hyrule with my girth...although it seems that ironically has now occurred despite our past actions. Add to that your tsunami of flab was also able to break my seal and release me. Now isn't that something." the beyond heavy fairy laughed gleefully.

"Now that I inadvertently released you is there something you want, Great Fairy?" asked Zelda.

"Oh nothing really...in fact I rather prefer it in my "house of confinement" than the actual world of the living."

Curious Zelda pressed on the matter, "Why is that? Could you tell me?"

"Oh that's simple, because as I said the dimension is limitless and allowed me to take full advantage of my mastery over my power of girth." Zelda stared at the fairy with a curious look.

"Being the Great Fairy of Fat means I have the power of girth at my disposal. It took many centuries but with it now mastered I can grow and grow and grow. You are big now Zelda but compared to the sizes I have reached in the past you are still so very small." the fairy giggled and failed to see the ping of jealously in Zelda's eyes.

'Small? How dare she mock me. No I deserve more, much more! Power of Girth hmm...I wonder..."

Zelda racked her brain trying to come up with a way to take the power from The Great Fairy of Fat and add it to her own. For the time-being she would lure the Fairy closer to her.

"Great Fairy if you would come a bit closer."

"Sure" the Fairy nodded happily as she approached Zelda.
1112111122212111122212212121.title: Zelda meets The Great Fairy of Fat

choices: Zelda successfully steals The Great Fairy of Fat's power
An outside interference makes itself known
11121111222121111222122121211.content:
'Never thought I'd have to use this ability but this is a fine way to test it out.' Zelda laughed mentally as the Fairy came within a few feet of the princess.

'She'll never see it coming...' as the fairy got even closer Zelda suddenly shot her arms outward, the first part was done.

"What?" questioned the fairy before she felt her body being binded together by some sort of magic seal. It took her less than a second to realize what had just occurred.

"Princess Zelda what is this about?!" yell the fairy, struggling in great deal to release the hold on her being.

"The Power of Girth I wish for it to be mine." explained Zelda with pure confidence. "Now be a good fairy and hold still while I extract it from you."

"What you can't. That's not possible!"

"Oh no, just sit back and watch then." with that said Zelda's fingertips lid up as a pulse of pain surged through The Great Fairy of Fat's body. Like a vacuum sucking in all around it the fairy's power exited her vastness and was being absorbed straight into an awaiting Zelda.

As the energy entered her Zelda felt an amazement like never before, 'So this is the power of a Great Fairy, it's amazing!' she thought as more and more of the fairy's power entered into her.

Though Zelda did notice as she continued to absorb more and more from The Great Fairy of Fat the fairy herself was shrinking in size.

"Soon you'll be the one that's small, former Fairy of Fat."
11121111222121111222122121211.title: Zelda wants The Power of Girth

choices: The mad princess has won. All that's left is to watch.
The Great Fairy has to atone, and stop Zelda.
111211112221211112221221212111.content:
Suddenly, there was a blinding flash of light...and as it faded, the Great Fairy of Fat was revealed to be just as thin as any other fairy one might find. Her powers and magicks, all gone. Her heart dropped, and a sense of dread filled her newly emaciated being as she looked down at Zelda.

The princess simply rested, her eyes closed, a blank look on her face. But then, a low sound could be heard, as a smile leaked across her face. Then, her mouth opened wide as mad laughter exploded forth from Zelda, her eyes opening and glowing with her new power.

Her already vast-beyond-comprehension body shook and quaked as her laughter rung and echoed across it.

"I did it!" the princess cried triumphantly "I have it! It's mine! The POWER is MINE!"
Her voice quivered, overcome with the emotion of triumph.
"Thank you Great Fairy of...well, not Fat anymore, I suppose? Hah! Just keep floating. You'll have a unique view of the new world that's about to unfold. Watch, and be helpless as you see me put your power to its proper, intended use. And to everyone else on this world...BOW!!!"

And with that, she finally put her power to use. With the sound of thunder as her power roared into effect, the princess spread across the world like an oil spill spreading across the surface of water. Miles every second engulfed and smother by her corpulence, as her body spread further and further, and to a lesser but still enormous degress, her fat continued to pile up beneath her, sending her soaring upwards higher into the heavens. The mad princess, absorbed entirely into endless vanity and the mad thrill of feeling entire countries pressed under her own flesh, kept on laughing, even after her throat hurt.

And the former Great Fairy of Fat, now the Great Fairy of Nothing, hung her head in shame and failure.
111211112221211112221221212111.title: Zelda, the All-powerful

choices: "Link!"
"M...Malon!"
1112111122212111122212212121111.content:
"Hahahaha!"

Zelda's cruel and cold laugher ran out far into the horizon as her immense form continued to grow and like wild fire continued to devour the planet beneath her.

Another fit of laugher exited her lips for she knew it wouldn't be long before she replaced the world with her continually expanding girth.

To be a planet all to her own it was a secret dream of Zelda's and in just a few more minutes it would become a reality but now because of the power she held within her (never mind she had blatantly stole said power) there was no real reason to stop at a the scale of a planet. No her fatness would become a Galactic Empire before all was said and done.

As if it wasn't already obvious it seem the greater Zelda grew the more The Great Fairy's power cracked away at the bloating princess' sanity. The former Great Fairy of Fat could only weep at the abuse of her power and at the loss of Princess Zelda's mind.

Then the moment finally came when Zelda at last felt every square inch of the planet blanketed by her incredible girth.

One last laugh of utter dominance rang out from her lips and the world-eclipsing woman did her best to make sure that all could hear her laugh of victory, that is to anyone that wasn't lost her in folds and perhaps could pick up sound through all her creamy blubber.

Afterwards Zelda eyed the great fairy, who hovered just above the newly made planet of fat, and without a word Zelda smiled devilishly at the fairy and it didn't take long for the winged spirit to realized what was going through the princess' head.

The Great Fairy wished she could do something to stop Zelda but at her current state it was darn near pointless. Yes she still had some of her normal standard power which all Great Fairies received but without time to plan it was useless and even then there was no way to say if she had anything left that could stop Zelda or strip her of the stolen power.

'If only there was someone left still willing to fight. Someone...anyone...'

The fairy thoughts were cut short as a flash of pure white light caught her and Zelda's attention. Squinting the fairy could barely make out the form of a human figure standing in the middle of the piercing heavenly light, Zelda as well had a tough time distinguishing who it was that had interrupted her.

As the light proceeded to thin away the individual began to step forward unmoved at the thought of stepping on countless tons of weight.

Now closer to the princess' head she and the great fairy were able to get a better look at the individual approaching them. The two women gasped as they instantly took notice of two key items being carried by this particular person.

A Hylian Shield and The Master Sword!

Wide-eyed Zelda was the first to collect herself and speak up.

"It's you. Why are you here?! How did you get here..."
1112111122212111122212212121111.title: Zelda's dominance is complete, or is it?

choices: Go up against Zelda herself.
Use what's left of her abilities to save and gather others to help.
1112111122212111122212212121112.content: Clenching her fists, the Great Fairy decides to...
1112111122212111122212212121112.title: The Great Fairy has to atone, and stop Zelda.

choices: The fairy gathers everyone in the Sacred Realm
The fairy can only find a few of the needed individuals
11121111222121111222122121211122.content:
The Great Fairy knew that she couldn't just stand by and watch the now corrupted princess engulf everything in existence with her ever growing form. But she also knew that her power was practically nothing now...then an idea came to her.

The others she could gather the Hero of Time, the remaining Sages and Great Fairies to find a way to strip her power away from Zelda. Then a sad thought occurred, if worse came to worse perhaps they could all somehow trap Zelda within the dimension where The Great Fairy was once sealed in.

Regardless the fairy had to make her move now as Zelda was already covering half of the planet with her girth and was showing no signs of slowing down.
11121111222121111222122121211122.title: Time for an emergency gathering!

choices: -your choice-
-your choice-
111211112221211112221221212111221.content:
With a flash of light, Link, Malon, and the Sages all found themselves in the Sacred Realm, the emaciated Great Fairy standing before them.

"Princess Zelda must be stopped." she stated gravely. She then explained, in detail, the situation, and the how and why of Zelda's tremendous growth, her waves of fat spilling across the world.

All those present, weary from the recent events, shook their heads, shocked that Princess Zelda could do this.

Finally, one of those present stepped forward with a plan. It was...
111211112221211112221221212111221.title: Emergency Meeting

choices: Stick with Link's team
Check up on Zelda's growth
1112111122212111122212212121112211.content:
"We do everything in our power to stop her."

"Saria?!" exclaimed Link.

Yes the child-like Sage was the boldest of them all.
