"We don't have time to waste here, Link. Zelda is growing larger by the second soon she will cover the entire planet with her very being. Of course that won't satisfy her and she'll wield herself even larger but before that happens we'll step in and strip her of the Great Fairy's power."

"I like your plan but how exactly are we to get it done?" questioned the Zora Princess, Ruto.

"Like I said Zelda will soon cover the planet meaning she will be far too fat to even react to the slightest movement. Honestly at that point I don't even know if she'd be able to feel anything outside of a comet smashing into her...in any case we use this to our advantage."

Link had to admit he was amused with the gleam in Saria's eyes. His best friend from childhood looked young but she was in no way naive. When she put her mind to something it would get done one way or another thought Link with a bit of a grin, all the while Saria continued with her explanation.

"In short Zelda's reactions will be shot once she reaches planetary status so we use that time to sneak around and sap the Great Fairy's power right out of her. As I pointed out chances are even if she realizes what we're doing she'll be far too fat to do anything about it."

"And that my friends is how we'll stop Zelda." stated Saria with a wide grin.

Her plan seem sound enough and all in attendance seem to agree with Saria. After a minute or so all were broken up into teams, a Great Fairy going with each one to help extract the fattening power from Zelda.

The Former Great Fairy of Fat going with Link's group which consisted of Malon, Saria, and himself something Ruto wasn't too happy with but put aside for the greater good of the mission.

A few minutes later the different teams were off each one heading to a different location on Zelda in hopes of shrinking the ever-growing princess.
1112111122212111122212212121112211.title: Saria has a plan

choices: The plan works!
something goes wrong
11121111222121111222122121211122112.content:
Zelda was still growing fatter and taller by the minute. The princess of Hyrule now covered half of the planet, and showed no signs of stopping anytime soon. Her new fat spread out like a fire in a cornfield. Zelda's head was slightly buried in her own fat and she had at least 40 chins or so. Zelda could feel that people were walking on her great big body, but she couldn't tell where they were. Country after country were being covered by Zelda's fat as the princess laughed madly. Nothing could stop Zelda's fat from spreading; even mountains were being covered by the ever-growing princess. As she grew ever bigger, the sensations of people walking on her vastness slowly disappeared and were gone.
Zelda knew that she covered the planet with her girth when she felt that her fat had ran into a soft wall; Zelda now replaced the planet with her fat! She grinned and looked into outer space. Soon, she'll be as big as the universe itself!


On the planet-sized Zelda, the tiny former Great Fairy of Fat was with Link's group. The group was somewhere on the expanse of Zelda's belly....near her chest, judging by the mountains on the horizon.
"Alright" said Link. "where do we begin by sapping Zelda's power?"
"In the middle of her belly" said the Great Fairy. "she shouldn't be able to feel us...and even if she did, she wouln't be able to stop us...that's the one great disadvantage about being as big as a planet...you can't even touch your body to scratch it"
"Yep" said Saria. "you know that better than anyone"
"Yes I do" said the Great Fairy. "I've been a LOT bigger than this..."
"You have?" asked Link.
"Of course" said the Fairy. "but I decided to return to the size of a country when I returned to this realm"
"Okay!" said Saria. "let's do this!"
11121111222121111222122121211122112.title: Planet of Blubber

choices: The Great Fairy of Fat wants to eat Zelda!
What's the favor?
11121111222121111222122121212.content:
The Great Fairy of Fat hovered above Zelda by a few feet. How did the fairy stay up with her immense weight? Must be the fairy's magic that's keeping her up. Zelda reached up with her two fat-thickened arms to the fairy and tried to steal the power of girth from the fairy with her sage powers.

"Oh...none of that, now" said the Fairy, wiggling her finger at Zelda. "can't go stealing my powers. The Power of Girth is mine alone"

"But I want to be even fatter than this" said Zelda. "I want to cover everything in my lovely fat"

"You don't want much, do ya?" asked the Fairy of Fat. "in that limitless dimension I was just in, I was at my fattest yet...but I slimmed down quite a lot when I returned to this dimension"

"Just how big were you then?" asked Zelda.

"I was in a limitless dimension" said the Fairy. "that should give you an idea. If I was that fat in this dimension, I would cover everything in my fat"

"Why did you slim down?" asked Zelda.

"As much fun as it's being that big, it can get lonely" said the Fairy. "just think about it; when you cover all things with your girth, you won't be able to talk to people or have fun with them"

"You're saying that being big and fat isn't good?" asked Zelda.

"Not at all" said the Fairy. "it can be fun at times. But it can get dull in a hurry"

"Can't you return to that limitless dimension again?" asked Zelda.

"Not unless all of the other Great Fairies seal me up again" said the Fairy. "it took all of the Great Fairies to seal me away in that dimension...including me. I don't think I want to return to that dimension anytime soon. That limitless dimension had no population other than me...so I want to stay here awhile and make some new friends"

"You'll smother all of your friend with your flab" said Zelda.

"You smothered all of Hyrule" shot back the Fairy. "now you want to smother everything in your flab"

"What's wrong with that?" asked Zelda.

"Nothing" said the Fairy, smiling. "if that's truly what you want to do"

"Then make me as fat as possible" said Zelda.

"I don't think so" said the Fairy.

"What?!" asked Zelda. "why?!"

"That's my decision" said the Fairy. "you can't have the Power of Girth, nor will I make you even fatter than you are....unless....you do me a favor"

"What's the favor?" asked Zelda.
11121111222121111222122121212.title: A Favor to ask

choices: Zelda goes through with the belly rub
While risky Zelda still tries to steal the Fairy's power
111211112221211112221221212122.content:
"What the favor, Great Fairy?" asked Zelda.

"Well it's nothing too hard. As I stated earlier the previous dimension where I was kept was rather...empty. So I'd like to ask you to give this hefty belly of mine a bit of a rub."

The Great Fairy of Fat smiled while Zelda's right eye twitched somewhat.

"What?! Do you know what you're asking me to do!" yelled Zelda, a tint of pride burning in her words.

The grand-sized fairy shrugged slightly, "Suit yourself, I don't see what the problem is. Or is because you are royalty. Come on it's just a simple rub." cooed the fairy.

Zelda mumbled something or other as she turned away for a second before turning her attention back to the Great Fairy of Fat.

"And if I do this then you'll help me?"

"Maybe..." Zelda wasn't fully convinced with the fairy's tone.

"So...how am I going to do this? You're as big as me." questioned Zelda.

"Simple, I remain afloat in the air while you use your magic to rub my vast belly from the ground. Oh and just so you know I'll personally punish you if you try to steal my power again at anytime during the belly rub." stated the fairy with a rather serious tone.

Zelda wasn't sure what she meant by that last part but the logical part of her brain told her not to push what shouldn't be pushed. So she simply nodded.

"Fine let's get this over with already."

"That's the spirit!" exclaimed the fairy with a giggle.

A moment later the biggest belly rub in all of history began.
111211112221211112221221212122.title: Rub the Fairy's belly

choices: The Belly rub continues
What happens to Link and Malon?
1112111122212111122212212121221.content:
Zelda didn't want to rub the belly of the Fairy, but she had no choice. After all, The Fairy did say that she would help Zelda reach her goal. Zelda used her magic to rub the country-sized Fairy's belly. The magic that Zelda was using to give the belly rub was for attacks, but she didn't harm the fattened Fairy due to her great girth. The Great Fairy of Fat purred while Zelda rubbed her huge belly.

"You're so good at this" said the Fairy. "is this your first time at this?"

"Yes, it is" said Zelda.

"Well, you're doing an excellent job" said the Fairy.

"So....how did I break your seal?" asked Zelda.

"The seal that locked me away are in the temples of Hyrule" said the Fairy. "no, it's not the Sage's Seal either. The Seal of Fat--that's what I call it--is in six pieces. Each of these pieces are in a secret room within each of the temples of Hyrule. When you grew to cover Hyrule, you also covered each of the temples in the ocean of your flab. The temples are not squished; they're protected by divine power from the three goddesses themsleves. However, the Seal of Fat has been weakened by your covering of Hyrule. The Divine Power that protects the temples from your flab has weakened the Seal of Fat in order to further protect the temples from being flattened. When the Seal of Fat was weakened, I decided to come back here. Now, the Seal of Fat is completely broken...but the Divine Power is still protecting the temples from being flattened"

Zelda instantly inmagined the six temples of Hyrule in a bubble within her vast belly...that thought made her giggle.

"I was happy in that dimension I was in" said the Fairy. "but I couldn't pass the chance of returning to the world of you skinny people"

"I'm not skinny" said Zelda.

"Like I said, I've reached sizes that make you small" said the Fairy. "microscopic in fact"

"Who made that dimension?"

"The three goddesses that created Hyrule" said the Fairy.

"What's it like?"

"Empty" said the Fairy. "a big vast void of nothing...which makes the perfect playground for me and my hefty belly"

"I've heard legends about you" said Zelda. "it was said that you ate people"

"I have eaten people before" said the Fairy. "but, when you're as big as I was, you don't get to taste anything that's microscopic to you...don't worry, I won't eat you, if that's what you're thinking....of course, if you want me to eat you, I'll be happy to"

"How long were you in that dimension?" asked Zelda.

"Nearly 2,000 years" said the Fairy. "it took me nearly that long to reach the size that I was"

"How big were you?" asked Zelda.

"You're a country of fat" said the Fairy. "I was a universe of fat" Here, the fairy had a dreamy look in her eye.
1112111122212111122212212121221.title: Big Belly Rub

choices: The Great Fairy shrinks Zelda down
The Great Fairy gobbles Zelda down
1112111122212111122212212121222.content:
As Zelda rubbed the Great Fairy of Fat's great big belly, she thought about what the Fairy said about punishing her. What kind of punishment? Zelda shook her head and decided to steal away the Great Fairy's Power of Girth from her, no matter the risk. Zelda was a princess, so giving a belly rub was beneth her! As she rubbed the belly of the Great Fairy, Zelda sucked some power from the fairy. The Fairy was enjoying the belly rub so much that she didn't notice what Zelda was doing....at least at first. It took the Great Fairy a mere 3 minutes to notice what Zelda was doing. In that time, Zelda felt a rush of power enter into her counrty-sized self. As the leader of the sages, Zelda's magic was powerful...but compared to that power, a Great Fairy's power was almost godlike. Zelda had a minor sensory overload as she was sucking power from the Great Fairy.


"Hey!" said the Great Fairy, when she noticed what Zelda was doing. The Great Fairy pulled away from Zelda. "what did I just say? Now you have to be punished. But how to punish you....?" As she spoke, Zelda found that she couldn't move...she could hardly move before, but now she couldn't even move a muscle! The Great Fairy must've frozen her!

"I could shrink you down and crush you with my girth" said the Fairy. "or I could eat you...I haven't eaten in a long time, you know. That's what the dimension I was in lacked; food. Strictly speaking, I don't have to eat in order to live...but I do enjoy stuffing my face with food...or with fat princess's"

"Great Fairy...forgive me..." said Zelda.

"I'm sure I'll forgive you eventually" said the Fairy. "but you have punished for your foolishness. Let's see...how to punish you...."
1112111122212111122212212121222.title: Punishment

choices: The fairy descends and Zelda puts her spell into action
Link and Malon surprisingly show up!
11121111222121111222122121212221.content:
Zelda certainly didn't want to be eaten and hoped that the fairy was thinking the same.

"I could very well eat here and now, princess..." a bead of sweat ran down Zelda's face, "But if I did that I may gobble up Hyrule in the process and well I don't really feel like eating the very country I wanted to explore for a while."

While she couldn't move Zelda did let out a mental cheer, thankful she wouldn't be a meal but of course she wasn't out of the doghouse just yet.

"So that means I get to flatten you with my girth!" the fairy smiled as she watched from above.

"Now that I think about it I wouldn't even have to shrink you just expand myself to ridiculous lengths and sit my beyond planetary butt right on top of you...but that would cause more harm than good so I'll just go with shrinking you down then sitting atop of you. Maybe then you'll learn not to tamper with powers far beyond your own."

If she could speak Zelda would have let out a growl of frustration. Not only was she at the mercy of the fatten fairy but on top of that the Great Fairy had the gull to lecture her as if she were some stupid child. But knowing the position she was in Zelda decided to let the Fairy do her thing perhaps if even by chance an opportunity of good fortune would present itself.

Just as she said The Great Fairy of Fat soon began to shrink Zelda down, a feeling that did not sit well with the princess. A few minutes later Hyrule was free from the girth of Zelda, who stood where the now destroyed Lon Lon Ranch previously was and had lost all of her extra weight leaving her back at half a ton.

The Great Fairy simply laughed at the now much thinner Zelda, who glared back at the fairy...an action that only registered in her brain several seconds after she had done it.

Was it possible could she move again? Zelda quickly blinked a few times and moved her fat fingers and toes quickly so as not to be caught by the fairy. It was true she could move again and that meant she could make use of her magical arsenal.

"Now any last words or begging you might want to get to before I squish you flat?" asked the fairy with a bit of a smirk.

'Yeah when this is all through your power is going to be mine!' she thought but decided to play the role of the helpless beggar and go with "No please Great Fairy of Fat, please forgive this reckless fool of a princess."

Zelda was good at her role and almost convinced the fairy to think otherwise.

"Good try but I'm afraid it's not enough. Hope you like the feel of all my flab!"

While she looked on in worry, mentally Zelda prepared herself to sap the power straight out of the Great Fairy the moment the two made contact.
11121111222121111222122121212221.title: The Great Fairy shrinks Zelda down

choices: Zelda's spell works!  She's sapping the power from the Great Fairy!
The spell doesn't work
111211112221211112221221212122212.content:
As Zelda was about to unlease her spell, and as the Great Fairy was slowly getting lower to flatten Zelda....something happened that was truly unexpected; Link and Malon showed up! The two were dumped out of Zelda's flab when she was shrank down by the now descending fairy. The two were slightly out of breath. It was Link who noticed that a great shadow was covering the countryside, and he looked up at the Great Fairy of Fat...and Malon saw the fairy too.
"Zelda!" yelled Link. "what's happening?!"
Zelda didn't answer, she just kept right on preparing her spell to sap the power of the Great Fairy. When the two made contact, the spell would take effect and it'll be all over for the Great Fairy. Link and Malon went over to the half of ton Zelda.
"Zelda, who's that?" asked Link.
"And why is she gonna flatten us with her flab?" asked Malon.
"Don't bother me" said Zelda. "I'm preparing a spell"
"You think a spell is gonna take care of that?" asked Link, pointing up at the Great Fairy. The Great Fairy was looking at the three little people all gathered around and smiling.


"Zelda! We gotta out of here..." said Malon.
"And go where?" asked Link. "whoever the newcomer is, she's as big as Hyrule!"
"Not for long..." said Zelda.
The Great Fairy of Fat was just ten feet above the ground. She had been descending slowly until then.
"Body slam!"
With that, The Great Fairy of Fat fell the ten feet to the ground and caused one of the biggest earthquakes in the history of Hyrule! Again, Hyrule was covered by a country-sized person; the Great Fairy of Fat!
"Behold, the new country of fat" said the Great Fairy, patting her huge belly. "I'm gonna enjoy being this size for a while"
111211112221211112221221212122212.title: Body Slam

choices: The fairy tries to talk some sense into Zelda
Someone tries to steal the orb from Zelda's grasp
1112111122212111122212212121222121.content:
Moments before the Great Fairy could make impact the final preparations of Zelda's spell became complete. As the fairy's flab was a split-second away from coming down upon Hyrule Zelda made her move and embedded her magic-tinted hands deep into the blubber of the Fairy.

The spell wasted no time taking affect and once again Zelda nearly lost herself to the overflowing feeling coming not only from the Great Fairy's power but as said power entered her very being. Zelda had long forgotten about Link and Malon and her sole focus became sapping more and more of the Fairy's Power of Girth.

A laugh of arrogance escaped the princess' lips as she noticed that not only was she stripping the fairy of her power but of her size as well, meanwhile Zelda herself seem to be growing fatter once again.

Five minutes passed until Great Fairy, who was happily slapping her massive belly, came to notice a bit of a change in her view as well as her power and as more time passed she came to realize what was occurring to her.

"Impossible...is she actually..." the fairy didn't end her words as she continued to shrink in size (now resembling more the size of a normal Great Fairy).

"No...my lovely fat! How?"

As if to answer her question, the ground rumbled slightly before the former fat fairy landed on what appeared to be a land of creamy dough. A chuckle then pierced the air as the Great Fairy turned to see Zelda in all her country-filling glory once more.

Zelda chuckled once more nearly tossing the fairy off of her as the waves of flab made their rounds across her vast belly and beyond. Once the fairy had stable footing once more she noticed a golden sphere Zelda had in her right hand.

"Great Fairy I'm sure you can hear me." Zelda's tone was pure over-confidence, "As you can see being the resourceful lady that I am I have not only managed to regain my former glory but taken the remainder of your power and housed it away within this orb." Zelda explained doing her best to hold the magical orb close to her grand-sized chest.

"I told you I wanted The Power of Girth and now I have it. The only thing left is to bind it to my body. Then and only then will my dream come true. I Zelda will blanket it all with my heavenly fat!"

The fairy was convinced the overdose of power was corrupting Zelda to the point of madness.
1112111122212111122212212121222121.title: Zelda steals The Great Fairy of Fat's power

choices: Zelda gives back the power to the Great Fairy
Zelda's lust for power is too much to give away the power
11121111222121111222122121212221211.content:
The Great Fairies of Hyrule had more power then all seven of the Sages combined. Nobody had stolen the power of a Great Fairy before, until now. That kind of power would drive anybody insane, and they would abuse the power. It seemed clear that Zelda was going mad from the power, and the former Great Fairy of Fat had to try anything to prevent Zelda from absorbing all her power. There was a slim chance that the Great Fairy could take some sense to the corrupted Zelda...it was worth a shot.

"Zelda, if you blanket everything with your fat, you'll squish Link and all of us" said the Great Fairy. "do you really want that? I didn't want to squish everything in my fat when I was experimenting with my size all those years ago. I asked the three goddesses to take me somewhere where I can get as big as I wanted to and not kill anyone; to that end, the three goddesses made for me a new dimension. That dimension was empty and infinite and I enjoyed being as fat as I can get. Soon....I got very lonely being the only person in that dimension. You get awfully lonely when you're fatter than several universes. It soon became clear to me that being that fat was a curse and not a blessing. Please don't do this, Princess of Hyrule. You may regret your decision one day"

The orb that contained the Great Fairy's power was in Zelda's hand and she paused when she heard the speech of the former Fairy of Fat. Her lust for power seem to slowly go away, and Zelda began lowering her hand that contained the orb.

"My power is too much for you...or any mortal to have" said the former Great Fairy of Fat. "it'll corrupt you. I beg you, bring my power back to me"
11121111222121111222122121212221211.title: Great Fairy's Speech

choices: The fairy agrees but retrieves her power from Zelda first
The fairy agrees and retrieves her power later from Zelda
111211112221211112221221212122212111.content:
After hearing the Great Fairy's words Zelda stared downward at the orb of power that she could barely make out over the sea of fat that was her body.

Silently she wondered if at this point she was no better then Ganondorf who had eclipsed the land with his dark desires during his reign of terror moons ago. Was she ironically his equal by blanketing the land with her own girth?

Despite how much of a dreamer she was Zelda personally hated the sudden idea of her being the same as that accursed man. So with a heavy sigh, one that caused waves of blubber to jiggle across her immense form, she turned her vision as best she could toward the Great Fairy.

"I understand. I'll give you back your power...but before I do..." for a mere moment the former fairy of fat believed that she was being swerved by Zelda.

"But...before I do" Zelda repeated, "Can I ask you a favor?"

The great fairy blinked in surprise, "Of course. What is it?"

"I..I want to see this dimension that you were sealed away in." stated Zelda in a completely serious tone.

"You what? Are you sure?"

Zelda nodded almost instantly, her multiple chins crashing into the soft tons of blubber surrounding her face.

"You really are serious about this dream of yours aren't you?"

"Yes. I still want to feel what's it's like to truly be enormous. But I understand if I do that in this plane I'll crush everything under my countless layers of fat. So I ask you let me at least for a day...a week at most live out my most secret of fantasies and grow to my heart's content inside that limitless dimension. Do we have a deal?"
111211112221211112221221212122212111.title: Zelda's deal with the Great Fairy

choices: Stay with Zelda
Switch back to Link, Malon, and the Great Fairy of Fat
1112111122212111122212212121222121111.content:
"We have a deal" said The Fairy. "however...I got that back" and she pointed to the orb of power in Zelda's fat filled hand. The orb itself was tiny, but it held immense power. Zelda nodded slowly and handed over the power back to the Fairy, where she ate the orb in order to restore her full power. The Fairy smiled and pointed a finger at Zelda.
"I'm putting a fattening spell on you" said The Fairy of Fat. "it'll activate once you're in the dimension I was sealed away in. You're staying for a week and I just might join you for a little fun. But for now, I'm staying here in Hyrule to have fun here"
"As long as you don't squish anybody" said Zelda.
"I would never do that" laughed the Fairy, and snapped her fingers. Instantly, the fattened Zelda was gone. Link and Malon had watched what had happened and was standing near the Great Fairy of Fat somewhere on Hyrule Field. The Fairy looked around to see Malon and Link watching her.
"Would you two like to me my fountain?" asked the Fairy.
"You have a fountain?" asked Malon.
"Of course" giggled the Fairy of Fat. "all Great Fairies have their fountains. Even I did"
"Where is it?" asked Link.
"In a cave at the very bottom of Gerudo Canyon" said the Fairy of Fat.
Gerudo Canyon seperated Gerudo Valley from the rest of Hyrule. The Canyon was more than a mile deep in certain places...and even deeper if you ventured outside of Hyrule to parts unknown. Nobody really knew what lay beyond the lands of Hyrule; Some people say that the goddesses that made Hyrule made their home somewhere in the wilderness beyond Hyrule, but Link didn't believe those stories. The Great Fairy of Fat told Link and Malon that the cave that her fountain was in was nearly 4 miles down in the canyon.
"Four miles?!" asked Malon and Link in shock.
"Don't worry" said the Fairy. "we'll make it if we jump"
"Jump for 4 miles?!" asked Malon. "that would kill us!"
"That's why I'm going to do the jumping first" said the Fairy. "I'll catch you in my fat. Soft landing, you know"
"And why would we want to go to your fountain?" asked Link. "I've been to the other Great Fairy Fountains...they all look the same"
"Ah" said the Fairy of Fat. "my fountain is different, you see"
"How different?" asked Link.
"Come and find out" said the Fairy, and she started walking towards Gerudo Valley. Malon and Link shrugged at each other and followed the Fairy, who looked to have gained 2,000 pounds in an instant.



Zelda popped into what looked like the Temple of Light; she was in some sort of chamber in any case. Zelda looked around and noticed a door that led to the outside. Zelda left the temple, to discover that she was in a white void. There was nothing under her feet, and yet she didn't fall. Sure enough, as soon as she exited the temple, she started to gain weight steadily. She looked back at the temple to discover that the temple had vanished.
"Welcome, Zelda" said a voice that echoed through the void.
"Who's that?" asked Zelda. "I thought this dimension was empty"
"It is" said the voice.
"Then who are you?"
"Get fat enough and find out" chuckled the voice.
1112111122212111122212212121222121111.title: The Endless Dimension

choices: Stick with Link and Malon
Whats happening to Zelda
11121111222121111222122121212221211112.content:
And so Link, Malon and the Great Fairy of fat made thier journey to the Guerdo Canyon. The Great Fairy decided that it would be easier for everyone if Link and Malon lay on her massive belly while she levitated across Hyrule to the canyon.

Malon layed down next to Link causing her belly to slightly engulf him. "Hey Link, how do you think the Great Fairy of Fat's Fountain will be like?". Link rested his head on Malon's stomach and sighed happily "I don't know but I bet it will be amazing to experience" "Actually, you two are the first Hylians to ever enter my fountain" The Great Fairy of Fat said excitedly. "Wow, really?" Malon said . "Yes, thats why I appeared before the people all around Hyrule. My fountain is nearly impossible to find, so I go out to bring people to my fountain to visit. I've had Zoras, Dekus, Kokiris and even some friendly talking monsters visit my fountain but not Hylians because all the Hylians I met were frightened by my powers and my jiggly girth. So I roamed the land searching for Hylians I can have fun and hang out with . . . and also to eat. *giggle!!!*". "Uhhh, have you ever digested the people you eat?" Link said nervously. "Welll yes, but only evil people, many people are living in my stomach right now." The Great Fairy of Fat said happily as she patted her stomach causing jiggles to go across her belly.

When they finally got there, the Great Fairy levitated them off her belly and jumped into what seemed like an endless aybss of darkness. Link put on his golden gauntlets and lifted Malon into his arms. Malon looked at him lovingly. "Link . . . . . lets go!". "Alright, hold on tight Malon!!!" Link said and with that, together they jumped into the canyon of darkness.
11121111222121111222122121212221211112.title: The Journey to Gerudo Canyon

choices: Switch to Zelda
Stay with Link and Malon
111211112221211112221221212122212111121.content:
The leap atop from Gerudo Canyon lasted for several minutes. The canyon itself was quite dark, with sunlight hardly coming down to it. Link and Malon fell like rocks. Link managed to keep his grip on Malon, although it was no easy task. Link glanced downwards and saw nothing but deep darkness, making him worry that the Fairy had sent them to their death. However, after falling for two solid minutes, Link saw light at the bottom of the canyon. The light seem to come from several torches on the canyon walls, and there was something else at the bottom; a narrow ledge that was beside a sizable river. At the last moment, Link saw what could only be the Great Fairy's belly and they landed on it, nearing sinking right into the flab. The Great Fairy giggled and lifted Link and Malon off her tummy.
"My fountain is half a mile in that direction" said the Great Fairy, pointing to a path that was lighted by the torches. The three started to walk in that direction.
"So....you have people living in your stomach?" asked Malon to the Great Fairy.
"Yep" said the Great Fairy. "I'm not gonna tell you how many though"
"Why would you eat people?" asked Link.
"They're tasty" said the Great Fairy. "and its fun. I only digest wicked people. I tried to eat Ganondorf during his reign, but he had powerful magic behind him at that time....he managed to evade being my snack"
They came to the entrance of a cave mouth. The opening of the cave was quite normal-looking, and a thin stream of the river went right into the cave.
"Here it is" said the Great Fairy.
The cave was a natural one as well as an old one. They walked along a cavern that looked like it could contain Hyrule Castle itself.
"When you shrink down....do the people inside you change size as well?" asked Malon.
"Nope" said the Great Fairy. "they remain the same size. My stomach is much bigger on the inside, you see"
"How can that be possible?" asked Link.
"By magic" said the Fairy.
They then entered a chamber so wide and vast that the whole of Hyrule could've fit inside it! It did look like the other Great Fairy Fountains that Link had been to, but on a larger scale. The fountain itself was the size of Hyrule Field, and there was the mark of the triforce in front of the fountain. The triforce mark was tiny.
"Whoah" said Link, looking around.
"Everyone says that" said the Fairy, who smiled.
111211112221211112221221212122212111121.title: Great Fairy of Fat's Fountain

choices: It's Nabooru!
It's Someone else
11121111222121111222122121212221212.content:
The former Great Fairy of Fat watched in horror as Zelda was about to bind the golden orb with her body. Such great magic would corrupt anyone (save for a Great Fairy), and it seemed Zelda was mad with power. The golden orb came closer and closer to Zelda's flab. The Great Fairy was too far away to steal back the orb from Zelda.
That's when someone appeared in a flash of light right beside the golden orb when it was almost absorbed by Zelda. The someone was a rather short person with a green tunic on; it was Saria!
As the Sage of the Forest, Saria had the power to leave the forest unlike the other Kokiri children. Saria grabbed the golden orb of light, which was much bigger than her, and swatted it toward the former Great Fairy of Fat. The Great Fairy rushed forward, hoping to reclaim all of her magic (and all her lovely blubber along with it). Zelda noticed what happened and swatted at Saria, who had vanished from where she was, Zelda then made to grab the golden orb, but Saria appeared again and swatted the orb even further away from the grand-sized Zelda's grasp. The orb was heading for the Great Fairy, and she was running towards it too. Zelda then used her magic to halt the golden orb in its tracks and began to pull it back into her hands.
Saria appeared again and tried to swat the orb away from Zelda, but the orb held firm and didn't move.
"Did you really think you could best me in magic, Saria?" cackled Zelda with a mad gleam in her eye. "I'm the leader of the Sages of Hyrule...nobody's magic is stronger than mine! Now, I'll become a goddess of fat and you'll be trapped within my heavenly flab!" Zelda was about to bind the orb to her body, when someone else appeared in a flash of light; it was Link! Malon was with him.
"Zelda, the Great Fairy of Wisdom has told me that the magical power you have in your hands is corrupting you to the point of madness" said Link. "I can't allow you to continue your dream"
"What are you gonna do, you puny little man??" asked Zelda.
"Not me" said Link. "her!"
Zelda looked in time to see the Great Fairy of Wisdom swat the golden orb off of her hand. "Sister, take it!" The former Great Fairy of Fat rushed to regain her magical power. Zelda made to grab the golden orb, but somebody else appeared to help.
11121111222121111222122121212221212.title: Someone tries to steal the orb from Zelda's...

choices: Saria successfully grabs the golden orb
Zelda takes a hold of the orb before Saria can
111211112221211112221221212122212122.content:
All seemed lost as it appeared that Zelda had once again gotten a hold of the orb containing the Great Fairy of Fat's power but the princess' victory was not to be just yet as she opened her chunky hand and spotted Darunia sacred leader of the Gorons stand upright from his "ball" position.

"Darunia?!" yelled Zelda in rage. "Where did you come from?"

"My honorable brother Link gave me a hand in teleporting here. And it seems I arrived just in time." a mighty chuckle escaped his stone-hard lips.

Zelda had heard enough and made a move to toss the Goron leader aside but before she could do so he rolled away landing perfectly on the soft surface below.

Lucky for Zelda Darunia's surprise interference hadn't bought the Great Fairy of Fat too much time, the fairy had just gotten a hold of the golden orb, scanning for the orb Zelda spotted it and the Great Fairy. Just as the fairy was going to regain her former power Zelda quickly and expertly aimed and shot it away using a small sample of the spell Din's Fire.

The fairy cried out in displeasure as Zelda smirked and followed the orb fly into the air. The princess wasted no time in aligning her aim so she could use her magic to reel in the orb like she did once before.

Malon noticed this and alerted Link who then readied the Longshot but before he could fire he and Malon barely took notice of Saria who zoomed past them.

Saria was widely known as the "weakest" of the sages as far as power went but one thing that many didn't know was how fast the green-haired girl could move when she had to. She had showcased this earlier when she played "keep away" with Zelda and was determined to stop the princess from taking hold of the golden orb.

With a quick boost into the air from Darunia Saria aimed herself straight for the orb that was coming back down rather quickly. Reaching out the girl knew she had only one chance to claim a hold of the falling orb.
111211112221211112221221212122212122.title: Darunia's appearance and Saria's quick thinking

choices: The Fairy grows to beyond planetary size and sits on Zelda...and the world
The Fairy makes Zelda shrink down to her former weight
1112111122212111122212212121222121221.content:
Zelda covered Hyrule, which made her slow to act. Even if she wasn't covering all of Hyrule, she'd be hard-pressed to be faster than the speedy Saria. Saria reached out her hand and grabbed the golden orb that contained the Great Fairy of Fat's power. The Great Fairy of Fat was still on her way towards Saria. Saria ran toward the approaching Fairy of Fat. Link and Darunia (along with Malon and Nabooru) distracted Zelda from reclaiming the golden orb by attacking her....they didn't hurt her, but they were very distracting.
The former Great Fairy of Fat was almost at Saria when Zelda shot a magical bolt at the Fairy. The Great Fairy barely dodged it, and continued to run towards the ever-approaching Saria. As the Fairy got closer to Saria, she noticed that the youngest Sage had a hungry look in her eyes....it seemed that the orb in her hands was slowly corrupting her as well...although, she still had the sense not to absorb the orb. When Saria was within 20 feet from the Fairy, she threw the golden orb at the Fairy. The Fairy caught the golden orb. She then ate the golden orb, and regained her magical strength. The Great Fairy of Fat smiled as she grew fatter and fatter.
1112111122212111122212212121222121221.title: Her Power is back

choices: The pair end up inside Hyrule Castle Town
The pair end up at top of Zelda's massive belly
1112111122212111122212212122.content:
Buried beneath what seemed to be an endless amount of fat rolls, Link struggled to keep himself and Malon from sinking in any deeper. Speaking of Malon the ranch-girl was beginning to lose consciousness for unlike Link she had no means of "underwater" protection.

"Link..." she mumbled, the young hero thinking of a way to save the swelled redhead from meeting her maker so to speak. Suddenly he remembered that his hat was made of the same cloth as his tonic, was it possible it could save Malon's life if he placed upon her fiery hair? Link didn't have an answer but if he didn't do something fast he was going to lose her for good.

In one swift motion he removed the cap from at top of his head and placed it firmly upon Malon's head.

'Please let this work.' he begged the Goddesses above.

"Malon. Come on Malon, stay with me. Malon!"

After a few seconds Malon shifted slightly, her big belly and breasts bumping accidentally into Link's smaller form.

"Link...Fairy Boy?" Her eyes fluttered openly shortly afterwards and met with Link's smiling face.

"Glad to see you're okay." "I'm now...thank you, Fairy Boy." she smiled, a bit of crimson lighting up her chubby cheeks.

"Yeah well it's no problem, and um...Malon you were mentioning something about fattening milk..." Malon placed a single finger upon his lips before he could go any further.

"Fairy Boy I really think we should get out of here first before anything else."

Link blinked before nodding in agreement, for a moment he had forgotten where they were. Searching through his pockets Link came to find the crystal that allowed use of Farore's Wind, in his haste earlier he had momentarily forgotten that he was carrying it on his person.

"This should help, just hang on to me okay." Malon didn't have to be told twice as she hugged her heavy-set form onto Link, much like earlier almost engulfing him into her own flab though the blonde hero didn't seem to mind much if at all.

But because of this his concentration was thrown off by just a tad, a moment later the two disappeared in a flash.
1112111122212111122212212122.title: Back with Link and Malon

choices: Stay here
Try to get onto Zelda's massive belly
11121111222121111222122121221.content:
Link and Malon found themsleves inside Hyrule Castle Town. Link and Malon looked around and saw that people were in the town, as well as themsleves. Link looked up to see that the town (and the castle) were in a very wide canyon. The opening of the canyon was perhaps 5000 feet above the town, and the blue sky could be seen. The canyon was big enough to fit the entire Castle Town, the castle itself, and even Kakariko Village!
"We must be in Zelda's belly button!" cried Malon in shock and awe.
"I would say so" said Link.
"Well, at least I won't suffocate here" said Malon.
"You said something about extra-fattening milk" said Link.
"Yep" said Malon. "but I didn't expect her to be this big...maybe she enchanced the milk somehow?"
"Well...shall we try to make it onto her belly?" asked Link. "or...should we stay here"
11121111222121111222122121221.title: Belly Button Canyon

choices: Meanwhile.....
Link and Malon get to Zelda's head
11121111222121111222122121222.content:
A moment later, Link and Malon found themsleves on top of Zelda's massive belly. Link and Malon looked all around and saw nothing but a seemingly endless landscape of fat and nothing much else. The two didn't even see Zelda's head, so they had no idea where they were on Zelda's belly. The pair just started to walk in a random direction, hoping to find Zelda's head. Link and Malon's feet both sunk a bit into Zelda's miles of flab every time they took a step.
"Zelda's the size of Hyrule" said Malon. "how can we find her head?"
"I don't know" said Link.
Suddenly, there was a flash of light in front of the pair and one of the Great Fairies appeared. Great Fairies are the leaders of all fairies, and much bigger than the normal fairy. The Great Fairy had red hair, was about 6 feet tall, and had a pair of massive breasts.
"Hi there!" said the fairy. "well, I guess Zelda really let herself go" here, she laughed.
"What are you doing here?" asked Link.
"Like everyone else, I was swallowed up by Zelda and her miles of fat" said the fairy. "everyone should be safe now...I casted a spell so that people can still breathe under all that fat....you should see the belly button!"
The Great Fairy was skinny.
"Thank goodness that there's no Fairy of Fat..." muttered Malon.
"Actually. there is" said the fairy. "she's hidden herself somewhere in Hyrule....most likely somewhere in Zelda's blubber"
"Well, right now, we want to find Zelda's head so we can talk to her" said Link.
"Just keep going the direction you were going....and you'll find Zelda's head in five days"
"Five days?!" asked Malon and Link.
"Zelda covers all of Hyrule" said the fairy. "so...it'll take days to get anywhere on Zelda"
11121111222121111222122121222.title: Visit from the Great Fairy

choices: Zelda and the Fairy make contact with one another
Check up on Link and Malon
111211112221211112221221212221.content:
Meanwhile Zelda continued to relax and take in the amazing feeling of having a body the size of her country. Sighing softly Zelda mentally giggles at the ripples formed in her vastness with even the slightest breath, the princess simply couldn't believe how massive she had become from drinking all of that special milk.

Of course she tweaked with the milk's formula once she saw that the contents of the bottles did in fact increase her weight. At 10x or so the normal rate per bottle it was no wonder that Zelda not only outgrew Lon Lon Ranch but all of Hyrule before she was done expanding.

The feeling of being so fat was almost intoxicating to Zelda, as was the gaining. She remembered laughing and giggling as everything gave up without so much as a fight to her titanic girth.

But that was only natural considering it was all part of her dream to become as fat as possible. Hyrule was now beneath her and the behemoth of a princess only felt the need to grow ever larger. She'd stretch out as far as possible like an Empire, an Empire tailor made from her own fat.

But before that could occur Zelda needed way to make it occur and as far as she knew all of the fattening milk had been exhausted ironically thanks to her excessive drinking. Then it came to her.

'The Great Fairy of Fat!' she thought with glee, of course said fairy was said to be just a myth and no one living or dead has ever laid eyes upon her. But Zelda was willing to look pass that and hope she could use her Sage abilities to contact the mystical figure.

Closing her eyes Zelda attempted to reach The Great Fairy of Fat...
111211112221211112221221212221.title: Zelda wants to be bigger

choices: Death Mountain
It's Somewhere else
1112111122212111122212212122211.content:
The Great Fairy of Fat was an old myth. The myth told of a Great Fairy that liked to eat people, as well as everything else. This Fat Fairy ate everything that was in her path, and she grew fat and round. The Great Fairy of Fat got so big that she outgrew the entire world, and soon the universe. According to the myth, the universe is actually inside the belly button of the Fairy of Fat! The myth was supposed to be just that; a myth, a made-up story to entertain people. Zelda really didn't believe the myth, but it was worth a shot to contact her if she--Zelda--wanted to be even bigger. As a Sage, Zelda could talk to someone telepathically.

[Great Fairy of Fat, can you hear me?]

There was no reponse.

[Great Fairy of Fat, can you hear me?]


[Hello Princess Zelda. I am the Great Fairy of Fat] the voice giggled. [looks like you like being fat]

[Yes I do] said Zelda. [I want to be even bigger now...I want to cover everything in my flab]

[You don't want much, do you?]

[Can you help me get bigger?] asked Zelda.

[Of course I can] said the fairy of fat. [there's a speical item called the Rod of Fattening that you can use to become as fat as you want]

[And where is this Rod of Fattening?]
1112111122212111122212212122211.title: Rod of Fattening

choices: Ask if Great Fairy could bring the rod to her
Contact Nabooru and ask for her help
11121111222121111222122121222112.content:
[To answer your question, it was hidden away in the desert temple belonging to the Gerudo. Long story short Ganondorf found it during one of his many travels and as you can imagine had no real use for such an item thus sealed it away because of it's supposed "uselessness". But being the creator of the rod I shall always know where it is housed.]

After the Great Fairy's explanation Zelda took a moment to take it all in.

[So the Rod of Fattening is in the Spirit Temple, correct?]

[Yes that is correct.] A pause came before Zelda responded.

[Well now that I know where it is, I must have it...but it may be rather difficult to acquire given my tremendous weight.] stated Zelda rather frankly.

[Yes I suppose being the size of a country would effectively destroy one's mobility. But you're a resourceful woman aren't you, Zelda? I'm sure you can come up with an idea of sorts.] The Fairy teased in a joking but assuring tone.

Once again Zelda paused to take in the Fairy's words. It was true at her size Zelda herself couldn't do much but there had to be a way to gain access to that Rod of Fattening.
11121111222121111222122121222112.title: The desert's hidden treasure

choices: Zelda makes contact with Link and ask him to get the Rod
Nabooru was lying; she has the Rod!
111211112221211112221221212221122.content:
Zelda thought for a minute on what to do. If Link was here, Zelda would've sent the Hero of Time to go get the Rod of Fattenig. Link was probably somewhere in her flab...but he had the Zora's Tunic with him, so Zelda wasn't really worried about Link. Then, Zelda thought about what the Fairy had just said; the Rod was in the Spirit Temple. Nabooru was the Sage of Spirits, and therefore able to help to get the Rod of Fattening to the country-covering Zelda.

[Nabooru, can you hear me?] asked Zelda.

[I suppose you're the one that's covering Gerudo Valley with your flab] said Nabooru coolly.

[Where are you?]

[Where do you think? In the Spirit Temple, of course] said Nabooru.

[Ever heard of the Rod of Fattening?] asked Zelda.

[Of course] said Nabooru. [Ganonorf sealed it away somewhere in the Spirit Temple because it was deemed "useless" by that bastard. I tried to find the Rod when Ganondorf took over Hyrule. I thought I would make myself so fat that I would crush Ganondorf with my weight, but I never found the Rod. Ganondorf left a hint to where it is; The Rod shall be unhidden by the one that holds the power of Gold]

[The Power of Gold?] asked Zelda.

[Yeah, I don't know what that means] said Nabooru. [why do you want the Rod, anyway?]

[I want to be bigger] said Zelda.

[I see] said Nabooru. [well, unless if someone has 'the power of Gold', we'll never find the Rod]

[The Power of Gold....] said Zelda. [....wait a minute! Link has the Gold Gauntlets! Could that be the 'power of Gold' ?]

[I suppose] said Nabooru.

So, I need Link's help after all, thought Zelda.
111211112221211112221221212221122.title: The Power of Gold

choices: Link and Malon meet up with Nabooru
The pair realize that Nabooru has already taken the rod!
1112111122212111122212212122211221.content:
Meanwhile Link and Malon were slowly making their way through the massive field of fat that was Zelda's belly.

"Man...this is going to take forever..." mumbled Malon with half distaste in her tone of voice.

Just as Link was going to reply the voice of Zelda resounding in his head.

[Link can you hear me?] she asked.

[Zelda...what the? How can I...]

[Being a Sage means I can transmit my thoughts into your mind, Link.] explained Zelda. [Listen I have a bit of favor to ask, will you hear me out?]

In honesty Link actually wanted to be the one asking Zelda a few questions but he decided to play along for the time being, curious as to what the epic weighting princess had in mind.

[Go on.]

[Okay good. Here's what I want you to do for me. Head toward the Spirit Temple Nabooru should still be there and I want you to help look for a magical item called "The Rod of Fattening".]

[What's the heck is that?] asked Link.

[It's an item created by the Great Fairy of Fat] a bit of a light bulb went off in Link's head [Basically from what I was told it can make someone as fat as they want. I can only assume there is no limit to it's power.] Link didn't like the sound of that.

[I want you, Link, to find that rod for me and deliver it to me, pretty please.] said Zelda in as kind a tone as she could muster. A moment later their conversation came to an end.

"Fairy Boy? Hey you still with me?" Malon took a step toward Link. "Yoohoo!" she waved a chubby hand directly in front of his vision.

"Huh oh...sorry, Malon, it's just that Zelda contacted me telepathically a moment ago." Link went on to explain the whole conversation/request from the princess.

"...So she wants you to go get this magical rod for her." 'Well seeing as she's far too fat to move I can see why she'd have to ask for help.' thought Malon as she giggled mentally.

"Yeah but I don't think I have to explain why she wants it in the first place."

"To get even bigger than she already is." Malon stated with a rather serious look and tone, "If it's true that there's no limit to that thing's power...then in turn there'll be no limit to Zelda's blubber."

"That's one way of putting it. In any case we're going to go find that rod...but only because if it gives weight perhaps there's a way to take away as well."

Malon could only find herself smiling at Link.

"So going to play the role of the hero again huh, Fairy Boy?" Link nodded with a bit of a laugh. "Okay then let's go find that treasure!" cheered on Malon with a giggle and a smile.

A minute later Malon was once again pressing herself onto Link as he used his ocarina and his song knowledge to get the two of them to the Spirit Temple.
1112111122212111122212212122211221.title: Zelda looks to Link for help

choices: Nabooru uses the Rod on herself
Nabooru uses the  Rod to shrink Zelda down
11121111222121111222122121222112212.content:
The song that Link knew to get to the Desert Colouss (aka the Spirit Temple) transported them outside the temple itself. Malon and Link could only stare in amazement as they saw that the temple wasn't covered in Zelda's blubber. Zelda's miles of blubber was being held back by some kind of force field, which covered the temple and the surrounding area.

"That's amazing..." said Malon. "how can it hold back Zelda's weight?"

"Nabooru must be doing it" said Link. "or...it could be the Golden Goddesses...anyway, let's go get that Rod!"

The pair both entered the Spirit Temple and saw Nabooru standing there.

"Hey, Link" said the skinny Gerudo leader. "its been a while"

"Yes, it has" said Link.

"You know each other?" asked Malon.

"Of course" said Link. "I had to rescue her from Twinrova...and awaken her Sage powers"

"And for that, I'm greatful" said Nabooru. "now, about this Rod..."

"Do you know where it is?" asked Link.

"It's behind that statue in that one room" said Nabooru vaguely, but Link knew what she was talking about; There was this huge statue of a goddess that held the room where he fought Twinrova. He didn't consider that there could be another room behind the statue.

"Okay...let's go Malon" said Link.

The pair left Nabooru and headed for the room with the giant statue. With the Golden Gauntlets, Link easily lifted the statue and set it aside. Malon just stared in awe.

"Wow" said Malon. "how much weight can you pick up with those Gauntlets?"

"I don't think I'll be able to lift Zelda....not all of her, anyway" said Link. "but I can lift some pretty heavy stuff"

The pair found a door that led to a room where there was a golden statue, clearly meant to hold something. But the statue wasn't holding anything. The statue was that of a fat woman...fatter than Malon, in fact.

"Who's that?" asked Malon. "she's none of the three goddesses...or anyone that I know"

"Nevermind that" said Link. "where's the Rod?"

There was no sign of a Rod in the room. That's when the pair realized that Nabooru must have the Rod! They rushed back to Nabooru.

"You have the Rod!" said Link.

"You finally realize it, huh?" asked Nabooru, as she pulled out a Rod.

"What are you gonna do?" asked Malon. "become as big as Zelda...or bigger than Zelda"

"I haven't decided, to tell the truth" said Nabooru. "being the size of a country sounds cool, but you're not very mobile. I'm wondering if I can shrink Zelda down to size with this Rod.....on the other hand, I can always crush Zelda and her ego if I grew bigger than she is...hmm...what do to?"
11121111222121111222122121222112212.title: Nabooru has it!

choices: Nabooru agrees to Malon's request
Nabooru figures it's too dangerous and declines
111211112221211112221221212221122121.content:
"Nabooru you can't possibly think of growing to Zelda's size." stressed Link as he watched the rod bounced slightly in the Gerudo Leader's palm.

"And why not? Listen Link...you're not understanding something." Nabooru gave the rod one final toss before snatching it in her closed fist.

"Zelda now knows of this thing. Because of that if she even so much as becomes mobile she will hunt it down. Trust me on this I've seen this type of obsession before...with Ganondorf."

"Power corrupts but absolute power corrupts completely..." Link mumbled semi-softly.

"Precisely, Zelda had a taste of this "power" when she flooded the land with her fat. Now she wants more of it, just as Ganondorf wanted more when his Triforce piece awoke within him. If we shrink her down she will come after the rod and while I may be able to physically overpower her my magical abilities aren't worth a damn compared to her vast knowledge." stated Nabooru.

"But then what?" asked Malon, eyes blinking in confusion.

"That's where I and this rod come in. I can only assume Zelda's dream is too become as fat as possible, if she is challenged by someone of greater girth and flatten by said individual it may be able to knock some sense back into her and deflate that ego of hers from swelling any bigger than it or she already is."

Link and Malon nodded slowly to Nabooru's words. The tan-skinned woman then continued, "Link I never had any intention of deceiving the two of you, I just wasn't sure of your allegiance."

"I'm a hero through and through so it lays with the good of the people. In all honestly Nabooru, Malon and I had no intention of handing the rod over to Zelda. I wanted to retrieve it so we could perhaps shrink her down several tons." explained Link.

"So we think alike that's good to hear. Then you realize this is the only way so on that note..."

"Hold It!" exclaimed Malon to everyone's surprise.

"Please let me say something." she sighed slightly before gathering herself, "This whole thing...it started because I was jealous of Zelda's weight and how she was using it to get close to Link. So I fatten myself up to win him over but when Zelda caught sight of this along with hearing of the milk that did this to me she went ahead and drank it all...I suppose to prove that she was the dominant female in the land."

Malon continued onward now that she had the attention of both Link and Nabooru.

"Honestly even after drinking it all she shouldn't have ended up as big as she did, Fairy Boy and I assume that she messed with the formula to increase her weight gain even more and now she wants that magical rod so she can grow even fatter...I won't let her! "

"If anyone is going to stop Zelda's insane dream of covering everything with her blubber I want it to be me. I want to finish what I started! It's because of me that Hyrule was replaced with Zelda's fat and I won't let her do that to any other nation much less the entire world!"

Malon took in a bit of a deep breath after her sudden outburst. "Please...Miss Nabooru let me be the one to stop her."
111211112221211112221221212221122121.title: Nabooru's plan and Malon's outburst

choices: Nabooru argees with Link's plan
Nabooru has an idea of her own
1112111122212111122212212122211221212.content:
"The only way to stop Zelda..or even harming her...is to grow to her size" said Nabooru. "if you grew to Zelda's size...you might be overcome with the insane lust of power that has taken over Zelda"

"But I won't stay her size after I beat her" said Malon. "all I want to do is beat her up a bit until she's knocked out...and then, I'll shrink her down to size, along with me"

"No" said Nabooru. "it's too dangerous. You might end up like Zelda; insane with the lust of power"

"Where did this lust come from then?" asked Malon.

"The only person to hold the Rod first was Ganondorf himself" said Nabooru. "maybe his lust for power filled the Rod with that lust somehow....either that, or Ganondorf placed a curse on it"

"I thought he had called the Rod useless" said Link. "so why would he place a curse on an "useless" item?"

"I don't know" said Nabooru. "I was not privy to the plans of Ganonorf"

"So...if we shrink her, she'll just come after it" said Malon. "maybe her lust for power will vanish with her shrunk"

"Perhaps" said Nabooru. "but that's risky...her magic is greater than mine. She's the Seventh Sage of Hyrule...and as such, she's a terrible enemy..with her covering everything in her blubber, she'll be invincible"

"Could we seal away her Sage powers?" asked Link.

"No" said Nabooru.

"Ganondorf sealed away the Sages though" said Link.

"He had the Triforce of Power with him when he did that" said Nabooru. "only that piece of the Triforce could seal away the power of the Sages"

"Bringing back Ganondorf isn't a good idea..." said Malon.

"I argee" said Nabooru. "it'll be like reversing the clock"

"Reversing the clock..." muttered Link. "wait a minute! I think I have an idea! We just go back in time before Zelda drank that milk and stop her from drinking it"

"Then I would drink the milk" said Malon. "we'll just be replacing Zelda with me"

"Yeah, but you won't cover all of Hyrule" said Link.
1112111122212111122212212122211221212.title: The answer?

choices: It doesn't work and Zelda gets even bigger!
It works, Zelda no longer covers Hyrule
111211112221211112221221212221122122.content:
"Nabooru wouldn't it be easier to just shrink down Zelda using the rod's power?" suggested Link.

"Well yes I guess it is the safer path, after all as I said being the size of a country may sound great in theory but I'm sure it'll get boring within an hour or so. That and I rather the Gerudo tribe expand the old fashion way through hard work and all that instead of me forcing Hyrule to become one with it and me."

"So you'll shrink her, because that's what me and Fairy Boy were planning to do once we got a hold of the rod." piped in Malon.

'Fairy Boy? Hmm...Link you really do live an interesting life and here I thought Zelda was the only one after you but I guess this plump gal is too.' thought Nabooru to herself with a mental laugh.

"Of course, now you must understand I've never actually tried out the device but from the scripture from when I found the rod I should be able to erase all that fat from her body and trim her down to a more manageable size."

Several minutes later the trio found themselves outside the temple.

"Do your thing, Nabooru." said Link with a quick thumbs-up.

"Alright if all goes well Hyrule will be free of the Princess' flab."

Waving the rod around a few times Nabooru concentrated before pointing it toward the sky above.

'If all goes well...I wonder...what would happen if the reverse were to happen? No I'm sure Miss Nabooru has it all under control...I hope.' thought Malon silently.
111211112221211112221221212221122122.title: Nabooru plans to shrink Zelda down

choices: Another item could shrink Zelda down
Zelda farts
1112111122212111122212212122211221221.content:
Nabooru waved the Rod and pointed it at the sky. The beam of light that exited the Rod went straight up and made contact with Zelda. The effect came almost at once; and it wasn't a good sign. It seemed that Zelda was getting bigger than ever, due to the fact that the force field around the temple was now creaking a bit.

"Oh dear..." said Malon.

"Zelda's gonna cover the world!" yelled Link.

"Oh darn" said Nabooru.

[Well, what do you expect?] asked a voice. [it IS the Rod of Fattening, after all!]

"Who said that?" asked Malon.

[It is I, the Fairy of Fat] said the female voice. [thanks to you, Zelda is becoming even bigger!]


---------


Zelda smiled when she felt herself getting bigger and bigger. She soon covered the surrounding countries with her blubber, and nothing seemed able to stop her from getting bigger and bigger. Zelda felt whole cities and castles being overcome with her blubber, and she felt a rather large tower entering her massive buttcrack. Zelda closed her eyes to enjoy the feeling of being bigger than Hyrule. When she had stopped getting bigger, she opened her eyes to see that she now covered the entire world with her blubber...SHE was the world now. Zelda marveled at her vastness and enjoyed every minute of it. Her Sage powers kicked in so that Zelda could survive in the vaccum of space.

11121111222121111222122121222112212211.content:
Hidden deep within one of Zelda's multi-continent wide buttcheeks was the Spirit Temple, and inside lay the three responsible for Zelda's new girth.

"Well...that was a colossal failure..." mumbled Malon, "Fairy Boy how are the doors holding up?"

"For the time being, pretty good. Guess it's the divine protection of the temple that's preventing it from being crushed to tiny pancakes." said Link, thankful that the temple had yet to cave in on itself.

"More than likely you're right, Link. But on to more pressing matters no pun intended." stated Nabooru with a serious tone.

"Guess that thing takes it's name rather seriously." commented Malon dryly. "Now instead of a Hyrule-sized Zelda we have a HUGE Zelda and who knows how big she is now."

"More than likely spanning the entire globe...and the worse part is that she may wish to grow even further beyond." explained Nabooru.

"Even bigger than the whole planet?! ...Okay I can't breathe..." Malon quickly reached for Link's cap (which the redhead still had upon her fiery-tone hair) and began to use it as a bag of sorts to regain her breath.

Link made his way over to the heavy ranch girl to help her in any way he could while Nabooru went over any available options.

"Hmm...there must be something we can still use, after all Zelda can not gain any more weight so long as we have the rod in our possession..."

"Yeah that's right." Link then turned over to Malon, "Hey you okay, Malon?" he asked her softly.

"Yeah...guess I just couldn't handle the idea of an even bigger Zelda. But I'm fine now, Fairy Boy." she smiled at Link "Oh that's right I still have your hat."

She motioned to give it back to it's proper owner when Link raised a hand.

"Keep it for now, after all you know how it is outside." Malon nodded to his words and placed back upon her head.

"Nabooru you were saying something about maybe there being something we can still use?" asked Link

"Yes, now this is just my assumption but if this rod can only grant weight there must be something that can take away." she explained once again finding herself in deep thought.

"Come to think of it, I remember The Great Deku Tree telling me about how there's Ying and Yang as far as the world was concerned. Basically where there's light there's dark, opposites if you will." stated Link.

"Say again?" Malon asked kindly yet a bit confused.

"Simple like Nabooru said if that rod can only give there must be something that can take away. We just have to find it." explained Link causing to Malon to nod softly.

"But where would something like that, if it does exist, be hidden?" wondered Nabooru as she racked her brains for some clues.

"It has to be in the opposite of the desert. If "The Rod of Fattening" was found here then it's counterpart must be where it's the exact opposite of the desert."

The three pondered for a while till two ideas finally struck Link and Malon.

"Zora's Domain. It's darn near the exact opposite of the desert. If it's anywhere it's there...or maybe Lake Hylia since it connects to the Domain." stated the redhead.

"On the other hand, it could be hidden deep in the Lost Woods or inside the Forest Temple. The Forest is also a place that could be considered opposite of the desert." explained Link.

"So if we are too assume that this "Rod of Weight Loss" actually exists where should we first look?" Nabooru asked.

"Zora's Domain" said Link. "that place is the complete opposite of the desert"

"First things first" said Nabooru. "let's see if we can contact Ruto...she'll be in the Water Temple anyway"


Link remembered his time in the Water Temple...it wasn't fun at all. Of course, none of the Temples had been "fun", but the Water Temple was by far the most diffucult one. It was there when he met his dark half, and nearly lost.


[Ruto, can you hear me?] asked Nabooru.

[Yes, Nabooru] came Ruto's voice. [I...er...guess you noticed Zelda and her vast self?]

[How could we not?] asked Nabooru. [anyway, is there a Rod of Weight Loss in the Water Temple?]


[Rod of Weight Loss...] said Ruto. [...as a matter of fact, yes. We Zora use that Rod to slim Lord Jabu-Jabu down from time to time...we don't want Lord Jabu-Jabu to be too big]

"Yeah..." muttered Link. "we don't want Jabu-Jabu big enough to swallow someone..."

[I heard that, Link!] said Ruto, her voice filled with amusement.

"Excuse me...who's Lord Jabu-Jabu?" asked Malon.

[How can you lose something like that?] asked Nabooru.

[Well, first, its for Weight Loss] said Ruto. [not many people would want to use that Rod, besides fat people...and there are no fat people among Zoras]

"Besides the fish-lord" said Link.

"Wait a minute" said Malon. "you said that you use that Rod on Lord Jabba?"

[Jabu-Jabu] corrected Ruto.

"And it swallows stuff?" asked Malon.

[Lord Jabu-Jabu usually eats fish] said Ruto. [not items]

"Are you sure?" asked Link.

[....not exactly] said Ruto.

"You have looked everywhere for that Rod, right?" asked Link. "have you checked Lord Jabu-Jabu's belly?"

[No] said Ruto. [I could go look if you want]

[We'll come with you] said Nabooru. [it'll make the search quicker]

From the thick shadows a creature watched as Ruto plucked up The Rod of Weight Loss. This "thing" knew what the intentions of the three ladies were and it was in here to make sure that didn't become a reality.

As the three ladies continued to march toward the opening of chamber they were currently within Nabooru suddenly came to a halt, extending her right arm outwards.

"Stop. It seems we are not alone." she stated sternly. Malon blinked in wonder as Ruto held the rod close to her, trying to use her sage abilities to sense out the present danger.

"It approaches."

True to Nabooru's words, the "mysterious" creature made itself known. To their surprise it was Skull Kid standing boldly before them all.

"I'm afraid I can't allow you all to leave with that item."

"Why are you here? Lord Jabu-Jabu is divine ground to us Zoras aren't you a little bit away from the forest you call home?" asked Ruto.

"True, but you see we Skull Kids aren't confined to the forest like the Kokiri are. In a sense we're already "dead" so it makes no difference how far we wonder from our home. That said you wish to rid the world of the comfy exterior it now has and I won't let that happen."

With a simple song from his flute the Skull Kid began to summon vines from the ground below, the girls temporary amazed such a feat was possible, and plant life wasted no time binding them in mid-air.

With a short laugh the Skull Kid admired his work.

"Now now don't struggle you'll just cause the grip to strengthen." He laughs once more as he makes his way the fallen Rod of Weight Loss.

Outside, Link was getting impatient. It was 15 minutes since Malon, Nabooru and Ruto entered Lord Jabu-Jabu. They should've been back by now....even if they couldn't find the Rod of Weight Loss. Finally, Link came to a decision; it wasn't his first choice, but he had to go into Jabu-Jabu to find out what was taking so long. "Ruto!" he called. "Malon! Nabooru!"

As he was going in deeper into Jabu-Jabu's belly, Link thought he heard a shout from somewhere up ahead. "Malon! Nabooru! Ruto!" His voice echoed in the great belly.
"Link!" came Malon's cry. "help us!"
Link rushed forward, eager to help the three ladies in whatever danger they found themsleves in. Link entered a chamber that he didn't recongize at all; it was a big chamber with four exits to it--including the one that led into the chamber itself. "Malon!" Link called. This time, he got no reply.
"I'm going to smell like fish for days..." muttered Link angerily.
"Malon!"
"Link!" came Nabooru's voice. Link rushed towards the voice of Nabooru. In about 2 minutes, Link entered another big chamber that looked like the same chamber he had left.
"God-damned thing has a labyrinth in its belly..." muttered Link.

Link felt a familiar tingle coming from his underside. He then looked up to see that the clouds seemed to be coming closer to him, as if they were falling. Link then realized to his surprise that they weren't falling. He was getting bigger!

"What in the world? Why am I getting bigger!?" Link said.

Speaking of the world, Link grew to cover the entire continent, with no signs of stopping. Soon his new girth blanketed the entire planet, leaving Link's head in space. The only reason he could still breathe was because of the few scraps of Zora's Tunic that still lay upon him.

"If I ever lose this weight, I'm going to kick Malon's butt." Link said.

Suddenly, he felt something bouncing up to his face. It turned out to be the skull kid from earlier, looking quite cheerful.

"Well well well, looks like the 'Hero of Time' decided to join the fun!" the skull kid said.

Link just gave an angry glare at the skull kid.

"What's the matter, can't use magic to move your arms?" skull kid said.

"Obviously not, or I'd be strangling you." Link said.

"*sigh* Some people are just no fun." the skull kid said. "So I'm going to play a special song for you."

The skull kid then played a song on his flute, and Link felt a strange rumbling all over his planet-sized body. Soon he began to grow again, eventually becoming twice as big as their planet.

To Link's surprise Malon's chubby, now empty, hand came crashing down upon his right cheek with a resounding slap that may have even caused a bit of wobble in Nabooru's seemingly never-ending flab.

Once more The Rod of Fattening found itself within the hands of the ranch girl while Link tended to his sore cheek.

"What was that for?" he asked, confusion in his voice.

"Sorry Link but if one of us is going to use this it's going to be me." Malon eyed the rod for moment. As he watched her it seem to Link that Malon's eyes held an array of varying emotions making it hard to guess what was going through her mind.

"I caused all this...through my jealously. I became like this because I wanted you to notice me I told you that before...I wanted us to be happy together but then things got out of control. Zelda's weight, greed, and ego became far bigger than I ever wished to become..."

Malon paused for moment, "I just wanted to be her equal but she took things too far and now Hyrule is once again covered in a massive field of fat...and not just Hyrule but now Nabooru in her reckless thinking has done the same to who-know-what neighboring land." Malon sighed briefly all the while Link stood silent taking in her words.

"I...I love you that's why I became this way." Her grip around the rod strengthening "But I didn't want any of this happen..." Turning to face him Link caught sight of a twinkling tear in her right eye.

"Malon..."

"It's time I finally make up for my mistake, my sin that cost all of Hyrule it's freedom." a small sad smile breaks into her lips, "So sit back Fairy Boy and let someone else be the hero or heroine for once. You deserve a break anyway isn't it time someone saved you, Link? And with this rod I can put all of this to rest and ensure that it doesn't go any further. That's all I want and that's why I told Miss Nabooru to trust in me."

Just as Malon was seconds away from activating the rod's power, Link rushed over and placed a hand on her soft shoulder.

"Malon, wait. I understand what you said because of that and because I'm the hero that I am I...I trust you." Link paused before leaning in closer to her cute chubby face, "Finish it" Link surprised the ranch girl as he placed a small kiss on her cheek, "In the only possible way you can." he added in.

Malon nodded slightly, her cheeks burning crimson. "I will and thank you." her eyes shut as she smiled though they would reopen as she felt for the first time Link hugging her fatty form and not vice-versa.

"Fairy Boy?" "If by chance I end up lost after you use the rod's power I want to make sure it's in the girth belonging to the savior of Hyrule." he smiled in a rather goofy fashion as Malon agreed with a smile and laugh of her own.

"Alright...here goes everything." Malon half-mumbled as she activated the rod and pressed it to her body.

As Malon's expanding ocean of flesh approached the Mario universe, she sensed something was wrong. The Mario universe was completely gone and was replaced with something much larger. It was another girl.

"Hi, I'm Daisy!" Like Malon, she too had become a multiversal blob of fat. Though her weight gain seemed to have focused mostly on her butt. At least, Malon thought it was her butt. It was hard to tell.

"Um...hi." Was Malon's response. "You too, huh? What's your story?"

"Friend of mine made this awesome cake!" Daisy said. "It was huge! It was bigger than both mine and her castles combined!"

"Castles?" Malon pondered to herself. "Great. That's all I need right now is another princess getting in the way."

Daisy continued. "After I ate the whole thing, it gave me this weird power. Now I can make bigger, tastier cakes out of nowhere! Would you like to try some?"

"Look at me." Malon said. "Do I look like someone who would turn down food?"

"Okay, here you go." Although Daisy was long past the point of being able to raise her fatty arms up, she could still snap her swollen fingers. She did just that, and a normal sized cake poofed into existence, right in front of Malon's blobby face. Malon used her goddess powers to make a fork appear. Moving on it's own, the fork took a piece of the cake and fed it to her.

"Wow, this is good." Then Malon used her powers to turn the cake into liquid, then she sucked it all up like a vacuum. The whole cake was gone in seconds.

"Sadly, my friend didn't make it." Daisy said, looking as if she were fighting back tears. "She was crushed along with the rest of my universe. No amount of 1-up mushrooms could save them."

"What the hell is a 1-up mushroom?" Malon asked.

"It doesn't matter." Daisy said. "Hey, do you wanna have a contest to see who can be the biggest, fattest blob ever?"

"Hell yes." Malon said. Daisy snapped her fingers again, spawning two massive cakes that made them look microscopic by comparison.

"Dig in." Daisy said, and they did.

What happens next?
