She then began to moan and felt something grow in her privates
11311211121111111221111111.title: stay with Ruto and Gel's story

choices: Ruto is at Geruado Valley
Ruto drinks Lake Hylia dry
113112111211111112211112.content:
Link was exploring Ruto's second stomach, along with Malon the keeper of Lon Lon Ranch nowadays. Ruto's stomach now was five times the size of the belly of Lord Jabu-Jabu had been. Malon had decided to go with Link to explore their new home within Ruto.

As Link and Malon was walking near a seemingly bottomless pit, Zelda appeared from nowhere.
"Zelda!" said Link. "so...Ruto ate you too"

"She's eating Hyrule!" exclaimed Zelda.

"I think she intends to eat everything in sight" said Link.
Malon was looking down at the bottomless pit. The pit seemed to be miles down, and Malon was wondering what was at the bottom.
The other Hylians were wandering about in the great big stomach of Ruto. The Zoras were also exploring the massive insides of their queen.
"Nothing can stop Ruto" said Zelda. "I tried to use my magic on her, but they wouldn't work"
"Bounced off her blubber?" asked Link.
"Yeah" said Zelda. "-now, how do we get out of here!"

"Uhh...I don't think we're ever going to get out" said Malon. "we'll have to accept that the belly of Ruto is our new home"

"Well...I guess the castle can be rebuilt in here..." said Zelda, sighing.
113112111211111112211112.title: The bottomless pit?

choices: The trio make it to safety
They get washed away with the tide
1131121112111111122111122.content:
Link sighed to himself as he noticed the depression on both Zelda and Malon's faces.

'Darn it, Ruto should never have gotten this carried away with her hunger...but what to do now? Her stomachs are too vast and even using the Longshot would be a problem, I don't think its chain can extend from her stomach up to her mouth...'

Link thought to himself silently until Malon's voice broke his chain of thoughts.

"Um, Link, Zelda...do you two hear a rumbling sound?"

Zelda blinked her bluish eyes for a second, "Now that you mention it, yes I do. What is that?"

"Sounds like rushing water..." stated Link calmly, still semi-thinking of a way out that is until he stopped and actually remembered his words.

"Rushing Water?!" Link's right eye twitched slightly, "Oh no she didn't..."

"You can't actually tell me she's drinking Lake Hylia!" yelled Zelda with a frantic look as she waved her arms upward and downward.

"Either that or she's drinking from her domain." "Um Link, Zelda...I think we should head for higher ground!"

The two blondes were caught off guard as Malon dashed forward took each one in a separate hand and tried to out run the incoming tidal wave.

"Crap!" "Dear Goddesses!" were Link and Zelda's reactions to the massive amount of water.

"Don't stop running Malon!" yelled out Link.

"Trust me I have no plans of stopping!" she wailed
1131121112111111122111122.title: Tidal Wave!

choices: Link comes up with an idea
Zelda and Malon share their idea
11311211121111111221111221.content:
"Link, the wave is going to outrun Malon!" exclaimed Zelda with a look of fright in her eyes.

"Damn...no wait, the Longshot: It's our last hope!"

Link then pulled out the metallic weapon.

"You're going to fire it as I'm running?" questioned Malon.

"Yup, if you stop it's all over for us so just keep going forward Malon. Besides it's no different then firing it from Epona's saddle."

Link took a look around before spotting a higher section of Ruto's stomach, apparently it was the section the Zoras were looking into.

"One shot...GO!" the chain tore through the air extending as far as it could go, Link and the girls hope it would be enough to get them to safety.

Just as the wave was about to catch up to the trio the Longshot's blade hit it's mark, thus retracting itself and pulling Link, Zelda, and Malon to safety.

Afterwards the three collapsed on the "floor", especially Malon who was exhausted from her running marathon.

"Well at least we're safe now..." commented Link with a sigh.

"Yes but just how large as Ruto grown now. There's no doubt in my mind she has drank all of Lake Hylia." stated Zelda as she took a sitting position.

"If she drank that much, Ruto must be enormous...well more enormous than she already was I mean." added in Malon.

Link glanced around for moment before speaking up, "Yeah she definitely got a whole lot bigger that's for sure. Must have covered the entire lake and then some by now."

"Link this is getting completely out of hand, if we don't stop her she...she'll end up replacing Hyrule with her vastness."

"But how?" Malon gave a slight head tilt to stress her confusion on the matter.

"Hold on for second while I think of a way..." closing his eyes Link tried to come up with a solution.
11311211121111111221111221.title: One problem solved another still incomplete

choices: Zelda and Malon reluctantly agree
The girls think Link's insane
113112111211111112211112211.content:
'I'm not even sure if this will work, it sounds so farfetched...yet I've seen and experienced crazier things. I mean I'm inside Ruto's stomach along with 1/3 of Hyrule!' thought Link to himself as he pondered away on his idea.

"Well I got nothing..." mumbled Malon with a slight sigh.

"Unfortunately I too have nothing, if only my magic could work on her but it just bounces off." Zelda as well gave off a sigh of depression.

"What about that teleportation magic Link once told me you have?" asked Malon

"It won't work...Ruto may be too thick to pass through even with my magical abilities. My various magic all share the same strength and if Din's Fire did nothing to Ruto then Farore's Wind may not have been strength to pass through Ruto's vastness." Zelda hung her head in defeat after she explain the situation to Malon.

"Oh...darn looks like we're back to step one."

"Not exactly I think I may have a way to get us out of here, though even I'm not so sure if it will work..." Link stated with a sheepish grin as he rubbed the back of his head with his left hand.

Zelda and Malon lifted each other off the group as they approached their blonde friend, at this point the girls were desperate for any solution.

"What is it, Link?" Zelda asked kindly. "Yeah what's on your mind, Fairy boy?" added in Malon.

"Well here's my plan, but like I said it will most likely sound crazy so bare with me." The girls exchanged looks before they urged Link to continue.

"Okay well here's my plan. Everything that Ruto eats is making her larger right? Well what if everything inside Ruto suddenly disappeared?"

Malon stared at Link for a second, "Um I'm not following..."

"What I mean is what if everything in Ruto's stomach was transfered somewhere else. Ruto can't digest what she doesn't have thus her body will eventually start burning away her own fat and in the process will shrink her back to normal."

"Oh I understand, getting rid of everything inside would be equal to emptying the air out of a balloon. With the air gone the balloon eventually deflates." explained Zelda with a smile.

"Exactly!" "That's just crazy enough to work, Link." Malon giggled slightly until another question arose in her mind.

"But where will everything be transfered to? Zelda said her magic isn't strong enough to teleport objects out of Ruto."

Link gave off a slight giggle as he began to nearly sweat buckets, "Well you see that's the real crazy part...um, for this to work...someone..has to...um..."

"Yes?" asked both girls. "Well someone has...to...eat everything that Ruto has eaten so far..." Link burst into a nervous laugher as he backed away from the two women, very nervous of their reaction.
113112111211111112211112211.title: Link's

choices: One of the girls steps up
They both decide to share the load
1131121112111111122111122111.content:
The two woman stared at Link for a moment as if he had grown another head.

"That can't seriously work can it?" questioned Malon. "I'm not sure...but that this point it's either Link's plan or nothing at all. I certainly don't feel like living out the rest of me inside Ruto." stated Zelda, Malon agreed yet both were still in shock over Link's very "unique" (to say the least) plan.

"So...what do you think?" Link awaited an answer even though in the back of his mind even he question himself for coming up with something this crazy.

"Well like Zelda said at this point, it's either that or nothing...so I guess we have to go along with your "plan", Fairy Boy." "Though I have to wonder if such a thing is possible?" added in Zelda.

"Well that's the thing, I'm not one hundred percent sure this will work, but I'm willing to try if you are." Link flashed a grin at the two ladies.

"What do you mean if we are?" As Zelda questioned Link Malon's eyes suddenly shot up and nearly grew a few inches.

"Oh no Fairy Boy don't tell me you plan to..." "Y..yeah, one of you will have to be the one to go along with the plan."

Malon stomped toward Link's direction before taking him by the collar. "I told you not to tell me!"

"Ahaha...sorry Malon but it's the only way..." "Then why don't you do it?" "What? No way I came up with the plan so that excludes me from actually doing the "work". Besides do you really want to see me as fat as Ruto?"

Malon pondered the thought over, "Hmm...well I suppose you wouldn't make that great a fatty...nah I need my Fairy Boy to be slim, handsome...and well I would say smart but your current plan is making me question that. Oh well two out of three isn't bad."

Zelda coughed slightly to make her presence known to Malon. "Oh right, back to business I guess." The redhead blushed slightly before letting go of Link.

"So I take it you agree with the plan." "If we have no choice then I suppose we do, right Malon." "Yeah I suppose...but now...who's going to..er.. do the "work" so to speak?"
1131121112111111122111122111.title: Nothing to lose, everything to gain

choices: Zelda will save her country
It's Malon's time to shine

Deciding to take a few minutes to talk things over, the girls stepped aside leaving Link to himself.

'Well that went better than I planned, a part of me thought they would have tossed me into Ruto's stomach acids or something like that...' thought Link as he sighed in relief.

A few minutes later the girls return and Link assumed one of them had stepped up to the challenge.

"Well we decided on who will go along with your plan, Link." stated Zelda with a small smile.

"Yeah, even if it does sound crazy, if it's our only way out then so be it." Malon as well smiled slightly.

"Okay then who will it be?" asked Link with a slight head tilt, awaiting an answer from one of the girls.

11311211121111111221111221111122.content:
Zelda's eyes boggled at the feast that the Zora chefs brought in for her, a virtual army of skilled Zora chefs entered holding platters of fish in just about every way a fish can possibly be prepared, the feast was such a size that it exceeded even the initiation feast of Ruto herself.

She took her place at a large table that had been set out for her and lifted the cover off the first dish.

Zelda picked up a knife and fork and poked at the fish sitting in front of her. She cut a small slice off and daintily placed it in her mouth.

"Mmm, delicious!" she though to herself as she continued to eat (as demurely as possible.)

One Hour Later...

Zelda patted her stomach lightly and sighed with satifaction.

"Well that's the first dish finished, my compliments to the chef!" announced Zelda

Link and Malon were standing together, Malon was turning red and Link was starting to doze off, but was swiftly awakened when Malon punched him in the arm.

"Ow! That Hurt!" whined Link

Malon ignored him and continued to watch Zelda slowly pick at the second dish, slowly....slowly.

"By the Goddesses, this is pathetic!" muttered the enraged farm girl as she stamped her way over to the table, Link followed nervously.

"Er, Malon- what are you doing?" asked Link

"I'm going to speed things up a little." replied Malon

Malon walked round in front of Zelda and said as sweetly as possible.

"Hi Zelda! Enjoying your meal?"

Zelda nodded politely

"Just one thing, you appear to have something stuck in your teeth, would you just open you mouth for a second so i can check?" said Malon in a voice that made flowers sprout around Link's feet.

Zelda looked worried and opened her mouth wide.

Suddenly Malon grabbed the second platter and shoved the entire thing (minus the serving dish thankfully) into Zelda's mouth, she then held her mouth shut until she swallowed.

"Mmmmphhmph!!!" said Zelda, her eyes wide. Working on a farm for so long had given Malon a very strong pair of hands.

"Look here, sister." growled Malon " It's clear we're getting nowhere fast at the moment, so i'm going to give you a little help, you agreed to this, so we're going to do it properly- that means my way!"

Link decided to step back, it was clear he'd not get anywhere by objecting to Malon in this mood.

Malon grabbed the a third dish from the nearest chef and shoved the contents into Zelda's mouth before she had time to protest, and held it shut until she had swallowed every last bit.

Malon released her hand and Zelda let out a soft belch, "I guess i should thank you, Malon" said Zelda reluctantly "When you're a Princess you pick up very specific eating habits, though- could you slow it down just a little bit?"

Malon smiled

"No can do, sister. Now open up."

The redhead smiled as she ran a hand through her crimson colored locks of hair.

"Well you're taking this a little better than before, Malon." Link smiled a semi-goofy grin toward the redhead.

"Well that's because I want out of here, just like Zelda I don't plan on living the rest of my life inside an overgrown fish...er no real offense to you or Ruto, Link." Link nodded in an understanding fashion.

"So if this gets us out, I'm all for it." confessed Malon. "Okay, but you know you and Zelda could have shared the workload..." Malon paused Link's words as she threw a hand in front of his vision.

Malon's bluish eyes shifted in a serious narrowed look, "This is my call, Link. For once just sit back and let me save what you constantly bust your butt saving."

Link nodded silently and had to admit he agreed with Malon's points and her determination. "Okay you got yourself a deal, Malon."

"Now where shall we start at?" wondered Zelda

"Link!" yells Zelda as she noticed the accident, luckily so did the young hero.

"I'm on it, Zelda." Turning his attention toward Malon, he brings out his trusty Longshot.

"Malon! Say Ahh for a second!"

"Huh? Okay...?" is Malon's only response as she proceeds to open her mouth wide for Link.

Firing the Longshot straight into Malon's opened maw, another "Huh" is vaguely heard as the blubber-filled ranch girl feels the weapon make contact with the back of her throat.

A few seconds later Link finds himself inside Malon's mouth, trying his best to keep stable footing as he walks on her slippery tongue. Finally Link spots the small boy stuck between her tongue and a tooth. It appeared that despite the position he was in, the youth didn't appear to be hurt.

Instructing Malon to not move, eat, or do any sort of movement that would cause some type of shift in her mouth, Link successfully rescued the boy. Who went on to explain that he was lucky enough to roll under her tongue the moment Malon swallow the food offering.

choices: Malon begins on her second feast
Zelda surprisingly interrupts
1131121112111111122111122111121111.content:
"Hey Link, I think it's time for another feast!" called out Malon in a slightly husky voice, after all the girl had nearly seven (or was it eight) chins.

"Well she's taking this rather well, in fact outside of that little accident she seems to be enjoying herself." states Zelda in a humorous tone.

"Yeah that's true, then again it was her decision..." Link's words seem to trail off for a second, a serious look in his eyes before relaxing into a more casual expression.

"Alright Zelda, what do you say we get started on Malon's request."

Zelda nods in agreement...

Six hours pass, all the while, Malon spends her time munching on snacks and bottle of Lon Lon Milk. While her growth has slowed down somewhat, the ranch girl has only been able to put on a mere 3,000 pounds not much when compared to her weight after her feast.

After chugging another jug of milk, Malon notices Link approaching her.

"Well the second feast is done. You ready, Malon?"

"Heck yeah I am, bring it on Fairy Boy!" cheers the enlarged redhead with as big a smile as she can muster.
1131121112111111122111122111121111.title: Malon's second feast is coming up

choices: Malon agrees to Zelda's help
Malon decides to continue on her own
11311211121111111221111221111211112.content:
But before Malon can get to her second feast Zelda suddenly appears.

"Zelda? What's wrong? Is Ruto devouring another area of Hyrule?"

"Perish the thought, Link, no I just stop by because I may have found a way to increase Malon's growth."

"Really?" questions Link, even the massive redhead finds her attention shifting over toward the princess.

"It's actually quite simple, I found this incantation from one of the books belonging to the Castle's library. I'm actually surprised it survived the trip down into Ruto's stomach...but in any case it's a spell that can increase the calorie intake of any food product."

"Meaning?" "Oi..." Zelda sighs slightly as she runs a hand through her golden locks.

"Meaning, if for example Malon eats a whole cake and gains about fifteen pounds with this spell it's possible she could gain double, triple, or perhaps even quadruple the pounds!"

"Oh I get it now, that certainly would make things go faster." Turning his attention toward the mass that is Malon, Link decides to hear out Malon's opinion on Zelda's spell.
11311211121111111221111221111211112.title: Zelda's assistance

choices: Four times the calories!
An unexpected side effect!
113112111211111112211112211112111121.content:
"I'm not so sure." said Malon "-magic can be kind of unpredictable sometimes..."

"I wouldn't worry about that." Zelda said "-it's been used reasonably often by people travelling or living in very cold areas as well as people suffering from malnourishment, and there haven't been any side-effects as of yet, plus you have an experienced magic user casting it." Zelda put her hand on her chest and grinned reassuringly.

"Will if you're sure it's safe, and it makes the whole process faster, then go ahead Zelda!"

"Sure thing" said Zelda as she worded the incantation while performing the accompanying spell with her hands, eventually a small ball formed in her hand that glowed with a pale green light.

"Catch!" Zelda shouted as she threw it at Malon's head

Malon caught it in her mouth an immediately swallowed it, for a short moment nothing happened, then her stomach lit up like a massive bulb, and the whole cavern was momentarily tinted green,

"Ooooh" cooed Malon

Eventually the glow subsided, and Zelda and Link took their hands away from their eyes.

"Okay" spoke Zelda "-that means it's worked, now let's see what kind of effect it has, it can vary between different people."

Link climbed up Malon's vast collection of rolls until he reached her face, he uncorked a bottle of LonLon milk and poured it down her throat.

Malon drank greedily until all the milk was finished, then she licked her lips and belched loudly, almost dislodging Link.

"Well?" she asked with a hint of curiosity.
113112111211111112211112211112111121.title: It's a kind of magic.

choices: Malon starts to eat people next
Malon eats and eats until...
1131121112111111122111122111121112.content:
"I'm thirsty after all that food" said Malon. "time for a drink"

"Everyone out of Lake Hylia!" yelled Link. Everybody got out of Lake Hylia just before Malon started to drink it. Malon was drinking Lake Hylia dry, making her even fatter. Malon's belly now filled two chambers of Ruto's stomach and was still getting bigger. After she drank all of Lake Hylia, Malon's belly was as big as a castle now, and Malon started to eat houses and small gardens whole. The people climbed onto Malon's massive belly to prevent themselves from being smothered in Malon's flab.

choices: Link stops her
She eats EVERYONE!
11311211121111111221111221111211121.content: Malon smiled broadly. She enjoyed the feeling of all the water of Lake Hylia sloshing around inside of her, but with all the sloshing, came a new kind of feeling...Kinda felt like hunger. And seeing all the people all over her fat, made her even hungrier. She looked all around and didn't find anything to eat.                                        "There's no food around here!", she yelled. Before anyone knew what was happening, Malon had grabbed hundreds of people and made them slide down her mouth. She promptly swallowed all of them. Link and Zelda watched in horror as she reached out for more...
11311211121111111221111221111211121.title: Hungry for people

choices: They both share the meals
Zelda takes one side of the stomach, Malon takes the other
11311211121111111221111221112.content: "Well, if we both do the work, we'll be out of here faster" said Zelda. "Yeah, I supost you're right" agreed Malon. "Great, now where do we start?" asked Link.
11311211121111111221111221112.title: They both decide to share the load

choices: Check up on Zelda or Malon's later progress...
Some time later Link decides to check up on the two ladies...
113112111211111112211112211122.content:
"That's a good question." Malon stated as much like Link she ponders over where exactly to begin this still very crazy idea from her fairy boy.

"I mean we could have feasts prepared for you much like with Ruto when she originally grew massive." Link pointed out, a finger of his tapping his chin as he continued to think things through.

"No that will only take up more time and resources." Zelda explained as she paused for moment, "Hmm...what if each one of us took up a side of Ruto's stomach."

"You mean act on our own and just gobble up whatever we come across? Wait that last part sounds a little gross..."

Malon had a point however Zelda only now picked up on something that she hadn't entirely focused on.

"It certainly seems that way however..." Zelda paused again as she picked up a simple looking can that laid nearby.

Curious Link and Malon watched as Zelda amazingly ate the small object whole!

"What? How?!" wondered Malon, Link sharing her shock.

"Only until now did I realize that everything inside Ruto has been coated with magical properties. Perhaps it's because she's a sage because normally what I just did would be absurd and yet there was no harm in doing so. I was curious how Ruto could eat so much without damaging herself but perhaps it really is her being sage that has blessed her stomach and in turn allows us to do the same."

"Wow...I think you just blew my mind." admitted Malon with a slight chuckle.

"My apologizes but in short it seems Link's plan is so far-fetched after all. You and I will simply clean out Ruto by doing exactly what she did."

Malon smirked as Zelda smiled in near proud fashion leaving Link to wonder of what exactly he had just bear witness to.

'Well I guess so long we get out of here and stop Ruto it's all ultimately for the best.' he thought to himself as the two girls shared a high-five before heading off in opposite directions.
113112111211111112211112211122.title: You take one side I take the other

choices: Eating Kokiri Forest
Devouring Death Mountain.
113112111211111112211112212.content:
"Wait a sec Link." Malon says after a bit. "How DID you wind up in here before us anyway? I doubt it was... oh by the Goddesses... did you.. and she....?"

Link huh's for a moment, then nods.

"Yeah... we got married."

Zelda sighs. "I figured as much actually. I mean... you and her..."

Malon huffs some. "Didn't you see how much I liked you you self centered jerk!" She growls some, Link moving away for a moment. "I wanted to offer you my..."

"Wait Malon!" Zelda says. "For one, Zora weddings state the male can have more than one mate, so you can still be together. But Link, you may be able to talk right to her and tell her to stop! After all, you ARE married!"

Link huh's again "What does that have to do with anything?!"

Malon looks to Zelda. "Handsome he may be, but he is not the brightest one." She looks to Link. "Ruto loves you right?"

Link nodded.

"And that makes you a King right?"

Link nodded, having NO idea where she was going with this...

"Well... in Zora custom, a wife has to do what a husband says. You can tell her to stop!"

Zelda nods. "Yes, and then we an start to work settling a life in here if need be."

Link hmm's. "Makes sense, and I doubt she would say no. But the thing is getting there."

"Leave that to me." Zelda says. "I can teleport you out with the aid of the Winds of Farore. Then you can talk to her and try and convince her to stop."

Link hmm's even more. "Well... She DOES love me a lot... I am sure she would say yes."

"Fine, ok." said Malon But when you get back you have a lot of explaining to do, getting married for one, and not inviting us for another thing."

Zelda laughs a little as link wonders if coming back is such a good idea. He can just imagine how Saria will act about this!

In any case, he is teleported out. When he is, the Zora queen is....
113112111211111112211112212.title: Well, they ARE married after all.

choices: Link sinks into the flab of Ruto
Something else happens
1131121112111111122111122122.content:
Thanks to the Winds of Farore, Link was teleported outside of Ruto. He ended up somewhere on her vast belly; all he could see was a blue-skinned wall of blubbery fat. He then saw something that made him gasp; Ruto was eating Death Mountain!

He looked around to see that Ruto was half the size of Hyrule at least. Her belly took up most of Hyrule Field, and she had 20 chins and more on the way. She was devouring Death Mountain bit by bit. Link remembered that a fairy lived atop of Death Mountain which must be in Ruto's belly now. As he watched, Ruto finished eating the mountain. And now, Ruto was the only mountain in Hyrule; a mountain of fat that threatened the existence of Hyrule and maybe the whole world itself!

"RUTO!" he yelled.
Ruto looked down. "Link? How did you get out of my belly?"
"Magic" said Link. "listen, do you think you can stop eating now?"
"Stop eating?!" asked Ruto.
"I'm asking you as King of the Zoras to stop eating" said Link.
"Oh alright" said Ruto reluctantly. "I was getting full anyway"
1131121112111111122111122122.title: Stop eating, Ruto!

choices: We now return to Link and Ruto, who are still talking.
11311211121111111221111221222.content:
As Link and Ruto continue to talk, the Zoras, Gorons, Kokiri, Hylians, and others start to get used to being in Ruto's belly. It is quite vast after all, and more than large enough for a few nice towns. Zelda hmm's some.

"Seems like they are getting used to life in here." She says with a sigh. "And I highly doubt I have enough strength to send them all out again." She sits on the fleshy 'floor' of a high rise in the belly. "Never thought my kingdom would wind up as fish food."

Malon sits by her, sighing. "At least Ruto has stopped eating. And it's actually kinda nice in here. Though I admit I would prefer workng in a field than living in a stomach."

Zelda nods. "Indeed. But we seem to be standing alone on that one my friend." She looks to her. "Friend. It's a shame we never got to be friends earlier, the way we fought over Link all the time."

Malon sighs. "Yeah, then he winds up with the one we least expect: Ruto."

They sigh and watch. "What will we call this land now? It cannot be Hyrule..."

"How about Rutopia?" Malon suggests. Zelda hmmms some and nods.

"Sounds good to me."

They watch as everyone chips in to build makeshift homes and temples. Quite an intresting display.
11311211121111111221111221222.title: Building Rutopia.

choices: Ruto and Link talk some more
We switch to Rutopia
113112111211111112211112212221.content:
Ruto can feel the entire population of Hyrule move around in her belly..more or less. She was lying down where Death Mountain was, making her belly overflow to half of Hyrule Field. Link was on Ruto's shoulder.

"Why did you decide to eat everyone in Hyrule?" asked Link.
"I was hungry" said Ruto matter-of-factly.
"Well...that explains a lot" said Link.
"The first king of the Zora was as big as me now" said Ruto.
"Really?!" asked Link.
"Yep" said Ruto. "although that was a long time ago. It's said the people of Hyrule lived within the king's belly"
"What happened to his body after he died?" asked Link.
"Link, that's more of a legend that fact" said Ruto.
"Hmmm.." said Link.
"Us Zoras love to pig out" said Ruto.
"I see that" said Link, looking at the miles and miles of blue-skinned flesh.
"But even we have limits" said Ruto. "I was going to stop eatting before you asked me to stop...I'm finally full"
"Good" said Link. "I would hate to see you devour everything in the world"
"Link, I would NEVER do that" said Ruto.
"You seemed like you were doing that" said Link.
"Hehe.." said Ruto. "I wanted to be even bigger, but I can't eat another thing"
"Not even me?" asked Link.
"You want to be eaten?" asked Ruto.
"Well...all my friends are in there" said Link. "and the king of the Zoras deserve to be with his subjects"
113112111211111112211112212221.title: Link and Ruto talking

choices: Another wants to get fat.
Rutopia continues to grow.... in more ways than one.
1131121112111111122111122122212.content:
The day turned into night, and everyone was working hard inside of Ruto. By now the newly named Rutopia was coming along quite nicely.

Malon was in charge of the farm animals that were swallowed, making makeshift corrals in areas of the tummy. Several Hylians helped, leading the animals back to the corrals while at the same time fighting off the monsters Ruto accidentally swallowed.

The Zoras, quite at home inside of Ruto, set to work making homes for others with the materials that were gulped down. Several makeshift huts wewre quickly made, and they were just perfect for the new residents.

Most of the kokiri were at a loss, but their magical powers, a last gift of the Deku Tree, enabled some areas of vegitation even inside of a belly. Special farms were in the process of being made, and Saria herself was in charge of their creation.

As for the rest of those swallowed, especially the kids, it was a big playground to them, with large pools for swimming and hidden areas to explore. Laughter filled the large stomach, and Zelda found herself, at last, able to smile.

After about a week of being away, Link finally appeared again, falling into a pool where kids were swimming.

"'Bout time." Malon said, herding a cow back to the corrals. "We were thinking you had decided to leave us."

Link shrugged and smiled. He slowly climbed out, looking over how everything looked. "Nice place."

Malon walked off with the cow, leaving Link puzzled. "Was it something I said?"
1131121112111111122111122122212.title: Return of the King.

choices: Malon replacing Lon Lon Ranch with her girth
Zelda walking towards him, with a belly the size of...
11311211121111111221111221222121.content:
Over the next month, Rutopia was doing alright. Everybody seemed to adjust to living inside a great big stomach. The kids explored everywhere, finding new hidden spots every other day. One of these hidden spots was discovered by Link. The way to the hidden spot was swimming down the seemingly bottomless pit which now contained Lake Ruto (formely "Lake Hylia").

The so-called bottomless pit had a U-Bend near the bottom of the pit. The U-Bend was as wide as several houses, and it led to a small chamber big as the Zora Cave had been. In fact, the Zoras had made the chamber thier new home. Only Link with the Zora tunic was able to reach this chamber. An regular adult might make it, but Link wouldn't feel comfortable without the Zora tunic on. There were at least hundreds of these little hidden spots.
Some of the hidden spots were just big enough to hold 4 or 5 people, while other hidden spots were as big as several castles put together.

Malon seemed to be in a grumpy mood these days. Link wondered if he had said anything to make Malon upset.

Zelda was busy rebuilding her new castle with the material that Ruto had swallowed.
Link decided to visit Malon one day. The new Lon Lon Ranch was right in the middle of the massive stomach, like it had in Hyrule Field...or Ruto Field as Link decided to call it now. As Link was riding up to the ranch, he gasped at what he saw.

Link gasped in shock as he saw Malon's vast mass where the new Lon Lon Ranch used to be.

Her belly alone was as half the size of the original ranch with her gigantic rear stretching half the distance behind. Her clothes were practically in tatters and her dress strained heavily against her huge, Yoga ball sized breasts. Her cheeks were now puffy and her face was home to a full triple chin.

Her arms and fingers had thickened considerably, resting heavily on her love handles.

Link clambered up the massive red haired maiden's belly as quickly as possible.

'Malon, what in the godesses name are you doing?! Link shouted

Malon only looked defiantly

'I thought you were a little too happy at the prospect of living in a giant stomach for the rest of your life, so i'm taking matters into my own hands- i'm going to grow my way out of here!'

'-but how on Earth did you manage to get this big? I've only been away for a short while!' said a puzzled Link

'I had... help.' said Malon, rolling her eyes to Princess Zelda who was casting a teleportation spell on a large vat of milk.

She completed the spell and the entire contents gigantic container dissapeared, Malon's belly then sloshed and expanded outwards at a visible rate.

'Zelda has been kind enough to help me.' explained Malon

'Malon, please reconsider!' shouted Link 'Think of what will happen to Ruto, she's my wife you know!'

Malon thought about this-

choices: Zelda uses magic-filled food to fatten up
Zelda uses a magic spell to fatten up
11311211121111111221112.content:
Now in all the years she had been alive, Zelda had seen a lot of things. Some "things" that normal everyday people wouldn't believe unless they were there first-hand.

But this, well this took the cake, then again the princess assumed the "cake" must have been eaten countless pounds ago, in any case the blonde of royal blood couldn't believe what was rapidly approaching (or was it growing? well either way).

Ruto appeared to be the size of her own domain and then some, considering all of the Castle Town was now under her vast blue tinted blubber. Zelda watched in shock as Ruto began to munch on the pathway leading to the gate that lead to her castle.

'She's growing ever larger by the second!' thought the young princess. "Wonderful...and where is Link during all of this...no this is something I must stop on my own for if I don't it won't matter where Link is for there shall be no Hyrule left to protect if I don't end Ruto's feasting here."

Zelda pauses for a moment trying to come up with some sort of plan in stopping Ruto.

'I don't think my magic will work on someone that thick and if I confront her she will simply slip me down her throat, no she must be stopped by a physical force...but what or who has that much mass to stop a force like Ruto...?'

As Zelda ends her thoughts she glances downward, suddenly a thought occurs. "Of course, I'm the Princess of Hyrule and I vowed to stop Ruto and I shall...even if I must match her enormous amount of weight!"
