'No I must stop that from happening at any cost.'

Zelda paused her thoughts as she noticed she had been walking on Malon's soft blubber for some time now. She then came to spot the remains of Kakariko Village toward the left portion of Malon's epic-sized belly and it seem to her that the ranch girl's left butt-cheek, or at least part of it anyway, laid upon Death Mountain like a soft blanket.

"Guess Malon really has become a literal mountain of fat..." Zelda mumbled rather starstruck, regardless she still had to find her book for time was short and getting shorter by the moment.
1131121112111111122111222222121.title: Zelda's search continues

choices: Link and Ruto recieve a vistor
Whatever you guys want.
1131121112111111122112.content:
So Ruto continued to eat and get larger. Link was all to happy to explore his ever growing bride. Of course Link didn't spend all of his time wandering his wife's massive innards. He after all did want to spend some time with her (though the two of them could still speak to each other even with Link wandering around deep in her belly. A process that made his voice more then a little hoarse. Shouting and all) so occasionally he would have Ruto burp him out (the other ways were deemed a touch on the messy and unpleasent side) to spend quality time together (in more then one way *wink*)

So time passes we jump to a year after Link and Ruto's illustrious marriage. Of course during that time Ruto's weight had jumped dramatically. Indeed she had more then tripled to an illustrious 600,000 pounds. An entire new section of the Zora's domain had to be built for her. One that connected to the ocean (Authors Note: Come on there has to be an Ocean in this iteration of Hyrule. So I'm playing a touch hard and fast with the geography here) This way Ruto could go out and about if needed. Though she prefered to stay near to her domain. Didn't want to leave it unruled and all that. Though she did have capabel assistans. For the most part Ruto and Link made a surprisingly good pair when it came to ruling.

Ruto showed to be a tough no nonsense ruler. More then a few dignitiaries were surprised that despite her rather massive girth she had not fallen into such classic traps as Sloth and Gluttony and indeed was a fierce politcian and negotiator. She played hard and fast, could be quite ruthless if she felt someone was taking advantage of her people. Her husband would undoubtly confess (though not to loudly or to close his wife) that this was a carry over from when she was young. Some habits just don't die one could suppose

However her husband Link proved to be the more level headed and patient type. Indeed one could not help but wonder if his years of adventure had taught him to think before he acted (not to say Ruto didn't think. She merely had something of a fiery temper and could at times be rash to act. Indeed her near rage at Link after she first ate him is a testament to this) Link indeed prefered to think on a solution as opposed to simply acting. Gather all the information one could before making an action.

Together the Zora kingdom prospered. Not only through the age old legend of the larger the queen the more prosperous lake hylia would be. They also ruled their country fair and justly and indeed even after only on year many a Zora was calling them the finest rulers to have ever sat on the Throne. They opened many avenues of trade with other cities and had indeed become penned a very prominent trade agreement with the Kingdom of Hyrule. On top of that thanks the friendship of Link and Darunia (whom still gleefully refered to Link as his Brother) the Zora and the Goron for the first time in the history of Hyrule penned a trade agreement.

So needless to say Link and Ruto had been busy the last year. After all they weren't just rulling a prospering kingdom. Ruto was still eating and growing large. Link would spend a good deal of time adventuring deep in the belly of his wife (after all occasionally parasites would sneek in. Would do no good for the queen to get seriously ill. Though that was far from Links only reason. Indeed he rather enjoyed his adventures in his wife. Who was more then happy to have her husband running around in her belly.) There were also certain *ahem* marital matters that the two engaged in.

One of the more popular topics in some societies (polite and otherwise) was the topic of when these two would produce an heir. Some even questioned if they could produce an heir. If they did would the heir be a Zora or a hylian? The Zora's claimed and indeed cited precedence that Zora and Hylians could mate and produce heirs (even referencing a few occasions it had happened in history. Though such coupling was very very rare.) For the Zora's part they were certain that their King and Queen would produce an heir. It has even become a popular topic of converstaion and in some sectors bets were being taken.

Such bets included the Gender of the child, whether the child would appear more Zora or Hylian, would the child take after its father and go on adventueres, another popular one was to bet on whether or not the Queen was already pregnant. Given her prodigious girth many joked that she might be ready to pop at any moment so to speak. So another popular betting circle was how far along the Queen was.

If Ruto was pregnant they were both keeping it very tight lipped. Though rumor has it both have joined in on the bets themselves though no one can confirm this.

So needless to say all is good within the realm of the Zora's. All is good within the marriage of Link and Ruto.

So lets begin our new tale shall we.

Authors Note: I do wish to apologize. This backstory was meant to be very brief and quick before jumping into a more main streamed part of the story. However I confess that it sort of ran away from me and I ended up establishing a lot more continuity (for lack of a better word) then I wanted to. Haha so if you don't want to go with this story line by all means ignore it there will be two options down below. The first one I would want to continue to follow this sort of continuty I established and have it not end up with Ruto or someone else ultimately eating the universe. While she has gotten rather gigcantic I don't intend to have her get MUCH bigger.

The second option will be to just go nuts. Have fun
1131121112111111122112.title: The King and Queen of the Zora

choices: She has gotten to fat to fit into this chamber. She has more then tripled you.
She has put on maybe 300 pounds. Thing is she is unaware of this.
11311211121111111221121.content:
Ruto sighed and sort of sunk into herself as she floated on the waters. She was currently floating in a special part of her side cave that had access to the sun. At present she and her husband were sunning. Her husband was currently lying on her massive stomach he declared it the second best place to get some sun. The other place she would pause to giggle here were her rather large breasts. Though Link felt that it was a touch to early in the day to get a little adventurous with his wife. After all they could still have visitors (though thankfully their personal attendants would announce any of the more esteemed visitors. The attendants had learned to ignore their king and queens more... adventurous times. Though the two of them have tried to be more patient... with mixed results) so Link was more then content to sun on her belly were it was more appropriate as it were.

Link glanced up at his wife's face and smirked at her. Ruto glanced down at her husband curiously.

Ruto: What's with the smirk? Heh you were the one that was preaching patience. Don't tell me you are already losing the will.

She giggled and smirked at him.

Link: Nah I was just thinking of putting another bet in. You know to muddy the waters as it were. Which led me to thinking of one of the more popular bets.

Ruto gives link a quizzical look.

Ruto: Oh now this I have to hear. So how far along do they think I am now?

Link: More then nine months along.

Ruto covered her mouth in a vein attempt to burst out into laughter.

Ruto: Ahhh yeah I'll have to send one of my representatives down to throw in on that. That'll raise our pay out in the end.

Link chuckled and relaxed back into her belly folds. Before pausing and looking up at the sun.

Link: I forget where we having the representatives from Koholint Island?

Ruto sighed and shook her head.

Ruto: They say you are the level headed one amongst us. You can't remember a thing without it being written down. They are supposed to show up at the end of the month.

Link chuckles and rubs the back of his head sheepishly.

Link: It's going to be a fancy dinner right? Ugh those can be so boring. Well maybe I'll get lucky and you will accidentally eat one of the dignitaries and I'll have to go in to "rescue him"

Ruto: I swear you'll never let me live that down. Honestly you eat one diplomat and BAM suddenly it's just common occurrence. You are never going to let me live that down are you?

Link: Just once? I distinctly remember you eating me when I came down here just before we got married.

Ruto's cheeks reddened here and she looked away rather bashful.

Ruto: ... okay sooo maybe I am a little excited when food is presented to me... I rather enjoy my meals is all.

Link chuckles and begins making his way up his wife's belly. Until he reaches up to her face kissing her lightly. Ruto looks at him and slowly a smirk begins to spread across her face.

Ruto: You are a weak man. Heheheh

Link: You aren't any better.

He leans into give his wife a more passionate kiss when the slight clearing of the throat nets their attention. The two glance over to see their head advisor Ralis standing there giving them both disapproving looks. Link quickly hops down off his wife dusting himself off.

Ralis: I am not interrupting anything am I?

He says as he raises his eye brow ever so slightly. Link and Ruto exchange bashful looks before looking back at Ralis.

Link: Of course not. We are always ready for important business. So Ralis what's happening?

Ralis: Yes the princess Zelda has arrived for a visit. She said and I quote "Ruto, Link it has been AGES since we've last seen each other. So I decided to pop in for a surprise visit."

Ruto: Oh wonderful we were just wondering how she was doing. Oh I wonder if she found a husband... I could use someone to catchup on my gossip with.

Ruto begins to ponder her meeting with Zelda rubbing her chin as she does so.

Link: Well I'll leave you two at it. Last time I was between you two you never stopped. Gave me a headache. Give her a good excuse for my absence Ralis. As well as my heartfelt greetings and that indeed we must catchup... You know I could use a trip to the castle soon.

Link turned and walked towards Ruto who was still musing to herself but then noticed Link.

Ruto: Hmmm oh another adventure huh. Yeah my belly has been feeling weird lately. Do see if you can find out if there is a big parasite in there for me.

Link gives her a thumbs up as Ruto opens her mouth wide and begins to inhale deeply the force of which sucks Link into her mouth. She swishes him around a bit relishing in the flavor before gulping loudly sending Link to the depths of her belly.

Ruto pats her belly lovingly before looking towards Ralis.

Ruto: Well then be a dear show Princess Zelda.

Ralis glances around nervously before coughing into his fist

Ralis: Well you see the thing is... the princess has put on a bit of weight.

Ruto raises an eye brow.

Ruto: ... and?

Ralis: Well you see...
11311211121111111221121.title: Unexpected vistor

choices: Lets see how that Visit goes
Rather lets take a look at how Links adventure in Ruto's stomach is progressing.
113112111211111112211211.content:
Ruto's mouth hung open agape at this news.

Ruto: I must have misheard you dear Ralis. Did you say she has more then tripled my weight?

Ralis nods his head before taking a step back. Ruto floated there in silence for a moment.

Ruto: B-but... it's been... maybe only three months since me and Zelda last saw each other. At that time she was as thin as she always was. How could she have accomplished such a feat.

Ralis: I cannot say my lady. I only am reporting to you what I personally have seen. I had not even heard this bit of information myself.

Ruto sinks down into the water. Ralis knew his queen well enough to know that she was in something of a foul mood. He knew Ruto took great pride in her girth. She loved to flaunt it when she could. After all such girth only benefitted their kingdom. So he knew that she must've been jealous of princess Zelda. After a moment Ruto resurfaced clapping her hands together a cheery expression adorning her face.

Ruto: LOVELY It has been far to long since I've last seen the fair princess of Hyrule. I suppose I have been cramped up in this cave for far to long. I feel as though going out to greet her would be appropriate.

Ruto rose up to her full heigh and surfaced from the pool shaking herself of excess water. She looked down to Ralis. Putting on an overly cheery expression. One that sent dread into the pit of Ralis stomach

Ruto: Ralis do inform princess Zelda that I will be out to see her in just a moment. I need to make myself presentable. Also do give a wonderful excuse as to why my husband will be unable to join... also see to it that you inform me this time as to what excuse you used. I don't want a repeat from when the last incident.

She glared down at Ralis who took a step back and nodded his head. Swiftly retreating to meet with the princess Zelda. He did not want to anger his Queen Especially in her current foul mood. With Ralis gone Ruto clenched her fist.

Ruto: So she thinks she can show me up can she. Well I'll show her. She may be fatter then me but that doesn't matter. Heheheh I have been this size for well over a year now. I have long since learned how to present myself. Heh I bet she is only still learning how to walk elegantly.

Ruto laughed covering her mouth as she did so presenting herself as a rather cliche noble woman.

Link*from within*: ... ummmm I want to remind you Zelda is our friend... please don't do anything you may regret...

Ruto glares down at her stomach

Ruto: I'm sorry I didn't quite hear you Link. Was there something you wanted to say.

Link: Nope all is good. Ummm still checking around. I've found a few parasites but uhhh nothing worthwhile yet. I'll keep looking.

Ruto: Good. Now then

Ruto summons her attendants. When she appeared before Zelda she would be every bit the prim and proper lady like Queen.... which was odd given her rather notorious reputation as a tomboy. No matter! She though to herself.

So Ruto prepared herself to visit Princess Zelda.
113112111211111112211211.title: She has gotten to fat to fit into this chamber....

choices: Let us go to Zelda and Ruto's feast
OR Links adventures in Ruto's belly
1131121112111111122112111.content:
Despite popular opinion the Zora's did have clothing and a fashion style all their own. While their scales did a fine job covering up their more personal areas. Other cultures very quickly found their penchant for walking in the nude rather awkward. So while Zora's would spend most of their time naked as it were when wandering their own domain. If a Zora were to travel abroad or even live in another community as some of their merchant class liked to do. They would often times wear clothing. So naturally in order to keep a sense of cultural identity. The Zora's quickly developed a fashion style all their own.

Queen Ruto for her part hated wearing clothing. Often times she found it really constricting. A sentiment she possessed long before she put on any of her current weight. Now that she had become rather massive she found clothing even more constricting. However she had long since learned and accepted that she would have to get some clothing when dealing with other cultures. More often then not she would have visitors as opposed to going out. Given her massive size long travels were rather... difficult.

Which was fine by her she prefered staying in the water as much as possible. Her husband mused that this was on account of being part fish. She had eaten him for the sentiement and then proceded to bury him under as much food as she could stuff herself with. Queen Ruto's wrath espcially when directed towards her husband could be quite... brutal when the need arised.

For the most part when dealing with close friends like Princess Zelda in this case. Ruto would usually skip the whole ordeal of putting clothes on and the uncomfortable feeling that came with it. However her jealousy at the announcement of Princess Zelda's new size has prompted her to try and show her up in an area that usually Princess Zelda was the superior. That being acting like a proper lady.

Ruto was proud of her rather Tomboyish nature citing it as one of the reasons (among others) that Link had choosen her. She was adventerous, mischievous, not afraid to speak her mind when the need called for it. Still sometimes jealousy makes one act in rash and stupid and Ruto was something of a hot head. Her husband would muse that if Ruto had been hylian she would've been a red head. This again had gotten Link eaten and crushed beneath a mountain of food. That man knew Ruto's anger better then anyone else.

Still Ruto had her finest dress a rather fetching Red dress. She felt the blue to be to... reduntant. It also exposed more then ample clevage. Again the queen was proud of her weight. Make-up applied, and other luxuries she normally would've forgone for such a simple meeting with a friend. Something in the back of her mind told her she was being ridiculous and that regardless of Zelda's size she would be same Princess that Ruto would never openly confess to but knew deep down was her best friend. Even if she felt that the Princess might harbor feelings for her husband. Perhaps that was the reason she had reacted as she had.

At any rate Ruto was now prepared to meet with Princess Zelda. She took a deep breathe and made her way out of her cave. When she reached the surface she immediatly noticed Zelda. Whose flabby belly alone made Ruto some practically tiny by comparison. Nevermind her large breasts (Ruto huffed realizing they were far larger then her own.) ample rear and wide hips. Ruto also noticed that the Princess was wearing a dress that resembled the ones she wore while thin. Not only that it seemed to fit her perfectly despite her massive girth. How and where did she find the time to make those dresses. It had taken Ruto nearly 5 months to get one made.

Ruto shook her head. This was her friend. Now was not the time to be jealous. She should be happy after all only a short while ago she was delighted to hear that Zelda had come for a visit. Ruto closed her eyes took another deep breathe and looked up at the massive Princess.

Ruto: Zelda! It's been far to long since I've last seen you my friend.

Zelda wore a positively massive smile befitting her size at seeing Ruto for the first time in months.

Zelda: I know Ruto. I do apologize matters in the castle have been rather... hectic to say the least. I had intended to come visit you sooner. I do apologize deeply for being unable to see you and Link.

Ralis politely coughs to gain the attention of his Queen.

Ralis: Yes I was just explaning to the Princess that unfortunatly King Link had fallen ill recently and has been confined to bed rest.

Ruto looks down at Ralis

Ruto *whispering*: That's the best you could come up with?

Ralis*whispering back*: You didn't give me a lot of time. It's the best I could come up with on short notice.

Ruto sighed and regained her cheery expression looking back at Zelda

Ruto: Yes awful little virus that's been spreading amongst my people. My poor husband has been down and out for days. He constantly says he has more adventuring to do and I simply tell him no. You know how he can be though honestly so hard headed at times. Though I suppose that's men for you.

Ruto and Zelda giggle at this. For his part Link could easily hear his wife's side of the conversation and merely sighed.

Zelda: Yes I know how stubborn your husband can be. Still I am glad to see you taking such good care of him. I however expected that he wouldn't have wanted to stick around for our meeting. No rather I came all the way out here to see you Queen Ruto.

Ruto blinks taken slightly by surprise for this.

Ruto: Well I mean I know we normally dominate the conversation but I was surprised you wanted to speak with me.

Zelda smiles at her friend.

Zelda: Honestly you are the only one I can really talk to freely. Your personality makes it so much easier for others to open up to you. I envy your ability to speak your mind so freely where as I have to constantly hold my toungue.

Zora's could indeed blush. Instead of pink their cheeks went purpleish. In this situation Ruto's cheeks were a deep purple.

Ruto: I-I thank you Zelda. I have always envied your ability to be so ladylike. GAH I am no good with this touchy feely stuff. Honestly *sigh* anyways you said you came to catchup I have missed a good conversation Zelda.

Zelda nods her head

Zelda: Oh I agree completly Ruto. So I came here to invite you to a royal feast for just the two of us back at my castle. I know how much you enjoy food and well...

Zelda pats her astonishingly huge stomach.

Zelda: I have taken a page out of your book so to speak. Though I confess my size does not contribute to a bountiful harvest as it were.

Zelda giggled while Ruto stared at Zelda

Ruto: Well I would love to join you for a feast Zelda. I fear that getting to your castle would take some time however and I do not wish to leave my husband unattended to for so long...

Link: Liar!

Ruto swiftly slapped her stomach an act that didn't go unnoticed by Zelda but she said nothing.

Zelda: Oh I understand that completly. However I have a spell that can get us to the castle in no time at all and another one to get you back to your domain in equal amount of time. So you won't be gone to long.

Ruto rubbed her chin before breaking out into a wide grin

Ruto: Well I'm never one to pass up on a feast for the ages. So what are we waiting for princess lets stuff ourselves silly.

Ruto claps her hands together eager to stuff her face.

Link: ... what happened to your desire to try and one up her on being lady like...

Ruto slapped her stomach again. Her smile never fading.
1131121112111111122112111.title: The fat Queen and the fatter Princess

choices: The Royal feast begins
Link finds a clue to what's going on inside Ruto's belly.
11311211121111111221121111.content:
Ruto shouldn't have been surprised at all. It was a teleportation spell. She had seen her husband use such a spell himself to travel quickly to far away places like Death Mountain and back again. Honestly she should've realized that at Zelda's size walking to the Zora domain was unfeasible. Nevermind any form of horse or carriage. On top of which at her size she imagined she would have heard Zelda coming LONG before she would have seen her.

Still Ruto had to admit. The Hyrule castle was grand. It appears that Zelda has had it redesigned to fit her now rather generous self. It showed Ruto could only imagine what the average castle worker must have felt wandering these halls. Even Ruto felt tiny moving through them (walking wasn't really a thing she would call doing anymore) and she easily towered over the average person. Still Ruto mused the castle was grand. The dining hall even grander. Ruto was surprised to find that seats and tables that they could make use of. They even had appropriate silver wear for their size.

Honestly where had Zelda found the money and supplies to build all this. Let alone the time it would have taken years to reconstruct the castle yet she did it in only a few months. Well Zelda was a master of magic it is not unreasonable she had a spell or two tucked away that would allow her to do this. Still Ruto could not help but marvel. Her and Zelda had made small talk while they had awaited the meal to be prepared. Ruto was pleased to hear that there was juicy gossip to be heard. While Ruto did shy away from the more feminine areas of being a noble (Ruto was one more to talk politics and sports as opposed to the latest fashion trends.) she still loved the juicer gossip and Zelda was always a deep well of the juiciest of gossip. She had wondered where the Princess had found the time. Then again Zelda never did cease to amaze her.

Ruto's grin turned mischievous here. Well since she was here she might as well ask a question that's been on her mind for sometime.

Ruto: Soooo Princess Zelda I was wondering. Have you found a good man yet?

Zelda's face immediately went a bright shade of pink. At the question looking away rather bashfully from her friend. Ruto's grin only widened at her friends unease.

Ruto: Oh come on you can tell me. I promise to keep it a secret between us girls.

Zelda coughs into her hands looking at Ruto.

Zelda: I hardly feel that... that is any business of your's

Ruto: Heheheh soooo I'ma take that as a no. Come on Princess there has to be plenty of suitors out there for you.

Zelda: Well of course there are. It's a matter of finding the one that's more then just interested in ladder climbing up to the ranks of king. Most of the men my father have introduced are well... more interested in simply using me as a stepping stool to the throne.

She sighs and leans her flabby back into her chair. Ruto frowned now she just felt like a jerk.

Ruto: Hey I'm sorry didn't mean to tease you to hard. Don't worry I'm sure you'll find the right guy eventually I mean I never thought I would get so lucky as to find a good guy and yet here I am happily married.

It was Zelda's turn to smirk here.

Zelda: What about you Ruto? You and Link have yet to produce an heir what are you two waiting on?

Ruto's face flushed purple and she now looked away.

Ruto: I-I... you know that's perfectly fair. Well I mean it's not like we haven't been trying you know... I dunno I'm sure it's just a matter of time before...

Ruto paused and placed her hand on her stomach. There was that feeling again. Zelda tilted her head quizzically noticing her friends shift.

Zelda: Are you alright Ruto?

Ruto looks up at Ruto the feeling had passed.

Ruto: Oh just fine. I'm just starving is all what is taking them so long?

She flashes Zelda her most reassuring smile. Zelda simply smiles back but wasn't quite convinced. Ruto turns her head away.

Ruto: Hey Link... what are you doing in there?

Link: hmmm so far I've just sort of wandered around. I mean I'm trying to draw a more proper map. But this place is always growing and changing I get lost easily enough.

Ruto: That's it you haven't touched anything?

Link: Nope not a thing? Why whats up?

Ruto: Nothing just be careful alright.

Link: ... sure thing.

Ruto looked back at Zelda and quickly changed the subject. However her mind began to wander. What was going on with her stomach lately. She was beginning to worry if a particularly nasty parasite like Barinade might have snuck in. That Parasite nearly killed Jabu-Jabu and he was diety. Though she may have been far larger her innards weren't nearly as powerful. She rubbed her stomach. Well if there was such a thing no doubt Link would find it. If he didn't find it by the time her meeting with Zelda was done. She would inform Link of her concerns.

At long last the food was brought in. Ruto licked her lips in anticipation. If there was one thing about Zelda and the Hylians was that they knew how to cook.
11311211121111111221121111.title: Royal discussions

choices: Meanwhile with Link
Zelda and Ruto's eating contest continues
113112111211111112211211111.content:
Zelda had always been impressed by Ruto's eating habits. She watched in almost awe as Ruto shoved practically whole plates of food down her throat taking no time to chew merely swallowing the contents whole then wasting no time at all she moved onto the next plate, then another after that. Zelda shook her head while she herself was a noble lady and despite her own recent... expanding. She herself maintained her manners at all time. While she knew that Ruto could if she so desired eat like a civilized person (while still an abundant amount) she often times prefered this method. An act that made Zelda more then a little jealous.

Still Zelda slowly ate away merely watching as Ruto glutted herself. Zeldas royal staff more then aware that the Queen of the Zora would be attending. So there was going to be no shortage of food at this royal feast.

Ruto gulped down a large amount of her beverage upon completion of that paused for a moment placing her hand on her ample stomach and proceded to unleash a devestaingly large belch. One that shook the table they sat at. Ruto smiled pleased with herself patting her stomach nearly lovingly. Before immediatly tearing back into her food again. Zelda chuckled to herself before taking a sip from her drink. Ruto paused mouth still filled with food looking up at Zelda. She took a moment noisly gulped down her food.

Ruto: So I have a question for you Princess? It's been bugging me since I heard about your arrival.

Zelda: It's the matter of my new weight is it not?

Ruto: Yeah it is. I mean it took me a year to get to my current weight but at your size you could probably swallow me whole and have enough room for desert. With that said. You are still working on your first plate and myself.

Ruto motioned to the pile of dishes around them. Ruto had nearly consumed the whole feast herself and from the looks of it was more then willing to consume the rest of it. Zelda blushed slightly placing her hand on her stomach before giggling sheepishly.

Zelda: Well that's a rather interesting tale to put it mildly. Well...

Ruto frowned and looked at Zelda. She was stalling. Ruto sighed and lowered her head.

Ruto: Ugh if you don't want to tell me nevermind. The better question...

Ruto stabbed a large piece of stack with her fork and shoved the whole thing in her mouth again swallowing it this time with exaggerated loudness.

Ruto: Why did you get so fat? There had to be a good reason for it?

Zelda paused here and looked away from Ruto. She took a deep breathe before looking back at her.

Zelda: Well it was because... I suppose this goes back to the question you asked me before. Why I haven't gotten married yet. I'll confess that when I started putting on the weight it was for Link.

Ruto's eyes widened ever so slightly. She stopped her feasting and stared at Zelda.

Zelda: I-I confess that I was in love with him. Before you get upset with me I want you to understand I have since moved on from this foolish path. I no that I can't steal him away from you no matter how large I get. What you two have is true genuine love and I wouldn't dare try to step in the middle of it.

Ruto stared at Zelda for a moment as though weighing her words. She closed her eyes and shook her head. So Ruto at least had some justification for her jealousy.

Zelda: But by the time I had realized that I would never win Link's love and moved on from it. I had already put on a substantial amount of weight using... well it was magic as you probably could guess. Along with the help from a very kind Ranch girl who lives not to far from the castle.

Ruto rubbed her chin. She had heard Link make mention of a farm girl who had given Link his horse. She wondered if they were the same person. Well she decided it ultimately didn't matter anyways. The magic was probably the bigger reason Zelda had gotten so big. Ruto shook her head and smiled at Zelda

Ruto: Well put your fears to rest. I'm not mad at you and I'm not going to end our friendship over this. You have no desire to take my husband away from me right?

Zelda: Absolutly not. No I kept putting on this weight simply as a means of... well I suppose testing which of any of the courtiers would give me a chance at my size. Most run away in fear or disgust upon first seeing me. So I figured a first good test to see if they could love me would be to accept me at my size.

Ruto nods her head and smirks

Ruto: Ahhh so you figured that me and Link found true love because of my size.

Zelda: N-no of course not!

Ruto chuckled and went back to shoveling food down. Zelda smiled and placed her hand on her generous belly.

Ruto: Don't think I haven't caught you staring. Hey it's just us two all the servants have left. Come on live a little. At your size you needn't worry bout manners specially with just me around. I've never held back for you.

Ruto grins at Zelda

Ruto: Tell ya what Princess if you can clear more plates then I can I'll do whatever you want in exchange. However if I clear more plates then you do you will have to teach me that spell you cast to make you so large.

Zelda looked at Ruto who was grinning widly at Zelda. Ruto picked up another plate and shoveled the contents into her mouth before again gulping loudly. Then motioned for Zelda to do the same.

Zelda hesistated for a moment before picking up a full plate opening her mouth... she paused closed her eyes and dropped the whole plate into her mouth. Swallowing loudly she felt the contents of the plate land in her stomach. Ruto flashed her a thumbs up and motioned for her to do so again. Zelda paused before shrugging and grabbing another plate and this time doing consuming it with much more gusto.

Ruto nodded her head approvingly. She could afford to let Zelda catch up a little bit.
113112111211111112211211111.title: The Royal feast begins

choices: Link finds something unexpected in Zelda's belly
Back to Ruto and Zelda
1131121112111111122112111111.content:
Link stared at his map. Before glancing around. The area around him was pulsating and he could hear Ruto in the process of another one of her feasts. He stared back at his map. There was no doubt about it. He had somehow ended up in what his wife had dubbed the "burp chamber"

He sighed his wife could be so childish sometimes. This chamber had earned it's nickname as being the place where if Link had wanted to be burped up this is where he would come. There was also a gland (he had found a few in his wife's belly.) that he could manipulate in order to cause his wife to burp he could even use it to control the volume and power of the burp (Other glands he found controlled her hunger and manipulate were her fat would go. If there were other glands in her stomach he had yet to find them. Her innards were massive to say the least.)

This wasn't were he had wanted to be. One of the problems of his ever expanding wife was the fact that her innards were constantly changing. The larger chambers for the most part stayed the same it was more that new tunnels and corridors would sprout up often leading Link to different chambers. So the map he was working on was constantly being updated. Nevermind that he had yet to visit every chamber inside of her belly.

Link placed a hand on his stomach as it growled hungrily. He knew Ruto was usually good about making sure Link would be able to have something to eat himself while he was in her belly. He'd have to go back to the entrance chamber (his wife named all the chambers in her stomach. She felt it was her right given that it was her stomach after all)

Unfortunatly for Link he was so caught up in his map he failed to realize that the pressure in the chamber was growing. Link realized it all to late when the pressure burst upward easily carrying him with it. As his wife belched he was sent flying out of her maw. He flew for several moments before he landed in some sort of liquid. Huh had they already gotten back to the Zora domain? Maybe she burped him up intentionally to speak with him.

Suddenly his whole world shifted and he felt motion as though the entire lake was being lifted. He looked up and saw the massive face of Princess Zelda before him. He only then realized that he was in a rather large cup. He shouted and waved his arms to try and get her attention but to no avail as he and the liquid he was in entered Zelda's mouth and he was very quickly swallowed down. He plunged for several moments before landing in her belly.

He groaned as he stood up. He glanced around his new surrondings. Things were different in here then they were in his wife. The color for starters while his wife's innards had been blue. Zelda's stomach was redish not unlike Jabu-Jabu's stomach.

It was also siginificantly larger then Ruto's stomach as well.

Link: Well... this is unexpected. Hmmm I don't think Ruto would appreciate it if she found out I had taken to exploring Zelda's insides.

He checks his bags only to realize that he had left his ocarina behind... or had he dropped it when Ruto burped him up. Either way he wouldn't be able to teleport out of here. Well he would need to alert Zelda to his presence. So the first thing he did was try shouting after all his wife could hear him no problem.

After a few minutes of shouting to no reply he frowned. Either Zelda was aware of the circumstance and was keeping silent about the whole thing or more likley she couldn't hear him. Link frowned he supposed it was possible that due to being much larger she simply couldn't hear him. Either way Liink needed to find a way out of here.

Link: I suppose a new stomach should make for an interesting exploration. I'll just explain everything to Ruto and I should be fine... yeah.

Link heard a rather noisy gulp above him and a shadow appeared around him. He quickly jumped out of the way as a large plate landed where he had been standing prievously followed shortly thereafter by the contents of the plate.

Link: ... It seems as though Ruto has given Zelda eating lessons... I should talk with her about it later.

Link shrugged picked up a piece of food Zelda had eaten. Began eating it himself as he moved off. With any luck Zelda's insides wouldn't be to different from Ruto's insides. He could find a burp chamber and have Zelda burp him up (He would apologize to her about that later)

Link: It's not a perfect plan but I don't have much else to go on I suppose.

So Link began his adventure in the belly of Zelda

Authors note: For those of you playing along at home. For the most part this chapter syncs up with the prievous chapter. When Ruto burped is when she burped up Link and then Zelda drank him by accident (or design?)

Soooo yeah I realize this story has gotten a touch fanficcy and mvoed away from the realms of fetishy. I do apologize this was not my design when I started writing. This story sort of ran away from me and yeah I'm rather enjoying the whole thing.

So yeah if any of you have anything you wish to say about this work I'd love some feedback. If you hate it and hate my writing style then please inform me. I'll take any and all criticism. Just drop me a little writing.com mail thing and I promise to read it.

Sooo uhhh for those of you reading it I thank you. If you enjoy it I promise to continue if yall hate it... then I'll sort of stop.

But enough of my ranting
1131121112111111122112111111.title: Out of body experience

choices: Malon is happy to see Link and they engage in conversation
Malon sees Link only as food and attempts to eat him.
11311211121111111221121111111.content:
Link groaned as he trudged through Zelda's massive belly. This was most assuredly different from Ruto's gut. There were no side chambers no different paths to take. Heck no monsters had even shown up in there. Ruto's belly was like a dungeon Zelda's... more of a giant empty plain.

He sighed he missed his wife's stomach. Hell he missed his wife. While he liked Zelda well enough he loved his wife. As massive as she was. He began to wonder if he would ever get out of here. Would he ever see his wife again?

Link shook his head he couldn't begin to think such thoughts. No rather he had to keep himself motivated. He would figure a way out of here. It might take him a lot of time but he would figure a way out eventually.

Another loud gulp from up above signaled the arrival of more of the food. He sighed he wasn't hungry. He could only hope that maybe in her now stuffing herself phase Zelda would eat to much and accidentally let loose a belch and he could use that to escape. At this point he had given up on finding a burp chamber with which to make Zelda burp.

He sighed when suddenly he heard a massive burp. He blinked his eyes in surprise. Was that Zelda? No it didn't feel like when Ruto burped when he was traveling her innards it was to close. Like it was coming from... within Zelda's belly. But that couldn't be possible.

Another massive burp echoed throughout the stomach. No it was definiatly coming from within Zelda's stomach. He quickly ran towards where he believed the burp had been coming from. He skidded to a stop when he saw a massive form before him. It was huge slightly smaller then his wife when she first ate him all that time ago.

He blinked his eyes quickly when he realized that this was a person. Not only that he recognized this person.

It was Malon! The red headed farm girl of whom he had met several times in the past. Now he was confused how had she gotten in here. Not only that but... how had she gotten so huge.

He slowly approached her and realized right away that Malon was quickly scarfing down all the food that she could get her hands on. Well that was certinally one explanation as to how she got so large.

Malon paused in her binge to pat her stomach before unleashing another monster of a belch. This one shaking the entire stomach!

*on the outside*

Zelda paused in her eating as her stomach let out an odd sounding gurgle. She placed her hand on it gently. Blushing profusly as she looked over to Ruto to see if the fat Zora Queen had heard the noice eminating from her stomach. Luckily for her the Queen was to busy stuffing herself with food to notice Zelda's lapse in manners.

Zelda sighed in relief. It was so strange that her stomach would occasionally let out such odd noises. At any rate there was no way she was going to lose to Ruto!

So Zelda threw herself back at the food.

*Back in her stomach*

Malon sighed and nodded her seemingly proud of the size and volume of the belch that she had just emitted.

Link: ... Malon? Is that you?

Malon paused and looked down gasping as she saw Link.

Malon: Fairy boy...?
11311211121111111221121111111.title: Shocking discovery in the belly

choices: Malon's Idea 1
Malons Idea 2
113112111211111112211211111111.content:
Malon blinks a few more times in surprise looking down at Link

Malon: What are you doing here in Zelda's tummy?

Link raises his eye brow slightly

Link: I was in my wife's stomach then she burped me out, I landed in Zelda's drink and well she drank me up. The better question is how long have you been in Zelda's stomach and also... how did you get so...

Link wasn't one hundred percent sure how to broach the subject of her being well

Malon: Fat?

Link nearly face faulted with the how blunt she was about it. Malon giggled slightly and slapped her gigantic stomach

Malon: Don't need to dance around the subject Fairy boy. I'm proud of my size. Now as for how long I've been in Zelda's stomach well... I don't really have a concept of time down here. Could be a few hours for all I know.

Link rubs his chin and nods his head.

Link: Well we last saw Zelda a few months ago and she was still skinny. Now well she's simply huge I mean she makes Ruto look skinny and that's no easy feat.

Malon chuckles and rubs the back of her head.

Malon: Then I've probably been in here for a few weeks. Lets see Zelda was probably like 400-500 pounds when she ate me.

Malon rubs her multiple chins deep in thought. Link blinks a few times looking at Malon

Link: Wait a second if Zelda was only like 400-500 pounds how in goddesses name did she eat you?

Malon blinks and looks up at link.

Malon: Oh well... uhhh funny story. You see as it turns out just about any one can cast magic... okay this is kind of a long story so let me start from the beginning.

Malon coughs into her flabby fist

Malon: Alright so when Zelda heard about how big Ruto was getting and then how you and her got married and blah blah blah. She got well jealous. Not sure if becausee of you and her or if because the Zora people where suddenly in the lime light. Either way Zelda wanted to get fatter and came to me... not sure why she came to me now that I think about it buuut I'm getting off topic.

Link tilted his head watching Malon ramble. He was a bit concerened with this Zelda being jealous thing but he wasn't going to interupt.

Malon: So yeah as it turns out I happened to have this special milk that is super high in fat and basically Zelda commiosioned me and my farm to begin producing this in mass for her. So hey she paid a lot of money and we did. Still I'm assuming there is more to it then just the milk. My guess is she found a spell to increase her weight gain. Anyways on one of my delieveries I happened to sneak a visit into the royal library annnnnnd I found a book as it turns out some spells can be cast by anyone... long story short I shrung myself. I was to small to move the pages so I went to find Zelda. As it turns out she was busy eating food. I tried to get her attention and... well one thing lead to another and she ate me. I've been in here ever since.

Malon takes a deep breathe after finishing the story. Link merely blinked a few times in something along the lines of shock

Link: Wait... you were shrunk... did the spell ever...

Malon giggles and shakes her head.

Malon: Nope the spell never wore off I'm still I guess shrunk though you wouldn't know it by looking at me.

She giggles again looking down at the practically tiny Link.

Malon: I mean look at you Link you are pretty much bite size. I could eat you up. Heheheh don't worry I won't though.

Link chuckles and nods his head sitting down in Zelda's tummy and rubs his head.

Link: Well then how do we get out of here Malon?

Malon: I dunno to be honest I'm kind of okay with it. Zelda eats a lot and well it's done wonders for my figure. Though given how big her belly is she must be huge by now.

Link: Well as much fun as touring Zelda's innards are I'd really REALLY like to get out of here and return to my wife.

Malon: hmmmm I think I have an idea actually

Malon focused and placed both of her hands on her large stomach. Concentrated when she felt the pressure rises she opened her mouth and... what came out would barely qualify as a hiccup for a woman of normal stature. Malon frowned slightly looking down at her stomach.

Link: ummm Malon... Not for not but why are you stalling.

11311211121111111221121111111112.title: Well this is awkward

choices: Ruto wins
Zelda wins
113112111211111112211211111111121.content:
Hello everyone this is the author of this particular substory Seproth/Angel. Unfortunately I confess that I don't have much of a chapter here. I wanted to do more on the royal feast but no version of myself writing it ended in anything other then a branching chapter which I'm not dreadfully happy with. While I could simplify this by just going with the person I decided was the winner I ultimately didn't like forcing that upon you the readers. Since while I am writing most of this particular story this is still an open "campfire" story line where anyone can chip in and I feel forcing this takes away from that. So instead of forcing a decision and instead of boring you with a mere who is the winner chapter. I instead decided to take this opportunity to discuss a few things about the "world" I sort of created. So this will be a bit of an... I suppose behind the scene's esq chapter along with a few ideas I had but ultimately scrapped. Which will ultimately end in a branching chapter. While I probably won't update the branch at this time. I will instead tell you that I intend to update the path that is Ruto winning the eating contest.

So first and foremost I guess I want to discuss my thought process on how this all sort of works. After all Ruto, Zelda, and even Malon are fairly gigantic far more then would be considered reasonable (especially in Zelda's current state.) Essentially I have just applied an MST3K mantra to the whole thing. Just don't think about it. More then anything while writing I instead tend to view it as Link has been shrunk and all the girls are on the heavy side.

For those of you who know the Zelda lore this particular story line takes place during the Childhood timeline. At which point I give it about 15 years following the events of Link ratting Gannondorf out and him being banished to the Twilight realm. So I estimate everyone to be in their mid 20's at this point.

So in my cannon here Link and Ruto are sort of a child hood friend romance story. In that after Link's ratted Gannondorf out he would often visit the Zora domain and hang out with Ruto. Who at the time he considered only a friend. (being to young and somewhat immature to really reciprocate her feelings) Ruto for her part mostly acted the role of a Tsundere often times being somewhat mean and bullying Link though occasionally being sweet on him. When Ruto first started putting on weight (I estimate around 5-6 years post Link ratting out Gannondorf) Link would often visit and be bewildered by just how much weight Ruto was putting on (Not to mention how much she could eat.) Ruto herself merely brushed it off. It would be another couple of years before we hit the the part where this story first happened (Namely Ruto accidentally eating Link) at which point Link and Ruto where around about 18-19. They would be married about a year after she first ate him. By the time the story started properly (when Zelda showed up) They had been married for about 5 years and where jointly ruling the Zora domain.

For the most part their rule is looked upon as a favorable one. Though there are some staunch traditionalists who view their union as blasphemy. For the most part they have near universal praise and the Zora domain is becoming quite prosperous as a result.

As a queen Ruto is a somewhat hot blooded (fitting her tomboy nature) and at times aggressive diplomat ruling more off of emotion then anything else. Whereas Link is the one who sits down and more willing to talk things out. They also work well together each one knowing when their particular brand of diplomacy will be better suited for the time. Ruto is not above using her intimidating size and somewhat fearsome reputation to bully some hard headed diplomats. Whereas Link is more then willing to use his status as a hero to get what he wants.

While there is no cannon proof that the Zora and Goron's don't get along. I decided to play with the whole Elf vs Dwarf trope. With the Zora clearly being the elves and the Goron's clearly being Dwarves. So it's thanks to Link that these two races are actually performing trade with one another. Whereas before they would never dare trade in the past (what they trade... I have no idea lol)

As for the rest of Link's sort of harem. Zelda is happy for her friends though somewhat sad that Link chose Ruto over her. Malon hasn't given up hope that she can win Link anyways. Saria who has yet to appear though I have plans for is more then happy for her best friend. The two often spend time together to talk (When Link isn't busy playing around in his wife's stomach)

As for Ruto's belly. It is actually bigger on the inside then one would think. I have applied a lot of bizarre alien biology to it. I have given the Zora people a unique internal structure. That changes as they get larger. Especially in their females who tend to be on the plus size... in this world. All Zora regardless of size can swallow people whole if need be. Without even showing signs that they did. So even a super skinny Zora can swallow a full size person and show no signs (their insides even being big enough for the person to stand up in if need be) This stands at odds with every other races insides. Which look more like a perfectly normal humans... Though less immediately fatal.

An idea I had been playing with but ultimately scraped was the idea that Zelda wasn't actually fat but had cast an illusion on herself to make herself appear to be the size she was at. Though when I decided that Malon would be inside Zelda's stomach I decided better not. I had wanted to do this because I wanted a scene later in the story in which most of the main females from Ocarina of Time would have a sort of girl's only slumber party and Ruto (being by far the largest in this scenario) would accidentally eat everyone. Though I may not completely scrap that idea (She can totally eat Saria who is her perfectly normal size making her... an ant in among giants)

Another idea I had was the idea that there was a parasite monster inside Ruto that would find her "hunger gland" and begin messing with it causing Ruto to go on an eating rampage. This would happen while Link was still trapped in Zelda's stomach so the drama would come from trying to get Link out of Zelda's stomach and into Ruto's to destroy the monster before Ruto does some serious harm. While I confess I may still go through with this. I feel the story has already been done to death in this soooo I ultimately probably will abandon it. Though I may bring it up if ideas run short.

As for whether or not Ruto is pregnant as some seem to believe well... That's a secret :)

At any rate I thank all of you who have read this story. It means a lot to me as I have put a bit of actual effort into writing it. For those who you have enjoyed it I apologize for the lack of updates I am SUPER busy in my real life (also one chapter I was writing got accidentally deleted near the end of it. So I sorta went nuts and took a break lol) and because of that I got super bad writing block especially with this particular chapter of the end of the eating contest. Don't worry though I finally got my shit together and I promise to start pumping out updates on a maybe weekly basis.

So one again thank you all. I hope you enjoy this sort of author's note chapter or found it interesting.
113112111211111112211211111111121.title: Meanwhile back at the Royal feast

choices: Zelda loses the fight however...
Zelda manages to keep it in.
1131121112111111122112111111111211.content:
Authors note: Okay I promise this will be short and sweet. I just wanna apologize to everyone that the last chapter was supposed to be changed to Author's note but there was a slight fowl up with my computer. So I do apologize for that.

Righty right now then on with the show.

----------------

Ruto hastily shoveled another mouthful of at this point she wasn't even sure into her mouth. She wasn't even bothering to taste it anymore. She swallowed it down swiftly. She placed a hand on her stomach and groaned. She hadn't felt this full since she started putting on weight back in the early days. She patted her stomach glancing up at Zelda who herself seemed to have slowed down as well. She wasn't sure how long they had been at it... or how even the cooks kept up with them. Nor did she truly care all that mattered to her was beating Zelda. She'll be damned if she allows anyone to out eat her. Even one of her dear friends. She had a reputation.

Also... she didn't want to be at Zelda's mercy. Sure Zelda was a kind soul... but Ruto knew there was a devious side in there somewhere. She'd be damned if she let it hit her. Ruto's stomach let out a groan signaling it had nearly enough. She glanced down at it and gently cooed at it in an attempt to soothe it. On the other hand it looked a bit bigger from all the food she'd been eating. She smirked if nothing else she would put on quite a few tons after this meal. With renewed confidence (and a bit excited at the thought of messing Link who was by now no doubt running into the massive amounts of food she'd been eating) began again.

For her part Zelda groaned she was not a big eater. Most of the weight she put on was through... Well calling it cheating would be uncharitable. Most of the meals Zelda ate were still relatively small. On top of which she never ate this fast. Her stomach was simply put not prepared for what was happening. Already she was starting to feel.. not just full but downright bloated. It hurt she wasn't sure she could take much more of this. Still she continued eating as fast as she could. Eat through the pain. After all no pain no gain

*Inside Zelda's stomach*

Malon marveled at all the food around her. She had never seen the stomach so packed before. Malon licked her lips as she continued stuffing herself on Zelda's meal. Hey what Zelda didn't know wouldn't hurt her. At that moment an odd groaning noise vibrated the place the force of it vibrated Malon sending the now super obese farm girl into a jiggling fit. She giggled enjoying the feeling. From within she could hear Link call up to her.

Link: Please tell me that was you and you are about to burp?

Malon huffed and placed her hands on her stomach.

Malon: Hush you and no that wasn't me heheheheh that was Princess Zelda's tummy. I have to tell you I've never seen quite the bounty in here before. It's like heaven. Though I think she's reaching her limit.

*back with Zelda and Ruto*

That was it... Zelda thought placing a hand on her stomach as it began to groan and gurgle angrily at her. She placed her final bite down and looked up to Ruto honestly impressed that the Zora queen was still able to put away so much. She had even eaten far more then her at the start of this whole competition. Ruto paused and glanced up noticing Zelda's gaze on her. A smirk forming on the Queen's face. Zelda sighed as she took in the image of the massive queen. The fancy dress and all the make up she had bothered to put on ruined by way ward crumbs and other food stuffs.

Ruto: Don't tell me Princess you are throwing in the towel.

Zelda: I dare say Queen Ruto you have bested me at this challenge I am quite impressed.

Zelda winced and placed a hand on her stomach a tingling pain of fullness shooting through her. Her stomach groaned and gurgled again.

Ruto: YES! Hahahaha I have to say princess victory is honestly delicious.

Zelda chuckled and shook her head.

Zelda: Yes of course my Ruto I imagi -urp-

Zelda blushed fiercely as her hands quickly were brought up to her mouth. Her face flushed a deep pink at her sudden outburst... Even though it was barely audible. Of course Ruto picked up on it and burst into a powerful laughter.

Zelda; My apologies... I-I do not know where that came from.

Ruto was clutching the sides of her massive stomach trying her best to regain her composure.

Ruto: Hahahaha I'll say you owe me an apology that was pathetic. Hahahahaha ahhh I was about to say at any rate there was one last thing I needed to do.

Ruto began rubbing her stomach a massive gurgle rang out from deep within. Ruto tightened up for a moment before unleashing a massive belch. This one not only shook the table they were sitting on but could be heard out on the castle streets making some wonder if some sort of thunderstorm was brewing (or perhaps a monster attack. Either way panic in the streets) Once the belch subsided (and the ringing in Zelda's ears died out) Ruto gleefully patted her stomach and let out another boisterous laugh.

Ruto: Now that my dear princess is how you celebrate a powerful feast. With an equally powerful Belch.

Zelda: .. Charming...!!

Zelda made a face and placed her hand on her stomach. Another gurgle this one quite different from before emanated from her stomach. She swallowed nervously as she felt it move inside her stomach. Ruto for her part noticed the look on Zelda's face and smirked.

Ruto: Ahhh it would seem your belly agrees with me Zelda.

Zelda couldn't do it she couldn't contain it any longer. Not that she would say that she hadn't gone down easily. No Zelda had her pride. She would not lose to a burp of all things she was the Princess of Hyruke future Queen. She had her manners to think about it. She took a few throaty swallows in a vein hope that this would quell the storm within her.

To be honest if anything it feels like it made it worst. She attempted to open her mouth perhaps in an attempt to speak or perhaps the force of what came next simply forced her mouth open. Either way Zelda burped. Not just any burp mind you. One for the record books. Easily eclipsing any that Ruto had unleashed during their time here. If anything whatever mirth had been on the Zora's face before hand was gone simply replaced with sheer amazement as Zelda. Perhaps the most feminine woman she had ever met unleashed... what could only be described as a force of nature. The burp flipped the table and nearly knocked the massive Zora queen over. It was all Ruto could do not to be tipped over by the sheer force of belly winds as they flowed from Zelda's mouth.

*Inside her stomach*

As though it wasn't strong enough on the outside. Inside was something else entirely. As Malon could actually feel the force of the belch lift her off her grand ass.

Malon: I-I can't believe this!!

Was all Malon could shriek as she was sent hurtling out of Zelda's stomach.

Link: I... I'm not even sure how to react anymore.

Was all he could mutter even as he bounced around the insides of Malon's stomach

*Outside of Zelda*

Zelda's belch had continued now long into the 15 second mark. It was still going strong. When it suddenly very rapidly died off. Instead she began to gag. Ruto who was still somewhat awe struck noticed this. Rushing over to the Princess side she began to pound on Zelda's back.

Ruto: I have to say princess you must have belched up like your whole meal. Don't you dare die on me like this!

With one more strong slap to Zelda's back. The force dislodged whatever had been stuck in Zelda's throat and sent it crashing into the floor like some sort of massive rock. Zelda took a few deep breathes before letting out the rest of the belch.

Ruto: Wow... You scared the hell out of me...

She'll look over to where Zelda had coughed up whatever it was that had clogged up her throat. Blinking in surprise at what she saw.

Zelda: W-WHAT!

Zelda shouted looking down to see the somewhat massive Malon laying on the floor looking dazed.

Ruto: What the hell...

Malon: Ugh... Wh.. Where am I... Why is it so bright

Her eyes blinked rapidly as she tried to readjust to the sudden brightness of the light. She had spent some time in Zelda's stomach where there was no light. So needless to say even the now dimly lit room was nearly blinding to her.

Zelda: Malon... What are you doing here.. .Where did you... Did you...

She placed her hand on her massive stomach. Quickly looking back and forth between her stomach and Malon.

Ruto: ... I'm not even sure... What just happened... Did you just burp up Malon? How... did that even... Are your burps like some sort of teleportation spell or something... Is that why you never burp!

Zelda shoots Ruto a quick glare and then glares down at Malon. Who seemed to finally be orienting herself.

Malon: Uhhhh... Hello Princess Zelda... Queen Ruto... How have you two been? Heheheh... This is all very awkward I'll... Just head ou...

She slowly backed away until she felt an incredible wall of flesh. She chuckled and lightly groped at it. Looking up she noticed that somehow Ruto had gotten behind her. Ruto was staring down at the tiny farm girl a mixture of a glare and a confused stare.

Zelda for her part slowly dusted herself off and stared down at Malon a sweet look on her face. That somehow immediately put Malon on edge.

Malon: W-Well you see Princess. Okay soitwaslikeafewmonthsagowhenyouwerejuststartingtogainImayhavefoundthisspellthats hrunkmeandwellImayhaveshrunkmyselfanduhhhyoumayhaveaccidentallyeatenme....Hehehe h yeah... So I uhhh have been in your belly all this time.

Zelda: I see well then I am glad you have been honest and open with me.

Malon: R-really... I'm not going to be in trouble for this.

Zelda: Oh of course you are.

Malon sighed and lowered her head in defeat.

Zelda: Though I confess this does explain a bit.

Malon suddenly clutches her stomach and glances around at the two royals around her. Nervously... sheepishly she begins to smile.

Malon: Well ya see... There's a bit more I uhhh heheheh WELL ummm okay...

Malon opened her mouth to speak then promptly shut it. Lets Pro/Con this whole... Telling Princess Zelda and Queen Ruto that I ate Link thing. Pro: I'm sure they will figure out a way to get him out of my stomach unharmed and he'll stop complaining. Con: They are totally gonna kill me. Uhhh I do enjoy the whole living thing. Okay so here's what you are going to do Malon. You are going to lie to them. Then you are going to go back to the farm. Work up the most epic belch ever get Link out of your stomach. Trade some favors so he never speaks of this to Queen Ruto and uhh live happily ever after weighing like a few tons. Sounds great. Malon nods her head enthusiastically. Zelda coughed into her hand re grabbing Malon's attention. "So you were saying something about there being more? I would love to hear this more my dear Malon." Zelda spoke in a rather serene tone of voice. That just underneath Malon could sense a twinge of venom.

Zelda tilts her head slightly to the right. Well that was unexpected. She slowly looks over to Ruto. A number of questions were going through Zelda's mind right now. One: How did Link end up in Malon's stomach when he was supposedly ill back at the Zora domain. Two: Was she going to have to throw herself between Ruto and Malon. Zelda took a long look at Ruto's face. She was going through several emotions it would seem.

Ruto finally settled on annoyance. "I burped him out at the beginning of the feast and he ended up in your cup just as you drank from it Zelda. He washed up in your stomach. Couldn't reach you. At the same time he lost all the tools in my stomach... That'll be fun later. Found Malon in there. Malon then ate him in some sort of strange belief that by doing so she can help him escape your stomach while hiding the fact that she was in there." Ruto closed her eyes and nodded her head sagely. Before they snapped open and stared down at Malon. "Did I miss anything."

Malon blinked a few times before slowly almost mechanicaly nodding her head. "I had hoped that I could burp him out... Problem is I suddenly haven't been able to burp despite being like suuuuper good at it." She rubs her stomach slowly. "Well since the cat is out of the bag and I'm sure you two want to kill me or something... Uhh maybe you can help me get him out."

"Well Malon do you remember that shrinking spell you used initially to get into my stomach?" Zelda looked down at Malon expectantly. When Malon gave the appropriate response... she suddenly paled. Realizing what Zelda must've been getting at. "Well I have some news for you. The spell does have a time limit. So if you were sitting there thinking that you were still shrunken and weighed some unfathomable number of tons more... You are mistaken." Malon sighed and looked down... So it was official she was the lightest of the three. She would have to redouble her efforts... Why was this a contest? "However I feel as though... a bit of a... turn about is only fair play. You spent time in my stomach eating all my food... I feel as though it's only fair that I repay the favor. Think of it this way you are getting off light. I mean I'm just going to go in there grab Link. Use a teleportation spell then warp us out. You probably won't even know we were in there.

Malon's eyes brightened up slightly. She was getting off light. "Oh of course Princess Zelda! I will gladly help you in saving my friend Link from my digestive system. Granted I think he's safe... He has been shouting at me for awhile now though... Bit strange hearing a voice come from the inside of your stomach."

Ruto shrugs her shoulders. "Ehhh I'm used to it but then Zora biology is probably considered strange to you non Zora." She pats her stomach enthusiastically. "I mean after all my belly is like a massive dungeon that Link is constantly exploring heheheheh... Ya know I feel this is a good learning experience Zelda. Think that shrinking spell can work on two?" She looks over to Zelda who smirks and nods her head. "Wonderful well Malon I hope you don't mind having three people in there." She reaches down and pokes Malon's stomach giggling as it starts to jiggle in response.

Zelda clasps her hands together. "Right then lets do this." Zelda moves next to Ruto and places her hand on the Zora's shoulder. She begins to mutter incantations of power slowly a blue light envelops both of them.

Malon gasps as she watches them begin to shrink before her eyes until they are suddenly teeny tiny (well compared to her at any rate). Zelda and Ruto look at the now massive Malon who was moments ago smaller then the both of them. Malon reaches down and picks them both up. "Woooow you two look soooo small. I wonder if this is how small I got..." Malon giggles and brings them up to her face. "Right then lets get this over with." She opens her mouth wide and drops the both of them into her mouth. She wastes very little time swallowing them both down. Before grimacing slightly. "Ugh Link tasted much better then them two."

She rubs her stomach slowly as she feels the two drop in. Eliciting a very mild belch from her. She simply sighs. "Lame..."

Deep within Malon's stomach.

Link sighs as he leans against the stomach walls. "Ugh to think when I was younger I thought being eaten by a Whale would be the weirdest thing I'd ever do... If only they had warned me then..." He sighs again before slowly looking up. Seeing a pair of massive forms falling from the sky and landing right in front of him with a powerful splash. Getting digestive juice all over him. He wipes his face off. "Not the most graceful of landings ladies."

He smirks as he watches Ruto slowly get up from the impact. She glances around seeming to take the pulsing organ in. "Well this is different it's like... One huge sack. Like I don't see anything resembling connecting paths or alternate chambers. Man you Hylians are boring." She looks over to Link and proceeds to bound over to her husband and tackling him to the ground pinning him under her still considerable weight. "Oh Link I've missed you so much! Also I don't think we've been the same size in forever it's so weird to be eye level with you."

Trapped beneath the butter ball that is her wife he could only grunt out a small reply. Ruto snickers before slowly rising up. Allowing Link to breathe. "Thank you... Also yeah it is nice to be eye level. Though I confess I already miss your far more grand size."

Zelda clears her throat drawing attention from the pair. "Not to ruin this reunion but I believe you wish to leave?" Ruto and Link look at each other and nod their heads. "I promise you have sometime before the spell wears off so you two can enjoy being the same size later. I'd rather not have to witness it." Zelda walks mutters something under her breathe before approaching the pair. Placing her hands on their shoulders. "Well then lets go."

Zelda begins speaking the incantation for the spell

113112111211111112211211111111121112221.content:
Malon sighed as she gently drummed her fingers against her large belly. It was dreadfully boring while waiting for her friends to rescue her other friend from her belly. She grumbled moodily under her breathe. "All this because I couldn't burp!" She frowns and let's out a big sigh. I mean it shouldn't be that hard, she'd been doing it her whole life. Proudly could she out burp any one else she'd ever known.

She crossed her arms and breathed out an annoyed breathe. "I think I'll explore the castle. That at least should give me something to do while waiting for them to get back." She grins pleased with her decision. Who knows maybe she would find something to eat while wandering around. She pats her belly lovingly she was apparently way behind Ruto and Zelda in terms of weight. She would strive to fix that. Time to find some food.

So she began her lumbering exploration. The castle was huge. So many rooms and side chambers. How was she supposed to find the kitchen or dining area... Wait she'd been in the dining area. "... Crap. I forgot to see if there were any leftovers." She sighed. Well the table had been flipped she thought quietly to herself. What leftovers would have been knocked on the floor. Probably best not to eat floor food if one was to be honest with themselves. On the other hand she had spent the last few months in Zelda's belly eating her food. No floor food was probably a worst decision then... ABC food.

She hummed quietly to herself. Malon couldn't believe how wide these halls where. I mean Malon was a very large girl and she still had plenty of space to walk around. She wondered how the servants managed to navigate this place. Come to think of it she hadn't seen any maids or butlers or any kind of servant for that matter. "Does anyone actually live/work here?" She asked aloud. No response. She frowns "How very lonely... Such a large castle and Zelda lives here all alone..." She was making herself sad. She shook her head.

She wasn't sure how long she had been walking for when she stumbled across an interesting looking room. She glanced around and entered. There were books everywhere. She whistled as she glanced at all the books. "Guess this is Zelda's personal library. Heheh a nerd like her would gather up a ton of books." She giggles lightly to herself reaching out and grabbing one. It was some dusty old arcane looking book. She opened it up to a random page. "Hmmm..." She wasn't the most learned girl having grown up on a farm and all. Yet she recognized a spell when she saw one. Then again she had cast a shrinking spell on herself some time ago. What led her to her brief stay in Zelda's tummy. She snapped her fingers. "That's right Zelda did say I could cast some magic. Hmmm... Well I mean wha's the worst that could happen. All I have to do is read this old word stuff. I can do that!" So Malon went about casting the spell. It took her a few tries and botch pronunciations. Surprisingly this did not lead to her exploding or something. Lucky her at last however she was able to properly cast the spell.

Her body began to glow a strange red color upon it's completion. "Uhhh... Maybe this was a bad idea..." She said at last

1131121112111111122112111111111211122211.content:
Ruto stretched as she wandered in what to her eyes was a large empty sack. "This sucks, there isn't a single monster or interesting thing about a hylian stomach. I was hoping to find like an organ I could mess with. But there's nothing, Nadia, zilch." Ruto shakes her head and looks over to her husband. "Though I'm willing to bet that this makes you all the happier with your marriage choice eh?" She gives him a cheeky grin. his only response is a shrug. "Because being eaten by you is the only reason I married you my dearest Ruto." Link sparked back. Returning her grin with one of his own.

Ruto favored him with a look and then burst out laughing. "Fair enough I suppose. You choose me for my award winning personality. I know, I know. It's hard being this perfect." She says while striking a pose sending her multi-ton body jiggling and quivering everywhere. Link began to fan himself lightly. "It's a bit warm in here don't you think?" He asks not quite looking at his wife. Who was at this point clearly trying to get a rise out of him.

She smirks proud to call herself the victor of this round. She pauses and place a hand on her stomach. There was that odd feeling again. Link notices this and approaches her. He place his hand on her stomach now being more or less the same size he could better gauge if anything was going on inside her. "You've been having these feelings for the last few days. I didn't find anything to interesting last time I was in there." Link glances around and lowers his voice. "Is it the children?"

Ruto shakes her head. "No it's not them. This feels like it's coming from my stomach. I am worried it's a different kind of Parasite." She rests her hand over her husbands hand feeling her belly. "I am worried it's putting Mipha and Sidon in danger." She mutters quietly to her husband. Link frowns and nods his head. He'd have to be more diligent in tracking down this elusive threat. He was not about to put his unborn children in danger due to his negligence.

He opens his mouth to speak. "There you two are!" Zelda shouts as she waddles over to the pair. Panting as she approaches them she stops to begin to catch her breathe. "Why did you two just wander off and leave me! Do you have any idea how foolish and dangerous that is!" Zelda angrily chides the pair. Before taking a deep breathe and calming herself.

"Relax, Zelda I had to speak with my husband about a private matter. It's not like you are in any danger. Seriously there is no threat. I mean her stomach acid's don't even burnt. This place is boring." She mutters stomping her foot into the squishy belly floor as she says this.

Zelda's right eye twitches ever so slightly. "You do realize that our shrinking spell has a time limit, right?" She asks shaking her head. "So it's not me you are putting in danger but Malon! Since I seem. To be struggling to cast my teleportation spell I am going to have to recast the shrine don't regrow inside her! I needn't remind you of the disastrous consequences of that!"

Ruto was going to respond. I mean Zelda had a solid point. However her words stopped dead in her tracks when she noticed that Zelda was now glowing blue. "Uhhh... Zelda... Why are you glowing?"

Zelda looked down at her arms and saw the strange blue glow around her. Her eyes widened in a slight panic. This was definitely not good.
