Malon looked at her glowing arms with a notable amount of worry. She hadn't felt weird yet it was still very unusual to be glowing a red color. "Uhhh so does it only make me glow orrrr..." She placed a hand to her head as her whole world began to spin rapidly. She shook her head in an attempt to regain her bearings but that only made the sensation worst.

She rested her hands on the table to steady herself. She groaned as her vision began to fade. Casting a spell was a big mistake. As all this happened the red aura that had surrounded her seemed to shrink into her stomach. All the while a blue aura began to grow out of it.

Meanwhile in her stomach.

Zelda was suffering from similar effects. Ruto rushed over to support her friend. "Zelda what the hell is happening to you?"

She didn't get any response as Zelda began to fade from conciseness. The blue aura that had surrounded Zelda's body slowly began sink into Malon's stomach. While a red aura seemed to emerge from the walls and attach itself to Zelda.

It slowly seeped into Zelda's body as the last bit of conciseness faded from her. Ruto and Link could only look at their friend in concern. Link rushed over and checked to see if Zelda still had a heartbeat and to his relief she did indeed. "Well what do we do now..." Link mutters looking over to his wife who could only shrug in response. "Well hopefully she comes to before the two of us make a rather messy departures from Malon's innards."

As those words left her lips elda began to stir. Causing the married couple to sigh in relief. Link kneeled next to Zelda. "Are you feeling okay Zelda?" He asked with concern in his voice.

Zelda blinked a few times looking up at Link. Confusion taking over her features. She began to glance around. "Where are we? What... Why do I sound so weird?" Zelda says placing a hand to her multiple chins. Only then does she seemingly notice the gloves on her hands.

Link and Ruto exchange a confused look before looking back to Malon. "Zelda... Are you feeling okay?" Link asks. Staring at the Princess.

Zelda looks up at Link. She blinks a few times. "Fairy boy... What are you talking about. I'm not Zelda. It's me Malon."

Link and Ruto exchange another set of confused looks.


Outside Malon's stomach

Malon slowly opened her eyes blinking a few times. "Wh-where am I..." She glances around the library. Before biting her lip. "Oh no... This isn't good..." SHe mutters rising up to her full her height. She looked around and spotted a nearby mirror. Rushing over as fast as her weight would allow. She looked into and uttered a silent curse. The face that looked back at her was indeed Malon's. Just as she feared. The once Princess now farm girl could only curse her fate. Before placing both her hands on her stomach. "They are still inside... Me... I don't have much time. This is so typical of her!"

Authors note: Why hello everyone. I couldn't resist doing a good old fashioned body swap. While having an exciting *as much as my garbage writing allows* Endo adventure/race against the clock.. Thing... Ehhh. Anywho so there is no confusion *oh there will be confusion* I want to inform you how I tend towards writing body swap stories. Basically I like to write the body of the person over the soul. So basically Malon in Zelda's body will be referred to as Zelda and Zelda in Malon's body will be referred to as Malon. My reasoning being that it helps me visualize the body swap better.

Anywho I hope you enjoy. The exits are that way for the emergency escape you all are probably looking to do!

Ruto's stomach was divided into chambers, much like the stomach of Lord Jabu-Jabu. These chambers were 20 feet wide and perhaps 30 feet high. Ruto's stomach looked just like the stomach of Lord Jabu-Jabu, except for the jellyfish. All the chambers were slick in moisture and Link didn't find the air stale. He could hear Ruto's steady heartbeat from somewhere, and he continued to explore. One chamber had a hidden cave down in a small lake of water. Link's boots made squishy sounds as he walked in the chambers inside Ruto.
Ruto's stomach gurgled and made other noises all the while.

113112111211121221221.content:
After walking up to the rather intriguing-looking stomach gland Link did his best to lightly poke it with his finger.

Sighing in relief he wiped a bead of sweat from his forehead, having remembered that one crazy gland in Jabu-Jabu that ended up attacking him as a kid, the young hero was glad no combat would come from this encounter.

Regardless he was curious about it and ultimately decided to question Ruto. Perhaps she knew what it did.

"Hey Ruto can you hear me?!"

A few seconds passed before a response came, "Go ahead, Link.", apparently the Zora Queen was enjoying a snack and by snack we're talking about six or so barrels filled to the brim with fresh fish.

"Okay, um listen Ruto...I found this gland inside well...your stomach and I'm wondering if you know what it does? It's thick as a tree and looks pink with a tint of red, any ideas?!"

Once again a short while would pass before Ruto would respond, "...Sorry, outside of what I eat I really don't know what's what inside of me. So can't help you there, Link."

Link sighed before thanking Ruto.

"Well...now what..." He stared at the gland for a moment. "They say curiosity killed the cat but really what's the worse that can happen..."

With a goofy grin Link began to tug away at the gland, oblivious to what was about to occur.

113112112.content:
Zelda stood just outside of the entrance to Zora's domain, she had gotten wind of "the passing of the torch" Ruto had agreed to but being a ruler herself had yet to find time to come see the new Zora Queen.

"I wonder if she's enjoying herself." mumbled Zelda with a bit of a smile. The blond royal had already studied up on Zora tradition and knew that Ruto would not doubt look heftier than before.

Making sure she looked presentable Zelda stepped inside. Moments later she was taken to Ruto's personal chamber, after being introduce, Zelda made her entrance.

"Well now isn't this a surprise?!" Ruto stated with a giggle causing her multiple chins, along with the rest of her blubbery form, to jiggle for a good while.

Composing herself Zelda stood firm trying her best to take in the truly "Queen-Size" female Zora in front of her.

"Ruto...you look well." Zelda giggled somewhat nervously, in all honesty the hylian royal had no clear idea of how to start a conversation so just went with her gut feeling...ironic in a way.

"I am and while there are some cons..." Ruto quickly remembers the "toilet" incident, "Being a Queen to my people is actually rather fun and I actually don't mind being grander than life if it means the prosperity of my fellow Zoras."

Zelda smiled at Ruto, she knew the Zoras were in for a good time with Ruto as ruler.

"On that note I was hoping you'd come by, Zelda." "Why is that?" Zelda's right eyebrow peaking upward as her eyes filled with interest.

"I want you to help me add more girth to my frame!" "You want to become bigger?" asked Zelda questioning the idea of the Zora Ruler.

"Yes! Very much so! For I'm still far too thin." Grabbing a hold of her blue-hued blubber Ruto continued, "As far as records go I'm not even close to breaking the one set by my ancestors. So that's where you come in. Using your magic you think you could whip up a spell that will help me set a new record for "Largest Ruler in Zora History"?"

Zelda thought about the offers for a while, Ruto letting her have all the time she'd need, before coming to a decision.

"Sure" with a whimsical expression on her lips she agreed. "I think I can come up with something simple but effective..."

"Great! And just in time my dinner's coming soon so..."

"Say no more I'll go straight to the kitchen." with a bit of a giggle Zelda was off and Ruto herself couldn't wait for her dinner feast.

Zelda thought it would be best if she tried the spell out on herself before risking the effect on Ruto. For all she knew it could make her lose a bit of weight, and that was a punishment no one deserved. Even if she WAS the size of a flab mountain already. But she loved the stuff so much, she would probably cry if she lost any so Zelda didn't have the heart to do it yet.

While the cooks collected and grilling and of course, fattening there catches of fish, Zelda sneaked a plate of fish away and went into a wide open area. She took out the spell book to make sure she memorized it all then she cast it on the food. She at first thought since she knew what was coming it'd be hard to swallow, but with the first little bite, she suddenly became CRAZY hungry and finished the plate in seconds.She let out a loud belch and with that, she knew it had worked.

The weight gain than suddenly took effect. She had thought if there was one she'd gain maybe 10, 20, or even 100 pounds! 1000 pounds at max if it was especially powerful. But that didn’t happen, she gained way more than 1000 lbs, heck she became bigger than even a good 10000 lbs! Even Ruto would be surprised at this sudden weight gain, and the fatty was waaaayyyyy over 1 million pounds already! When she finally stopped and she was shocked to found she was…

Zelda suddenly gets hungry

Zelda breathed in a slight of relief as her sudden weight gain came to a stop and she found herself the exact same size as Ruto, meaning now she and the Zora Ruler shared the same girth as the fish deity Jabu-Jabu.

As she exalted once again Zelda took notice of the ripple in her mass amount of blubber, even feeling her new sets of chins wiggle after such a basic action.

She realized she could somehow move her fat-ridden arms, Zelda believed it was most likely because of her own massive amount of Sage magic though it now wasn't the only thing massive about her...regardless rubbing the sides of her doughy belly brought out a bit of a coo from her lips.

The blissful moment was short-lived as Zelda snapped back to reality.

"Well I'm glad I choose such a large area to test my magic."

Looking around she noticed that her immense form took every inch of the area, an unused quiet spot toward the deeper in portions of Zora's Domain.

"This was certainly unexpected. I simply wanted to help out Ruto but now I'm as big as she is!" exclaimed Zelda her huge form jiggling from her outburst.

Calming herself down Zelda was glad to see that her attire, through the use of magic, had remain on her. Though it was being stretched like no tomorrow.

"At least I'm decent. Now if I could just move."

She tried her best to getting her massive legs to move even an inch, but alas it was not meant to be what with all the weight from the rest of her form pressing down upon them.

Sighing in disappointment she moved on to Plan B, use her spell book to find some sort of reversing spell.

Her flab had broken free from the confines of the already large area within Zora's Domain that Zelda had tested her spell in and continued to spill over until the Hylian princess covered all of the Domain with her massive bulk!

To say the least Zelda was not only amazed that her handy work had worked so well but the fact that with one spell she ended up even grander then Zora Queen, though it was certainly not her intention to do so.

Speaking of Ruto Zelda wondered what had happen to her and the rest of the Zora tribe as the splashing of the various bodies of water in and around the Domain tickled her immense girth. Her own being shaking like jello from the waves tickling her fat and her own giggling spawned from said tickling.

"I certainly hope Ruto and her people are alright..." mumbled Zelda, her giggle fit had died down but for some reason her body still shook on occasion.

"It must be Ruto and her fellow Zoras!"

Zelda could only wonder if her assumption was correct and the Zora Queen along with the rest of her race had found themselves "swimming" within her fat.

"I do hope they're alright." Zelda sighed into her mass amount of chins as her head sunk slightly in her spell-born girth.

"well hello there, young man. What brings you to me?" The old man greeted him with a mild tone.

"Hi, I'm here on behalf of the new zora leader" Link said as neutral as possible.

"Ohh.. the Zoras" The scientist looked a little dissapointed, but still kept his enthusiastic manner. "So they have elected a new leader? I suspect he is well along with their eating rituals allready?"

"what does she need? I got some pills that makes swallowing large amount of food at once easier.. this potion right here cures any stomach pain.. it hasn't been tested yet, though.." The scientist ranted.

"she actually needs a proper bathroom" Link interupted. "She has outgrown the ones the zoras already use."

"Oh.. she is that big, I see. Hmm... I should be able to fix that, yes" The scientist said unaffected by what his task actually was all about.

"I suggest we do it simple and just dig out a tunnel from her room that will end up in the same stream all the other zoras use when they need to go. I will also construct a seat that will support a massive amount of weight." The scientist explained eagerly.

Link thought this was a nice plan. "I will need some time to plan and sketch the invention. You should go back and tell the queen about how it will go" the scientist continued.

"Thanks for doing this" Link said and got ready to leave "I will however, require a payment" The scientist said. Link halted. "What would it be?" Link asked afraid it would be something he could not afford.

"I'd like to do some research on the queens droppings" The scientist said. "Why?" Link asked. "That would be confidential for now" The scientist replied.

"I keep my cases strictely confidential. This construction you need will be between the queen, you and me. The research however will be between me and me alone. I might let you in on it a little later since you technically, already are involved. But she must not know. and I would prefer it it's as fresh as possible" The scientist finished.

Link could now safely tell that the man would keep everything a secret. He agreed to the premises of the plan and left, but before he left he purchased some of the items the scientist had suggested before in case Ruto would need them later.

"No I'm not" said the Zora. "she ate all of the other Zoras too...I escaped when she wasn't looking at me...I swam through her blubber...We Zora can hold our breath for a really long time...but I thought I would be a goner!"


************************************



After Ruto had finished off her second helping, she noticed that she was right next to Lord Jabu-Jabu himself. Jabu-Jabu looked like a mere worm to the gigantic Ruto. It was then when Ruto remembered a legend that was passed down by the Zora; if someone should eat Lord Jabu-Jabu, then that person would become a god. Ruto didn't really believe in that legend, she was just hungry. So she ate Lord Jabu-Jabu in one gulp.
"Enjoy my stomach, Like I enjoyed yours" chuckled Ruto, patting her great girth.

************


"What do we do now, Fairy boy?" asked Malon.

Link thought about what to do, and came up with an answer.
1131122111.title: The Escaped Cook

choices: Stay with Link and Malon as they met with Zelda
Check up on Ruto and her hunger
11311221111.content:
"Zelda?" questioned Malon her head tilted to one side in a rather cute fashion.

"Yeah, based on what the cook has said meeting with Ruto right now would well just make us a snack what with her growing appetite."

"That's not the only thing that grew..." Malon stated as she poked at Ruto's girth and gasped as her finger nearly sank all the way in.

"Yes I wouldn't do that if I were you, young miss."

Malon nodded to the cook's words of advice and quickly pulled out her finger and walked over to Link's side.

"As I said I was lucky enough to get away from her HIGHness and was quite amazed to find out that swimming through her immense form was equal to swimming out at sea. In any case I believe you should warn the Hylian Princess of Lady Ruto's gluttony."

"Right, we'll do that."

"But what about you...um Mr. Zora?" asked Malon politely as well as concerned for the cook's well-being.

"Don't worry about me if I'm careful enough I believe I can swim through her majesty's fatness and reach the shortcut our kind use to travel to Lake Hylia at a much faster speed."

The cook was about to say his goodbyes when Link stopped him.

"That's no good what if she feels you or something and ends up eating you. Here I'll use my ocarina to wrap you over to the lake."

The cook thanked Link for his kindness, while Malon merely smiled.

'Always looking out for everyone other then yourself huh Fairy Boy.' thought Malon as Link played a special tune and wrapped himself and the cook toward Lake Hylia.

Once he return both Link and Malon were off to see Zelda and discuss what could be done about the domain-sized Ruto.
11311221111.title: Heading off to the castle

choices: Off to Gerudo Valley
Ruto comes to the castle
113112211111.content:
Zelda had, of course, noticed the large bluish orb that now covered Zora's Domain. Se was shocked to discover that the orb was in fact Ruto. Malon and Link had rode to Hyrule Castle in record time and told Zelda about Ruto's gluttony and asked her what they should do next. Zelda thought about what to do and quickly came up with an answer.

"There's a spell I could perform that could shrink her down to size" said Zelda. "but it's very complex. If I say the spell wrongly, then Ruto would get even bigger..."

"That would be bad!" said Malon. "what other choice is there?"

"Well...I could become as big as Ruto is and stop her" said Zelda. "but, I don't wanna crush Hyrule under my great weight..." her voice trailed off and seemed to be very lost in thought.

"Eh..Zelda?" asked Link.

Zelda snapped out of it and looked at Link.

"The spell book that has the shrinking spell in it is located...let's see....um..." said Zelda, as she started to pace the throne room. "oh! Now I remember! The book was stolen by Ganondorf and he took it to Gerudo Desert. Luckily, he couldn't even open the book because he was consumed by evil. Nabooru should know where it is"
113112211111.title: Shrinking Spell

choices: Link and the girls make there safely
Ruto can move and isn't full yet!
1131122111111.content:
"Off to the desert then." stated Link with a pump from his fist.

"Indeed, the sooner we get there the sooner we can end that crazy woman's appetite. I don't wish for her to engorge herself with the rest of our dear country." stated Zelda with a wave of her gloved hand as she took a few steps toward the doorway.

"She's right you know...still I can't believe that...blob out there is actually a person...er fish..um you know what I mean!"

Malon laughed to herself with a slight blush as she stumbled trying to find the right words to describe Ruto.

Link merely nodded with a quick smile and the trio were soon off...

Several hours later Link and the girls found themselves being introduced to Nabooru.

"Man it's hotter then I expected it to be..." mumbled Malon, who had never actually been to the desert prior to today.

"Yes the desert heat can be rather harsh when one isn't used to it."

"Hello Nabooru." exclaimed Zelda with a proper tone and bow. Link and Malon followed in Zelda's example.

"It's a pleasure to see you and Link again, Zelda."

Nabooru exchanged greetings with the hero and princess before eying Malon.

"A friend of ours?"

"Yes she is." stated Link. Zelda nodded as well.

Malon and Nabooru took a moment to introduce themselves to one another afterwards Zelda informed the desert ruler what had brought them all to see her in the first place.

"Hmm...my scouts did mentioned that something out of the ordinary seem to occur over at the domain of the Zoras but I never expected it to be this."

"So you have the book then?" questioned Link.

"Of course. Any and all items Ganondorf and we under his command at the time "acquired" were ultimately housed them here in the fortress. So the spell book should be no different." answered Nabooru before excusing herself to fetch the item in question.

A few minutes later she returned with the book in hand.

"I take it this is the book you seek?"

Handing it over to Zelda she awaited a response. Zelda instantly flipped through the pages and smiled as she spotted the shrinking spell. As fate would have it Zelda spotted a growth spell on the opposite page. After making a mental note of it she closed the book shut.

"Yes it is. You have our thanks, Nabooru." stated Zelda with another bow.

"Glad I could be of service. Just make sure you stop that fish girl from becoming any more of a whale then she already is." commented Nabooru with a rather serious expression.

"I think it's too late for that..." mumbled Malon dryly. Link merely chuckled and nodded.

After saying their goodbyes to the desert queen the trio then set out toward "Ruto's Domain".
1131122111111.title: Off to Gerudo Valley

choices: The spell can only work on females
Ruto spots the trio
11311221111112.content:
While Zelda, Malon and Link were in the desert, Ruto had moved into Hyrule Field. She couldn't move that fast, but that didn't stop her. The hunger she was now feeling was overpowering; it overrode her senses. She was out of her mind with hunger, and she would eat anything and everything that came across her path...which was what happened to a small caravan on its way to Hyrule Castle Town. She gulped down the entire caravan in one quick swallow. Ruto used her Sage powers to lift the caravan up and over her wide-open mouth and dropped them inside. Despite what she had eaten so far, she was still hungry. She could feel the struggles of her Zora subjects within her...faintly. Ruto was heading towards Hyrule Castle itself. The castle looked like a cake to Ruto, and it would be the biggest meal that she had so far.



Link, Malon and Zelda watched as the gigantic Ruto headed for the castle. They were just outside Gerudo Valley, but they could plainly see Ruto already.

"How long does that spell need?" asked Link.

"About five minutes" said Zelda. "it's a long spell"

"We gotta stop her from eating the castle" said Malon. "which she can do in five minutes"

"We need a distraction..." said Link.

"I can make one of you as big as Ruto" said Zelda. "that'll distract her from eating the castle"

"But what about the people?" asked Link. "a lot of..."

"If we do nothing, then Hyrule will be Ruto's snack" said Zelda. "would you like to be in Ruto's stomach? I know I wouldn't"

"Okay" said Link. "since I'm the hero of Hyrule, I should be the one to distract Ruto"

"You just wanna be big, Fairy Boy" giggled Malon.

"Okay, I'll make Link as big as Ruto so he can distract her while I cast the shrinking spell on Ruto" said Zelda.
11311221111112.title: Ruto the Whale

choices: The spell works Malon ends up as large as Ruto
The spell works too well Malon ends up larger then Ruto
113112211111121.content:
"It's not about me wanting to be big, Malon, I guess it's just my inner sense of justice...I can't sit still if something is threatening the mass when I know I can do something to stop it."

"There you go again putting everyone's well-being over your own, Fairy Boy." Malon stated with a giggle and a short shrug of her shoulders.

"It's admirable." Zelda added in, "In any case give me a second or two to start up the spell-cast...Hmm?"

It seem like something had caught Zelda's eye.

"Something a matter?" asked Link.

"Aha well it seems you're going to have to pass up your chance to challenge Ruto, Link."

"What? Why?"

"Simple, the spell only seems to work on the female gender..." Zelda's voice trailed off for a moment for she found it surprising that such a "lock" would be placed onto the spell.

Zelda wasn't the only surprised though.

"Wow of all the", Malon ran a hand through her fiery locks of hair a slight look of bewilderment on her face, "I wonder why that is though?"

"Who knows. Regardless we are out of time and Ruto MUST be distracted so..."

Zelda eyed Malon intently, an expression the farm girl picked up on almost instantly.

"Whawhaawhat?! Oh no! No way!" Malon argued not realizing she had instinctively jumped off her horse afterwards began to back away from the blonde pair.

"Come on, Malon, it will be fun!" encouraged Link with a goofy smile plastered on his lips.

"Easy for you to say! You're not the one that has to go up against that" Malon pointed out toward Ruto, "that...mountain of a fish! And to make things worse I'll be the same size as her! No I won't do it." Malon huffed as she stuck her arms around her chest and planted her feet firmly on the ground.

Zelda sighed at the stubborn nature of the redhead but before she could bring up an argument Link cut her off.

"Malon please do this for the people of Hyrule. You'll save so many lives if you do." Link sighed before continuing, "But more importantly if you do this...I may consider making you my girlfriend. How's that for ya?"

Link smiled when he saw Malon stay silent for a moment just before a huge grin appeared on her face. Link then quickly eyed Zelda, strangely the princess didn't raise an objection to Link's offer and a part of him wondered what was running through her head at the moment.

"So you agree then?"

Link took note of Zelda's lack of venom in her voice and instead sounded completely serious.

"Okay you got me. I'll do it." confirmed Malon.

"Alright...let us begin then." getting off her horse Zelda began to preparations to casting the growth spell.

"Link I suggest you go on ahead and take our horses to Lon Lon Ranch. That and well Malon's going to need some room to grow."

"Gotcha! Good luck, Malon." said Link. A moment later he left with Epona and the horses belonging to the girls.

"Here we go." stated Zelda as she casted the spell on Malon who awaited the results.
113112211111121.title: The spell can only work on females

choices: Malon vs. Ruto; Malon wins easily
Ruto overpowers Malon, despite her new size
1131122111111212.content:
Link was out of sight by the time Zelda completed the spell and cast it on Malon. Almost at once, Malon started to grow both in height and weight (but mostly height). 10, 20, 30 feet she grew, and on she grew. Malon could see Link now and Lon Lon Ranch beyond...and she could see Ruto now. Ruto was almost to the castle now. Malon reached the height of Ruto...and continued to grow! Zelda looked puzzled and looked back at the spell in the book. She had cast it right...she had made no mistakes. She read on while Malon was continuing to grow...easily towering over the massive Ruto. Malon was glad that she was now bigger than Ruto...but she was worried over how much bigger she'll get. As Malon grew in height, her weight increased...but not all that much. Ruto might've outweighed her in the pounds department, but Malon had height on her side. Malon continued to grow until she was 1,500 feet tall. Her clothes had grown with her, and her boots nearly covered all of Hyrule Field.
"Well...I'm one heck of a distraction.." said Malon. "Hey, Ruto! Why don't you pick on someone that's bigger than you?"
Ruto, who had been about to eat Hyrule Castle Town, looked up at the new giantess in Hyrule. Ruto barely came to Malon's knees!


Link could do nothing but stare at the gigantic Malon. Malon seemed to be a goddess with her great height. Epona kept on running to Lon Lon Ranch. Malon's boots were on either side of Lon Lon Ranch.


Zelda guessed the spell worked all too well, as she had found that she had indeed performed the spell correctly. She shook her head to clear it, and flipped through the book to find the shrinking spell. As she did so, Zelda caught glimpses of other spells that had been lost for thousands of years.
The spellbook that Zelda was now holding was as old as Hyrule itself. According to legend, the goddess Din gave the spell book to the first king of Hyrule. Why she did this was not made clear, but it was clear that the book held many spells that were only known to the gods. The book had the emblem of the Triforce on its leather cover. One of the spells that Zelda glimpsed was a spell that could make you into a god...but now wasn't the time to look up useless spells. Hyrule was at stake. She found the shrinking spell, and started to get ready to cast it.

choices: Use magic

11311221111112122121211.content:
A young version of link and an link dressed in white walked out of the portal, and upon seeing this Zelda was shocked, "what, wait. huh?". "Do not worry your majesty" the young link said
while bowing, "I think you might find this weird but... AAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!" The young link had turned around to see the large creature that was
Ruto. "What? How? WHY!?" "calm down! calm Down!" the white dressed link said, " I believe the princess can explain this!". the white link then turned to the princess, "well? can you?"
Zelda then explained what had happened up to now. "ok, that explains alot, but now... HOW DO WE STOP HER!" "well,I have no clue really." Zelda then looked down and was worried,
"That sea of blubber Ruto is going to eat my land!" Zelda shouted. Then the young Link spoke up,"Don't worry princess, well stop her from eating all of Hirule! also, call me Mark, and the
Guy in white there is called Omega" Omega nodded to confirm this fact. "so what plan do we have in mind princess?" "well..."
11311221111112122121211.title: Two heroes from different times and spaces.

choices: The spell goes of with-out a hitch!
Ruto spots them.
113112211111121221212111.content: "The only thing I can think of is magic" said Zelda "but the spells that we were going to use have restrictions" Omega then looked at the book and then realized something, "say, did you say that the book was given to the first king of Hirule?" "yes, why do you ask?" "I only ask because I know how to remove the restrictions, and since this book is almost as old as I, I can use the giant spell on Mark." "Oh, Omega I know where you are going with this!" "Yes, now are you ready?" "I was born ready! DRAGONIZE!" Just then Mark pulled out a odd looking bracer and then put it on his wrist, Then, Fire erupted around him and then he was transformed into a 500 lbs dragon! "now, let us begin..."

Omega said, "Are you sure? the last time we used the spell, Malon was eaten!" Zelda said, and when she said that, Mark replied,"Omega, we need to pump this up!" Omega sighed, as he pulled out a wand from his pack, He said, "ok then, MAGIC WAND! MAKE MY DRAGON GROW!" and as he said this, he Threw the wand at Mark, and thus, made him bigger by about...

Mark has been through worse!" Omega said, "I bet Mark will at least push her back a bit!" "I hope so..." Zelda said softly.

Mark bellowed, mustering all his might into pushing Ruto back and sending her into the hole that used to be Lake Hilia, sending a shock wave that could be heard for miles."I don't think it is over, but now she has been knocked down so she wont interrupt us for now."Said Mark, just as the wand's effect wore off and Omega shrinking him back to the normal sized dragon form."I think now would be the time to use the chance to get everyone out of Ruto's stomach." said Omega, Zelda looked at him quizzically, "But how are we going to do that?" As the pounds packed on, link and Zelda fell down rainbows into eachothers mouths, and then melted away as they became fatter and fatter, and as they melted, it rained tingles. 11311221111112122122.title: The mysterious thingamajig. And the side effects

choices: ...moving towards them.
...starting to grow bigger.
1131122112.content: While Link got Malon on Epona so the two of them could go towards the massive strange blue mountain (Ruto), Malon once again began to stare at it with a slightly shocked expression on her face. "Hey Fairy-boy, is it just me or is that thing over their is starting to get closer?" asked Malon. Link took a look towards the huge blue jiggly mountain to see that it (Ruto) was...
1131122112.title: On the way the pair notice Ruto's girth mov...

choices: Ruto's covered half of Hyrule in her blubber!!!
Ruto's covered one fourth of Hyrule with her fat!
113112212.content:
No sooner had Link and Malon exited the ranch complex before coming across and literally smashing into a "wall" made of soft almost gelatin-like material. It shook and rattled slight from the combined impact caused both youths who felt as if they were about to be sucked further into the strange substance.

Summoning his strength Link was able to pull himself free, but not after a bit of a struggle. The wall so to speak was after all acting like the quicksand pits out in the desert. After freeing himself Link took a moment to regain his lost air, without his Zora Tunic on anymore time spend in that soft prison would have done him in.

Suddenly he realized he had yet to spot Malon. A rather muffled groan came nearby causing Link to rush over and successfully spotting Malon who was slowly sinking into the blue quicksand-like wall. With a gasp Link did his best to quickly pull her out before her air could thin any further.

After rescuing the ranch girl Link noticed the color began to return to her flesh, any longer and she would have been dead for sure he thought silently as he hugged her slightly thankful he had reached Malon in time.

A few minutes later Malon at last began to recover. Fluttering her eyes open she happily thanked Link for the save. Link accepted her thanks and told her to lay still for a while so that she could fully recover from the strange ordeal. Malon did as told and relaxed in Link's arms.

With Malon now safe the strange wall before them still puzzled the hell out of the young swordsman. What exactly was it? Why was it so soft? And just where did it come from?

Link didn't have the answers to any of those brain-wrecking questions so without so much as a thought he looked out far into the distance to get a better understanding of how far this...thing extended.

After doing so it was safe to say he was surprised at the result!
113112212.title: Link and Malon run into a wall of blubber

choices: Check up on Link and Malon
What happened to Zelda?
1131122121.content:
The soft blue wall--whatever it was--extended to the horizon on both sides of Link and Malon. At least half of Hyrule must be covered by this odd soft wall of blue flesh. Link then wondered what had happened to Zelda, and all of the people that lived in the half of Hyrule that was now covered in her fat. The wall of blue was a good 300 foot tall, and it was too soft to be climbed. With nothing left to do, Link decided to try to climb as high as the soft blue wall to see over it....but where was a good place to observe this strange wall? The only thing big enough to let Link get high enough to look over the blue wall would be the Spirit Temple in the Gerudo desert....if the wall did indeed covered half of Hyrule, it would be easy to spot from the Spirit Temple. Making his decision, Link told Malon his plan and she went with him as he rode to the Spirit Temple in order to look over the huge wall.



The Zora cook found himself somewhere on the expanse of his fat queen. He couldn't tell where he was on the massive Ruto...but it was easy to tell that he was somewhere on her great big belly. He looked around and saw nothing but a landscape of blue blubber. Surely, the queen wouldn't be still hungry after her second helping. The cook picked a direction and started to walk that way, not sure if he was heading for the head of Ruto or not.
1131122121.title: Ruto the half-country

choices: Impa
Link
11311221212.content:
While Link and Malon were off on their trip to the desert over at the fabled Temple of Time Princess Zelda found herself leaning against one of it's stone made walls.

Zelda was exhausted after all the quick thinking and extensive usage of her powers to transport all of the Castle Town's citizens safely into the sacred temple and away from the flood of blue blubber that had flatten the town to rubble. Even the castle was completely destroyed thought Zelda in a frustrated fashion.

Just like Link a short time ago the Hylian Royal was also confused as to just what it was that had blanket the land with it's soft but destructive size. Zelda remembered actually getting a bit of a feel on the strange object and she was surprised when it felt rather spongy and almost flesh-like...but not just any flesh but fatty flesh.

A flood of flab? Zelda laughed at the idea. Sure as Sheik she had seen and experienced many things during the tyrannical reign of Ganondorf but even he never used a tsunami of fat as as weapon of mass destruction. On of top of that there was nothing in Hyrule that grand in size (if she only knew...).

Putting the laughable thought aside Zelda decided to rest a bit more before contacting Impa. Her loyal guardian had actually gone out into the open to see for herself just how vast the strange fatty object was.

Rubbing her temples softly Zelda sighed, she wanted answers as to what this new threat to Hyrule was and figured now was as good a time as any to get them.

Ultimately she contacted...
11311221212.title: What happened to Zelda?

choices: Check up on Link and Malon
Stay with Zelda and Impa
113112212121.content:
Zelda contacted Impa, her fellow Sage. "[Impa, where are you?]"

"[Swimming in lard to see if I can get to the other side]" came Impa's reply. "[Whatever this is, it's big alright. I fear that it's covering all of Hyrule]"

The Temple of Time was being protected from being smashed by the wall of blubberly wall by the divine will of the goddesses that created Hyrule (each temple was protected from being completely destroyed, hence why Ganondorf had left the temples alone during his reign of evil). The protection surrounded the temple itself and the area around it. That barrier of protection could only be broken by a sage of Hyrule, and Impa had broken through the barrier in order to "swim" through the strange fleshy wall. Impa was in no danger of suffocating, as she was a powerful sage and could live without oxygen for a long time.


"[As soon as you find out how big this thing is, tell me at once]" said Zelda.

"[Of course I will, Zelda]" said her guardian.
113112212121.title: Impa on her way

choices: Accept Ruto's proposal
Marry a fish? No way!
11312.content:
Ruto refused the messenger who, dismayed, bowed and relayed this news to the king.

Ruto told her father that the whole idea was just superstition and that the Zoras would continue to thrive without a fat ruler.

Though Ruto knew deep down this was not true she had another reason: many years ago she had sworn to marry Link and she still loved him deeply. If she became huge and fat then any chance she had of winning over Link once and for all would be gone. She told this much to her father who thought long and hard about it until he had an idea.

A few days later, Link was summoned to the Zora Kingdom and was explained this by the King.

'So what do you want me to do?' Link asked

'Well er, we were wondering if...er...' said the King sweating nervously 'if you would be interested in....marrying...her, upon her royal proposal.'

Links heart came very close to stopping and he swallowed loudly.

Link was unwilling to be betrothed to Ruto so early, he admired the Zora Princess very much though he still had strong feelings for Zelda- but on the other hand, a whole kingdom was counting on him.

What does Link do?

11421.content:
After finishing her breakfast, Malon noticed it was hard to get up... it was so good, and she was so full. Maybe she should let her food settle before heading out; after all, she didn't want to hurt herself trying to do to much on a full stomach.

She got out of her chair and began to head towards the loft to grab a good book. On the way, she passed a mirror and noticed that she didn't at all look like herself. Strange... maybe the mirror's broken. She checked it. Nope, mirror's normal. She figured she might not be well; maybe she shouldn't go out today. She didn't want the horses getting whatever she had.

After a few hours of laying on the couch and reading, Malon began to feel better. Then she felt her stomach grumble...
11421.title: A Lazy Day

choices: Don't help Ganondorf, he's evil!
At least hear what he wants you to do before desiding.
11422.content:
"Delicious!" Malon thought as she set the bottle of milk down. "That was the best milk I've ever tasted. Well, I better get to tending the cows." As Malon got up from her seat she felt the table rub up against her stomach and heard a glass break on the ground. Malon looked down and to her surprise found a very large stomach blocking her view of the ground. "Oh my goddesses!" Malon screamed. She stared at her stomach for awhile before grabbing it to see if it was real or if she was just imagining things. Her stomach felt soft and squishy, and she realized that it wasn't just her imagination. It was real.

Malon ran, well, waddled as fast as she could to the closest mirror and gasped at what she saw. Her face was now much rounder, with big cheeks and a large double chin. Her stomach spilled out from her body, and was easily at least the size of an octorock. Her breasts, which had already been quite big to begin with, had doubled in size, and lay atop her large stomach. Her arms were much rounder then when she had sat down for breakfast, and got bigger and bigger the closer they got to her body. Her legs now pushed against each other, each now trying to take up the same space. Last but not least, her butt had nearly tripled in size, and now stuck out from behind her.

As Malon continued to look over her body in disbelief, out of the corner of her eye she noticed a dark figure hidden in the shadows. "Who are you?" She asked as she turned to face the figure. The person started to laugh in a dark and sadistic manner, and immediately Malon realized who it was. "Ganondorf!" she cried. "Hello farm girl." the Gerudo said as he stepped out from the shadowy corner of the room. "What do you want?" Malon asked. "I notice you've put on a few pounds since this morning." He responded. "I wonder what it was that caused that?" he pondered with an evil grin on his face. "It was you!" Malon answered. "You're the one who caused me to turn into this!"

"Ah, such a clever girl." He replied. "But, I wonder, what would "Fairy Boy" think of you if he was you like this?"

"Fairy Boy! What will he think of me now?" Malon asked as a single tear fell from her eye.

"I can change you to how you once were." He said.

"You can?" She asked.

"Of course. But, I'll need you to do something for me first." Ganondorf said, that evil grin once again gracing his face.

"I can't help Ganondorf, he's evil!" Malon thought to herself. "But I don't want Fairy Boy to see me like this! What should I do?"
11422.title: A proposition.

choices: She reluctantly dug in
She held out from eating anything
114221.content:
"No dice, Ganondorf!" Malon said defiantly. "Fairy Boy or not, it'd be worse to help you in whatever scheme you're cooking up!"

The warlock gave a booming laugh, and walked up to her. "Well then, I just guess 'Fairy Boy' is going to have quite a surprise next time he comes in." Though he started to sneer as another plan came into mind. " could easily kill you right here and now, but I feel it'd be a waste of time." It really wouldn't be considering how quickly he could do it, but he was in the mood for some major mischief. "Rather, I think that you're still a bit... Petite." As his grin grew, Malon's face dropped. "Obviously a growing girl like yourself needs some encouragement to fully bloom!" Taking a few steps backwards, he beckons at the table, suddenly overflowing with a wide manner of Malon's favorite sweet goodies.

"So?" Malon scoffed. "Not like I have to eat that stuff! Besides, I can work all this off!"

Ganondorf chortled, and as you would guess, it was fully with malicious intent. "Work all that off? Besides barely being able to move... Well, let's just say it's a wee bit IMPOSSIBLE for you to lose a single calorie. Try if you want to, running a hundred laps is going to just make you body tire out."

"What!? Seriously, what's your problem? How did you expect me to help you in the first place in this state anyway?" The farm girl snapped, beads of sweat forming on her brow as she realized she was doomed... Or doomed to be at a whopping 500 pounds, and even then assuming she never ate again.

"Oh, I had a few plots worked out, but no matter!" He starts to leave, yet before he fully disappears in a cloud of dark smoke, he decides to do one final thing. "Obviously you're going to want to work against this change, so if that pile isn't gone when I come back, and believe me I WILL come back... I'll give you some... Ahem, extra 'encouragement'."

And with that, he was gone. "Awww man, this could NOT get any worse!" As if Ganondorf was still there, she heard a rip; her stomach and breasts finally tore through her favorite dress, and she was left almost entirely butt naked. "... Shoot."

As her sweet tooth started to divert her attention to the food pile...
114221.title: So much for standing up to evil

choices: Nothing actually changes!
Something actually happens!
1142212.content:
She held out. Standing there crossed arm, she snubbed the flowing pile of food. "It's not worth it. It's not worth it. It's not worth it."

Yet in the end, it probably would've been worth it.

With a thunderous boom, Ganondorf appeared again. "Well, I guess you've chosen my second option then. If you want some extra encouragement..." He teleported both of them outside, and chained her up to the barn yard wall. "Then you've got it!"

Clicking his fingers, several large vats appear around them. With pipes. It doesn't take Malon any time to realize what they'll be used for. "Seeing as feeding yourself is apparently too difficult..." He raised a finger and, with a hose that followed suit, pointed it at Malon, who's mouth nearly dropped in shock (conveniently) as it went in. "I'll let these devices do it for you. You just sit there and these vats will helpfully unload their contents onto you. I'll be here to reload them in an hour." Another smoke cloud and he's gone.

A large vat starts to whir, and before she knows it, large piles of who knows what makes its way down the hose, and into her mouth. She takes a swallow, and...

"Ewww! This is just pure fat!" She says with a muffle, yet the hose seems to instinctively turn up its velocity after she says this. With each gulp, Malon can feel her body slowly expand, her belly scraping against the outside grass. Stuck here naked for anybody to see, Malon feels doomed. But...

11422121.content:
The fat rushed inside her mouth, and she were forced to swallow it. She looked down at her expanding body. Malon struggles to get free from the chains, but it doesn't help. She can feel the disqusting taste of pure fat in her mouth. "Hrmf! Mhmmrm!" She tries to spit out the hose, but it is stuck. Again she looks down, she has already gained alot.

Her belly has grown alot, but it was hard for her to see it because of her huge breasts covering it. She is totally naked, and she can see some of her clothes lying on the ground. She struggles more to try to break her chains, but it is hopeless.

Gannondorf reappears and the hose falls out. Malon want to scream, but from all the feeding she needed a moment to catch her breath. Ganondorf pokes her belly. "i see you are plumping up nicely" he says and laughs. Malon only responds with some angry noises. Ganondorf shoves a finger inside her navel, and whirl the finger around, causing the most of her belly to jiggle. "Stop that!" Malon shouts at him in anger. Ganondorf stands still for a moment, both are silent. He smiles "well i see you are busy eating so i guess i'll just go... The hose draws closer to Malon's mouth. "WAIT!" The hose stops, and ganondorf turns around. "Ok, ill go with whatever plan you have...."

Ganondorf smiles.....
11422121.title: Nothing actually changes!

choices: Malon reluctantly accepts
Malon bravely refuses
114222.content:
'Guess I don't have much of a choice, this monster of a man would kill me without a second thought if he found me disposable. I'd best play along with him for now...'

"If I were to agree, big if, what would I have to do?" questioned Malon, a cold hard look in her eyes never once moving them away from Ganondorf's imposing form.

"Simple my dear. You are friends with Princess Zelda are you not?"

"I won't kidnap her!" objected Malon before Ganondorf could speak any further.

"Hahaha...kidnap? Please you expect me to believe that someone of your stature would get far before being arrested. Spare me ranch-girl, if that were the case I'd do it myself, but no what I really want you to do is have an audience with the Princess." stated Ganondorf in a honest fashion, a rare feat indeed.

"That's it?" Malon still wasn't sure what he was up to and the logical portion of her brain told her she would no sooner drive herself crazy before figuring out what thoughts rolled inside that man's mind.

"Yes. It's very simple you have an audience with Zelda and I'll remove your...rather noticeable weight." The vile man smiled for he was no fool he knew well how young women like Malon (and in a way all of the girls that befriended Link) were picky about their weight. She wouldn't refuse his offer.
114222.title: Ganondorf's simple offer?

choices: Malon warns her about the plan
Malon acts natural
1142221.content:
"I accept your offer," she muttered, rather silently.

"What was that?" he boomed leaving a demonic echo about the place.

"I said 'I accept your offer.'" She knew she couldn't continue with all the literal 'extra weight'. if not for social sakes, then for practical sakes. She almost stumbled as she walked.

"That was a fine answer." He held up a sheet of ledger. "It seems you're scheduled for a delivery of milk this evening. I suggest you head immidiately. Of course, if you fail..." He grinned.

Malon was terrified of his threat, and knew it would not be wise to renege the offer. She knew what she must do. But what exactly was he planning? The question repeated through her mind, though she was too petrified of his presence to speak any further. Ganondorf looked at her one last time, then departed.

She saddled up one of her horses as the deadline neared. She had trouble climbing onto the horse, so she grabbed a couple of bricks and used them as a stool. The horse was taken aback by the change of weight, but nonetheless was able to march onward to the castle.

The royal guards took a look at her as she approached the gate. "Really taken after her father, isn't that right?" Malon tried to ignore their jeers and simply stated her buisness. After a few more fat-jokes, they opened the gate and allowed her to pass. She hid her face into her chest to hide her identity from the other guards, despite how odd she looked doing so, as she continued down the road, pulling a cartload of milk toward the castle.

"I wish to speak with the Princess," she announced, ignoring the noncompliance of the guards. They paid no attention to the chubby milkmaid from the ranch. Then a voice called out in response.

"What is this about? I am the Princess, Zelda."
1142221.title: Malon reluctantly accepts

choices: She heads to the castle
She waits around at home
11422211.content:
"This is important!" she cried out to the crowd. She wasn't sure how to phrase it. "It's about Ganondorf's plan."

The court was taken aback by the shocking announcement. Several of them panicked, but nonetheless remained seated. "This is no trivial concern" said the captain of the guards.

Malon hobbled up the staircase, finding the stairs more difficult to climb than usual. Zelda and the Captain followed her, both being careful to not stare at her crotch which was visible due to her undersized dress. Zelda asked her about what had happened, and Malon told her of how she grew in size, how Ganondorf appeared, and his offer.

Zelda thought for a moment, then ordered the Captain to quickly dispose of the milk crates. She realised if he had a plan, it must have been something to do with them. "Malon, return home as if nothing strange has happened. Hopefully he will make good on his promise."

Malon rode her horse-and-empty cart back to the ranch, and put the kettle on. She sat down on her bed and hoped that everything would work out perfectly fine, her bed creaking as she moved even the slightest. She tried to keep perfectly still, as the sound was getting on her nerves. She was tired from all the work combined with her new form. Her father was still not home, and she was worried yet about her appearance.

The kettle boiled and she got up. The thought of tea relaxed her, even if only a little. As she picked up the kettle, a dark figure appeared in the corner of her eye. He nodded at you with his menacing look. "Well done. I heartily thank you, from the bottom of my heart. You met with the princess, as I asked."

"So, you mean..?"

"I am going to make good on my promise. I shall "remove your rather noticable weight."" He grinned. What was he planning?

He grabbed her, with his impressive strength, and a blue light shone from his hand to her body. She could feel herself being lighter as his arms struggled less to carry her. She was feeling glad that she was doing so well after disobeying the King of Evil. At last, she had gotten what she wanted... Or had she? Her body was feeling very weird.

"Feeling lighter, yet?" he laughed, as her body started to feel floaty. Her arms drifted around by a small draught through the window. "Now you weigh nothing." He bent over, and blew on her face. She floated back a few feet. She looked at her body. She no longer looked overweight, but her body looked transparant.

She tried to float back at him, but he merely blew again, and she was launched against the wall. Her gaseous body prevented her from being hurt, but the helplessness of the situation almost made her burst into tears.
11422211.title: Malon warns her about the plan

choices: Join Ganondorf
Refuse
11422212.content:
"It's a delivery, of milk."

"Very well, leave it in the pantries."

"No, it's something else too, umm..." Malon was desperate for an excuse, and was sure others in the hall could see so in her expression. A drop of sweat rolled down her forehead as she thought about a plan. "It's important! It concerns the fate of Hyrule!"

"Speak up, then" said Emily, her lady-in-waiting.

"No..." Malon wanted to burst into tears. Not only did she have the court looking at her bloated body, she was cornered into a situation she couldn't escape. More sweat dribbled down her face, thogh it wouldn't be any different if it were tears. She once again hid her face with her chest, and turned away.

Zelda spoke up. "Let me speak with her in private. Head up the stairs on your right." Malon was somewhat comforted by her words, and followed her upstairs. The room had a simple oaken table with a series of almost melted candles on its top. Emily was also there, though Malon didn't really care so much. Zelda noticed Malon's increased physique and realised that it may have been her problem. She had seen her several times when she was younger, though they had never directly spoke.

"So, what happened at the farm in which you work?" Zelda questioned. "Is everything alright?"

"It's fine, I guess," was Malon's response.

"You weren't like this before, were you?" Zelda asked, straight to the point.

"No." Malon tensed up by this, and prepared to leave. Did Zelda know. Had she known all this time?

"The times that we live in, our era, may be suffering turmoil, but don't let that get the better of you. Eating too much can have awful consequenses."

Malon breathed a sigh of relief, then...

She didn't know what it was until it happened. She burped very loudly, a pungeant odor (something like clotted milk) filling the room. Her head began to spin, and lost her balance. Zelda and Emily called out, amidst her sickness, but no one came. No one heeded her pleas.

Malon looked up as the dizziness ceased, and saw Zelda and Emily now at a large size. Zelda's dress bursted at the seams, confused and wondering what had happened. Her dress hardly contained her swollen bottom.

Malon realised the milky outburst had caused it. Not knowing what to do, she walked out of the castle. The people of the castle looked as if they had passed out, though the milky odor did not reach the room.

Ganondorf marched in. "I am an honest man, I shall return you." He handed her a bottle of a weird liquid, which she drunk. It wasn't like she was in any position to refuse. Sure enough, it worked. While heer dress retained the stretchmarks, she was once again her fit self.

"You did a great job. Perhaps I may have further use for you." He grinned.

"What did you do to her?" She cried.

"Join me, and you shall find out," he said, looking back at the castle. "You will be greatly rewarded."
11422212.title: Malon acts natural

choices: Lure him inside
Meet him where he stands
114222121.content:
"In that case, I wish to join you" she called out. "What kinds of rewards will I recieve?"

"Power, fame, immortality, wealth, perfect beauty... Endless possibilities. I shall make it so you will live your old poor farm-girl life. Let me explain about the triforce. There are three parts. Power, Wisdom, and Courage. They belong each to whom embodies each idea. Naturally, I have the Triforce of Power." He showed her the triangular mark on the back of her hand. "Zelda has Wisdom, as she is the wisest in the kingdom. When you had your 'little embarrassing accident,' the gas not only made her into a fat girl, it also will gradually drain her intelligence. When she becomes an idiot again, the Triforce of Wisdom shall be forfeited to whom defeats her in a test of wisdom. Now do you understand, my red haired servant? What I did?"

Malon was amazed that he had such power to steal ones wisdom, but she had another question on her mind. "But then, why did the gas make her so fat?"

Gannondorf had an answer to that, as well. "So I may kidnap her with ease. The milk you delivered was not in fact milk, but a cursed liquid made to force the castle's staff into a sleep. Thay shall wake up tomorrow with no princess."

"So, where do I fit in?" Malon quizzed. She turned to her side, and faced the water stream.

Ganondorf smiled at her eagerness. "First thing's first. We must first find the princess."

Malon led him up to the princess' room, and found her comforting Emily, sitting in a chair. She looked up, and pointed at Malon. "You... You did this to me!"

Ganondorf revealed himself. "A fine guess, but only half-right." He picked her up with his massive arms, and looked at her bloated body. He hurled a jinx at Emily, knocking her unconsious. He picked her up, wrapping his right arm around Zelda and his left around Emily. He managed to join both hands together at great difficutly, due to their bulging bellies. Zelda expressed great discomfort and embarrassment at being squished against an obese lady.

"You betrayed me!" Zelda cried out. Malon remained silent at this, but didn't care.

"Now, onto the next part of my plan," Ganondorf announced, in Zelda's presence to torment her, "The third piece of the Triforce, Courage. Link, the Hero of Time has it. To obtain it, we must terrify him. But, this bold boy has faced onslaughts of armies without breaking a sweat. That's where you come in." He turned to Malon.

"You must approach him as an old friend. Meet him with a smile. Reminisce about old times, if you wish. Then... you turn on him." He handed her a small vial.

"Drink it," he boomed to Malon.

The vial tasted of rotting cabbages, and she was reminded of a time during a bad harvest. It almost made her threw up, but she was determined for success. It made her buttocks feel all rubbery and expand, she worried that she was expanding again. No such bad fortune however, Ganondor clarified.

"Your body is just changing. Of course, it is reversible, should you like. Your body... or just your lower half is reshaping to that of a spider. Your rear is becoming your new abdomen and sternum. You shall become a spider-lady, with spinarets and all. Your upper body shall remain the same."

Zelda watched her diabolical transformation with fear in her eyes. "You sick, sordid fool. Do you really think Link will fall for such a weak ruse?"

"Honestly? Yes," Malon laughed, as her body rushes with euphoria with her four additional limbs.

"Link should arrive in the castle after all the commotion. That's when you shall strike. Meet me at the top of Death Mountain when you are done."

"Yes, my King," she answered, and headed over to the front of the castle. She was worried about how much she had changed under fear. She was working for the King of Evil. She dismissed it, telling herself that such thoughts will only impede her, and waited at the front of the castle. She had hid her body by standing inside a house and looking through the window. Her legs covered most the room, she had entered with some difficulty.

Twenty minutes later, a green, hooded figure rode in on a red horse toward the castle at great speed with a solemn look on his face. It was Link.

11422212111.content:
And so link hatched from the cucoon with red eyes then they went to Death Mountain where they took over Hyrule and Link and Malon were forever tainted lovers under the rule of Ganon and stuff the end...

... yeah, sorry, no.


-------------------


Malon woke up in a cold sweat, unsure of what she was just dreaming. Though it felt more like a nightmare...

It was sunrise though, so Malon got up to go about her daily chores. Feed the cucoos and collect eggs, slop the hogs, feed and milk the cows... The typical farmgirl stuff.

But first it was time for breakfast. She got some bacon, eggs, and... were these spiderwebs always there?

"How's our little farm girl doing? Sleeping well?" a sinister voice came from behind Malon, or rather what seemed to be a sinister voice in unison with that of a familiar woman's voice. She turned to find the source, only to see...

It was her!?

"What is this!? Who are you!?" her counterpart seemed to laugh wickedly, only now did Malon notice the red eyes and the giant spider she sat upon

"Don't be silly, surely you recognize yourself! You've looked into mirrors before, afterall~" She chuckled, petting the spider she used as her seat. "Atleast the part of you who embraced being a servant Ganondorf. You're objections were getting annoying so I showed you a stupid nightmare where we suddenly gained hideous looking fangs that and link was a total pansey, then trapped you here in our own subconscious."

Malon paused for a moment, this was a lot to take in, even if the news came from herself. Though that last statement confused her the most.

"Trapped? But I'm not... why can't I move all of a sudden? it feels... tight?" Looking down, she only now realized her body was stuck in a stringy coating, in the middle of a giant web "What!?"

"Now that you're no longer busy, just sit and enjoy the show I'll put on for you. I'll let you watch as I scare our beloved fairyboy and take his piece of the triforce." as the dark half said this, a projection of what Malon could see in the waking world, complete with a ceiling view of Link entering the abandoned house. "Bye-bye~!"

The evil half faded away as she re-entered consciousness without her innocent side.


-------------------


Malon had engaged Link in combat. Although mildly startled, he wasn't scared by her sudden jump from the ceiling. The battle took a while, but it seemed to end when Link pointed his blade in the face of the spider torso'd girl as sh layed backside to the floor...

"L-Link Is that you?" tears welled up in her eyes, surprising the hero. Was she being controlled? Forced to do this against her will? Could he really kill his friend? His sword was lowered as he worried she might really be in trouble... then she flipped their positions

"Just kidding! You're weaker than I thought!" With one of her pointy legs jabbed down to the hero's torso, it stopped just short of piercing as she began laughing. Link had put an arm in front of his face so he didn't have to see someone he held close end his life, fearful of her betrayal.

"I knew you'd cower out when it came to finishing off a dear friend. And now that you've shown fear, I'll be taking the Triforce of Courage!" Laying defeated, Link couldn't even bring himself to look at Malon. The shame was too great. His had glowed to show his piece of the Trifoce, before fading, soon the same glowing image appeared on the redheaded spider's hand and she laughed wickedly. "So long, would be hero. I have a master to return to~"

Chuckling to herself, she wasn't truely planning on leaving him behind. She'd send someone to retrieve him later, as it was clear he wouldn't be going anywhere anytime soon. But first, she'd go to her master atop Death Mountain.

115.title: Oueen of the Desert

choices: Link
Princess Zelda
1151.content:
After Ganondorf's defeat, a prosperous new era began for the Gerudo people. No longer were they required to lead a life of thievery and piracy, they soon after lost their outcast status and began to trade and export legitamately.

However, this new state of affairs had a flipside, a lot of Gerudo's had trouble adapting to a more sedentary lifestyle and many started to put on the pounds scarfing down all sorts of wonderful foods that were previously scarce or unavailable. Many lost the slim and toned figures they had gained through their older, more physically demanding jobs.

The Queen of the Gerudo, Nabooru who had taken up leadership after Ganondorf's defeat was no exception.
As a queen, her lifestyle was even more cushy then most. Before she was actively thieving the nearby temples, now all she did was laze around all day in the Gerudo palace and occassionally help the Gerudo council with political decisions.

Along the way, she picked up a keen taste for Hylian Cuisine, thanks to her attendance at several celebratory feasts at Hyrule Castle- and developed an almost insatiable appetite.

Her cushy lifestyle showed on her so far, her bare midriff had given way to a flabby belly which she kept engorged with food, her arms and legs had developed a soft layer of flab and her widening thighs and rear were straining against her previously baggy attire, all in all she was going on around 200 lbs.

Her face had also plumpened up, giving her cheeks a pinchable quality and a soft second chin had developed, which caused much talk around the palace, as larger figures became a sort of figure of social status for those who had profited from the recent changes and she was the first to own one of her own.

Nabooru was presently lazing around her palace on a bed of cushions while her personal servants fed her a large meal, she cradled her stuffed belly and belched loudly as a messenger girl ran in with the announcement that someone was there to see her, it turns out to be:
1151.title: The New Gerudo Nation

choices: She's fine and well
She's actually gotten a little fat recently
11511.content:
As it turns out the guest was none other than the young hero, Link.

As he ends his words two of the servants relive Link of the crate, explaining that they shall take it to the kitchen.

Nabooru led Link down a long hallway to what clearly was a banquet hall. In it there were at least a dozen tables all piled with foods of all kinds. Link's mouth fell open in awe as he looked around at all the food. There was a sizable throne big enough for ten people that were Nabooru's size. The hall was also filled with plenty of hot Gerudo women which were all thin for the most part. At the far end of the hall Link recognized one of the offspring of the carpenter he had once saved from the Gerudo.
"You can help yourself with as much food as you want" said Nabooru. "I prefer to have well-fed servants unlike other rulers I know"
Link wondered who was Nabooru referring to. He recalled no such ruler in Hyrule.
"Who are you talking aboyt?" asked Link .
"You mean you haven't heard?" asked Nabooru .

With that Nabooru waddled to the throne and started to eat like she hadn't eaten for days. Link sat down on a chair near the throne and started to eat. The food was really good.

In the end it really didn't matter why Link had stopped eating and focused all of his attention on Nabooru while she devoured plate after plate of food. Soon Link climbed out of his chair and, as if in a trance, wandered over to Nabooru.
"Couldn't resist coming over to me?" asked Nabooru.
Link silently shook his head no.

"Well, umm... she's actually gotten a little fat recently." Link said without really thinking.

"Ah, I am glad to hear that Princess Zelda is very healthy and happy then!" Nabooru smiled. "I should like to have her visit here sometime. Tell her that she is officially invited to visit Queen Nabooru here at the palace!"

Link breathed a sigh of relief, glad that Nabooru hadn't taken what he said as offensive. "Of course I will tell her your invitation! Thank you very much, most gracious Lady Nabooru!" Link bowed as he said this, hoping this showed the proper amount of gratitude and respect.

Nabooru finished her meal, and signaled for her servants to clear it away. "I look forward to her visit. We will strengthen ties with Kingdom of Hyrule." After a few moments thought, she added "And hopefully she bring more of your delicious foods!"

"O-Of I will tell her your request" Link said. "Well, I must be on my way, I have many things to do. With that he turned and gathered the remaining Hylian Knights, and headed back to the caravan, which was scheduled to make a round trip stop to the Zora Domain before returning to Hyrule. Link decided that he had better make a detour inform Princess Zelda of Nabooru's invitation.

* * * * *

One week later, Princess Zelda arrived at the Gerudo palace to visit Queen Nabooru. There were no holidays, and Hyrule was in a state of extreme peace, especially thanks to the efforts of Link, so Zelda had decided to visit right away, as she wanted to keep up diplomatic ties with the Gerudo. Even the guards were leaning against whatever post they were supposed to be guarding. They all looked rather soft. 'I'm glad the Tribe is doing so well, but they should be a little more enthusiastic about things' Zelda thought to herself.

Upon entering the Queen's room, it was obvious that Princess Zelda had definitely gained some weight, though not quite as much as Nabooru. She looked fairly chubby and she had developed a slightly pear shape. Her dress hugged her generous hips, and her royal booty could be seen outlined against the rear of her dress. Her pretty face had grown a bit softer, and her middle had started to thicken. At about 165 pounds, she was chunky, but had not really come to terms with the fact that she had put on a few.

Her eyes widened when she saw Nabooru, especially her potbelly, which was quite round. The 200 pound ruler of the Gerudo smiled as she stood up from her pile of cushions and walked towards Zelda, her tummy jiggling with each step. She continued to dress in her old outfits, which meant it was easy to see the Gerudo queen's own generous hips and thighs through the diaphonous material of her pants, though most of her weight was carried in the middle. As the plump rulers embraced, Nabooru spoke.

"I am glad to see you Princess Zelda! You are looking healthy and good, yes!"

"Thank you Queen Nabooru... you are, uh, looking very pretty." Zelda giggled nervously. This was true though; Nabooru's face had gotten puffier, but it was still beautiful, with her dark eyes, full lips and long red hair.

"Indeed, the tribe is doing very well! And when they do well, so do I!" Nabooru grinned as she said this.

'That's obvious' Zelda thought to herself. Then she remembered, "I brought two more caravans of Hylian food, as my gift to you, Queen Nabooru. They are unloading them now."

Nabooru's face lit up. "Oooh, many thanks Princess! Your gift is much appreciated. May I call you Zelda? You call me Nabooru, for we are like sisters!"

"Of course Nabooru!" Zelda said with her face flushed with her diplomatic success.

Nabooru's stomach let out a growl just then. "Ah, we should have a meal together. Please let me treat you to a fine Gerudo feast."

Nabooru mentioned for Zelda to take a seat on a large collection of pillows next to her's, as the queen's personal servants start to bring food out. Nabooru, for her part, was gorging even more quickly than Zelda, greedily eating chicken legs and turkey breasts. When she looked over at the tanned desert queen, her eyes bugged out.

Nabooru was still going full tilt through an enormous stuffed bird. Her potbelly looked taut and bloated from all she consumed, and there was a large pile of empty trays next to her. Zelda watched in awe as Nabooru continued to make a pig out of herself for some time, and then eventually leaned back herself, patting her full tummy with a satisfied look on her face. 1151121221.content:
At mid-morning, Zelda is awoken, and escorted by a Gerudo serving girl to have breakfast with the queen. When she arrives, it looks like Nabooru has already been stuffing her greedy face for quite some time. The desert ruler looks up and says "Mmrf, good morming Zelda sister, please join me for *braaap* breakfast." With that, Nabooru goes back to gorging herself.

Zelda stares around at all the food available. There are plates piled high with sausage links, mountains of eggs, cheesy omelets, crisp bacon from the Hylian stores she brought with her. After her over-indulgence last night, Zelda still feels a bit full, and not particularly hungry. But after getting herself comfortable among all the pillows making up her seat, and smelling the bacon wafting through the room, she leans over to snag a piece.

Soon the blonde princess finds herself trying a little of this, and some of that. Rasberry danishes and powdered donuts pass her lips as well as sausage and eggs. After 40 minutes of hedonistic enjoyment, she leans back contentedly full.

Nabooru has continued to glut herself throughout this time, eating noisily and occasionally letting out a loud belch. For the next 2 hours, as Zelda digests her food, she watches with some disgust as Nabooru messily eats more and more, stuffing greasy sausages and omelets with melted cheese into her face. Plate after plate is brought to her, and when she finishes one, she tosses it to the side and impatiently motions for another. Finally, her plump face covered in grease and ketchup, Nabooru belches, and then farts loudly. "Ahhh... that was a -hiccup- good breakfast. What do you say we talk privately after a brief -urrrrrppp- nap?" Licking her fingers, Nabooru, rests her head against one of her cushions, and almost immediately starts snoring.

Several weeks of similar events pass...
1151121221.title: Nabooru wakes Zelda up for breakfast.
